original: mi rtag pa yang rtag par 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang rtag par 'dzin pa ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The following verse is stated to show that impermanence is not apprehended as permanence.

original: rim bzhin skye ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rim bzhin skye ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The so-called arising is in order.

original: mi rtag pa ni rtag pa las skye bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir rtag pas rang gi so sor snang ba skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas mthong ba bskyed pa ni de'i 'dzin byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni rtag pa las skye bar mi 'thad pa'i phyir rtag pas rang gi so sor snang ba skyed par byed pa'i sgo nas mthong ba bskyed pa ni de'i 'dzin byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it is not tenable that impermanence arises from permanence, permanence is seen to generate the appearance of its own individual aspect, and thus it is the apprehender of that.

original: des bskyed par bya ba'i so sor snang ba ni rtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir de ji ltar 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: des bskyed par bya ba'i so sor snang ba ni rtag pa ma yin pa'i phyir de ji ltar 'dzin pa yin /
translated: Since the appearance of its own individual aspect that is to be generated is not permanent, how could it be the apprehender?

original: rang gi so sor snang ba skyed par byed pa nyid ni gzung bya nyid yin no //
analyzed: rang gi so sor snang ba skyed par byed pa nyid ni gzung bya nyid yin no //
translated: The generation of the appearance of its own individual aspect is the object to be apprehended.

original: ji skad du /🔽rigs shes pas /
analyzed: ji skad du / rigs shes pas /
translated: As it is said:🔽The rational mind

original: shes pa'i rnam par 'jog nus pa //🔽rgyu nyid la ni bzung bar shes //
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam par 'jog nus pa // rgyu nyid la ni bzung bar shes //
translated: can posit the aspect of consciousness.

original: zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is known that the cause is apprehended.

original: de rtag pa yang gsal bar byed pa'i dbang gis yin par ni nges pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: de rtag pa yang gsal bar byed pa'i dbang gis yin par ni nges pa can ma yin te /
translated: It is not certain that permanence is the illuminator,

original: gsal bar byed pa'i sgra ni so sor snang ba la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa'i sgra ni so sor snang ba la rag las pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the sound that illuminates depends on the appearance of its own individual aspect.

original: de 'dzin pa ni yul de la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de 'dzin pa ni yul de la ltos pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the apprehension of that object depends on the object,

original: ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //🔽gsal @111a * //
analyzed: ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so // gsal @111a * //
translated: we reply, it is not tenable that it depends on it.

original: byar byed pa ni snang ba la ltos nas sgra tha dad par mthong ba la bsnyon par byed na ri bong la rva yod par khas blangs pas bsnyon par mi byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: byar byed pa ni snang ba la ltos nas sgra tha dad par mthong ba la bsnyon par byed na ri bong la rva yod par khas blangs pas bsnyon par mi byed pa ma yin /
translated: If you say that the appearance of sound is like the appearance of a double moon, we reply, it is not tenable that the appearance of a double moon is like the appearance of a double moon.

original: yul dang dus la sogs pa'i nges pas sgra so sor snang ba yang gzhan du yin pa nyid du ji ltar srid par 'gyur /
analyzed: yul dang dus la sogs pa'i nges pas sgra so sor snang ba yang gzhan du yin pa nyid du ji ltar srid par 'gyur /
translated: If you say that the appearance of individual sounds is due to the restriction of place, time, and so on, how could it be possible that the appearance of sound is restricted in one place and not in another?

original: glo bur ba'i snang ba 'di bum pa la sogs pas kyang ji ltar spong bar byed /
analyzed: glo bur ba'i snang ba 'di bum pa la sogs pas kyang ji ltar spong bar byed /
translated: How could adventitious appearances be excluded by such things as pots?

original: 'on te rkan la sogs pa'i bya ba yod na sgra gar 'dod pa de ltar snang ba yin la /
analyzed: 'on te rkan la sogs pa'i bya ba yod na sgra gar 'dod pa de ltar snang ba yin la /
translated: If the action of the palate, etc. exists, then sound appears as desired.

original: des na rtag pa dang khyab pa can du yang gang dang gang gzung ba'i yul de thams cad na sgra yod pa yin no //
analyzed: des na rtag pa dang khyab pa can du yang gang dang gang gzung ba'i yul de thams cad na sgra yod pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is permanent and pervasive, and sound exists everywhere that it is apprehended.

original: de bzhin du rgyu yod na bum pa la sogs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyu yod na bum pa la sogs pa yang yin no //
translated: In the same way, pots, etc. exist if their causes exist.

original: yan lag dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de rnams rtag pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yan lag dang bcas pa yin pa'i phyir de rnams rtag pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: But they are not permanent because they have parts.

original: yul la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin du cha shas la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba yang gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du cis rtogs par mi byed /
analyzed: yul la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin du cha shas la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba yang gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu mtshan du cis rtogs par mi byed /
translated: Why don’t you accept that the analysis into parts, etc., is the reason that reveals the analysis into objects, etc.?

original: chos thams cad du mthong bar khas len par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: chos thams cad du mthong bar khas len par byed pa yin la /
translated: You accept that all phenomena are seen as manifold.

original: shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa bdag gi chos rnams de'i gnas skabs cha shas med pa yin yang ji ltar rtag par khas len pa yin /
analyzed: shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa bdag gi chos rnams de'i gnas skabs cha shas med pa yin yang ji ltar rtag par khas len pa yin /
translated: Even though the phenomena of the self, such as consciousness and desire, are not part of its state, how can you accept that it is permanent?

original: de'i phyir mthong ba tshad mar byed na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sgra mi rtag par khas blang bar bya dgos so /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba tshad mar byed na bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du sgra mi rtag par khas blang bar bya dgos so /
translated: Therefore, if you accept that seeing is valid knowledge, you must accept that sound is impermanent, like a pot.

original: gzhan du na thams cad rtag pa nyid dam thams cad med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du na thams cad rtag pa nyid dam thams cad med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni nges pa yin no //
translated: Otherwise, everything would be permanent or nothing would exist. This is certain.

original: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mi rtag pa nyid kyang spyi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir tha snyad ni de nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin la sgra la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mi rtag pa nyid kyang spyi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir tha snyad ni de nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs pa las skye bar 'gyur ba yin la sgra la ni ma yin te /
translated: Because impermanence, etc., are universals and permanent, the convention arises from the universal, but not from sound,

original: spyi med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no universal.

original: sgra la spyi med pa yin par tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ci las shes /
analyzed: sgra la spyi med pa yin par tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis ci las shes /
translated: How do you know that there is no universal in sound, venerable one?

original: cha shas med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: cha shas med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Because it is partless.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.🔽

original: rjes su dpag pa la mngon sum gyi spyi shes pas gnod par byed pa'i phyir shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi cha shas med pa'i spyi med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la mngon sum gyi spyi shes pas gnod par byed pa'i phyir shes pa dang 'dod pa la sogs pa rnams kyi cha shas med pa'i spyi med pa ma yin te /
translated: because direct perception contradicts inference. The universal of consciousness, desire, etc., is not partless,

original: gnyi ga'i so sor snang bas spyi dang khyad par dag ma bkag pa'i phyir sgra nyid kyis so sor snang bzhin pa'i spyi ni yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i so sor snang bas spyi dang khyad par dag ma bkag pa'i phyir sgra nyid kyis so sor snang bzhin pa'i spyi ni yod pa ma yin no //
translated: because the universal and the particular are not refuted by the appearance of both. The universal of sound, which appears as distinct, does not exist.

original: de lta na de nyid tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
analyzed: de lta na de nyid tha snyad kyi rgyu mtshan yin no //
translated: In that case, that itself is the reason for the convention.🔽No,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: because it is not so.

original: mthong ba la spyi mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba la spyi mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the universal does not appear in the perception.

original: spyi ni rnam par rtog pas kyang tha dad @111b par go bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi ni rnam par rtog pas kyang tha dad @111b par go bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: And the universal is not understood to be different by the conceptual consciousness,

original: snang ba kho na la de nyid la sogs par zhen pa'i phyir dang / de ltar mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang / de'i don gcig tu bya ba nyid de nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir spyir thal ba'i skyon med do //
analyzed: snang ba kho na la de nyid la sogs par zhen pa'i phyir dang / de ltar mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang / de'i don gcig tu bya ba nyid de nyid du rnam par gnas pa yin pa'i phyir spyir thal ba'i skyon med do //
translated: because it is only in the appearance that it is conceived to be the same, etc., because it is contradictory to see it that way, and because the object of that is the same action, and it is only that which is the universal.

original: gong bu de rnams nyid rnam par rtog pas de mi byed par rnam par bcad pas yul la nges par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gong bu de rnams nyid rnam par rtog pas de mi byed par rnam par bcad pas yul la nges par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The conceptual consciousness does not make that object by conceptualizing the aggregates, but it ascertains the object by excluding the aggregates from being that object.

original: spyi la nges pa yin yang gong bu ma nges pa yin tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi la nges pa yin yang gong bu ma nges pa yin tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though it ascertains the universal, it does not ascertain the aggregates, because it does not make conventions in that way.

original: des na gong bu'i mtshan nyid kyis tha snyad la dang po nyid du de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir spyi ni grub pa la nye bar 'god pa yin pas dgos pa med bzhin du skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gong bu'i mtshan nyid kyis tha snyad la dang po nyid du de ltar 'gyur ba'i phyir spyi ni grub pa la nye bar 'god pa yin pas dgos pa med bzhin du skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it would be like that from the beginning in terms of conventions characterized by the aggregates, the universal is established without purpose, since it is merely posited in relation to what is already established.

original: gong bu ni gcig kho na ma yin te /
analyzed: gong bu ni gcig kho na ma yin te /
translated: The aggregate is not a single entity,

original: so sor mngon du phyogs pas du ma'i skrar nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: so sor mngon du phyogs pas du ma'i skrar nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is perceived as many hairs, since each hair is perceived separately.

original: nyi ma bzhin du cig car ba nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: nyi ma bzhin du cig car ba nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is like the sun, which is perceived as one even though it is many,

original: de yang gcig pa yin par ci las shes /
analyzed: de yang gcig pa yin par ci las shes /
translated: how do you know that the sun is one?

original: lha sbyin ni snga dro shar du bltas pa na nyi ma mdun na gnas par mthong la ;🔽de'i g-yas phyogs na gnas pa gnyis kyis rang gi da ltar ba dang / g-yon phyogs kyi lha sbyin gyi zhes gnyis su mthong ba med pa'i phyir gcig yin no zhe na /🔽de lta yin la gang la gnyis su mthong ba de la ji ltar de bzhin du gcig gi bdag nyid yin pa ni sgra dag la gnyis su mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: lha sbyin ni snga dro shar du bltas pa na nyi ma mdun na gnas par mthong la ; de'i g-yas phyogs na gnas pa gnyis kyis rang gi da ltar ba dang / g-yon phyogs kyi lha sbyin gyi zhes gnyis su mthong ba med pa'i phyir gcig yin no zhe na / de lta yin la gang la gnyis su mthong ba de la ji ltar de bzhin du gcig gi bdag nyid yin pa ni sgra dag la gnyis su mthong ba yin no //
translated: When Devadatta looks at the sun in the east in the morning, he sees it in front of him.🔽But when he is to the sun’s right, he sees it to his right, and when he is to its left, he sees it to his left.🔽If you say that the sun is one, then how can it be seen in different places?🔽If you say that the sun is one, but is seen in different places, then sound, which is also one, should be heard in different places.

original: 'bras bu'i yul rnams nyid ni tha dad pa yin yang sgra ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu'i yul rnams nyid ni tha dad pa yin yang sgra ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the sun is one, but its effect, light, is different, then sound, which is one, should have a different effect.

original: yul bzhin du de'i yul can yang tha dad pa nyid du snang ba yin no //
analyzed: yul bzhin du de'i yul can yang tha dad pa nyid du snang ba yin no //
translated: Just as the object appears to be different, so too does the subject.

original: de'i phyir 'di yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di yang /
translated: Therefore, this is also🔽refuted by the following:

original: yul gyi dbye bas tha dad nyid //
analyzed: yul gyi dbye bas tha dad nyid //
translated: It is different due to the difference of the object.

original: yin par 'di yang dpag bya yin //🔽de nyid 'di zhes mngon sum pa'i //
analyzed: yin par 'di yang dpag bya yin // de nyid 'di zhes mngon sum pa'i //
translated: This should be inferred.

original: shes pa de la gnod byed yin //
analyzed: shes pa de la gnod byed yin //
translated: The cognition that directly perceives

original: zhes bya bas bsal ba yin no /
analyzed: zhes bya bas bsal ba yin no /
translated: that this is that is contradicted.

original: de'i phyir de ltar na sgra ni skad cig re re zhing du ba bzhin du tha dad pa yin yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar na sgra ni skad cig re re zhing du ba bzhin du tha dad pa yin yang /
translated: Thus, although sound is different in each moment, like smoke,

original: snang bzhin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yin na /
analyzed: snang bzhin pa'i rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa yin na /
translated: it produces the conception of something appearing.

original: des na yang de bzhin du zhen pa las rjod byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na yang de bzhin du zhen pa las rjod byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is also conceived in the same way and becomes the means of expression.🔽When it is established as the means of expression, it is not destroyed by mere expression, because it cannot convey the meaning. Therefore, it does not become the expression for the sake of others.

original: rjod byed nyid du grub pa la gang yang brjod btsam gyis 'jig pa ni don rtogs par byed par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don du rjod par byed par mi 'gyur zhes rgol ba dang / 'ga' yang don dang ldan pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rjod byed nyid du grub pa la gang yang brjod btsam gyis 'jig pa ni don rtogs par byed par mi nus pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don du rjod par byed par mi 'gyur zhes rgol ba dang / 'ga' yang don dang ldan pa ma yin te /
translated: Some argue that it is not meaningful,

original: thams cad don med pa'i phyir ro zhes rgol ba gang smra ba 'di yang @112a * //
analyzed: thams cad don med pa'i phyir ro zhes rgol ba gang smra ba 'di yang @112a * //
translated: Because all of this is meaningless.🔽

original: bsnyeg pa tsam yin te /
analyzed: bsnyeg pa tsam yin te /
translated: This objection is merely a repetition,

original: de ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su de dang gcig tu bsre bas thams cad 'brel pa can yin pas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i dus su de dang gcig tu bsre bas thams cad 'brel pa can yin pas 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because at the time of apprehending the relation, all are apprehended as related, since they are mixed as one.

original: gcig tu bsre ba'i rgyu mtshan ni 'dra bar bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gcig tu bsre ba'i rgyu mtshan ni 'dra bar bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: The reason for mixing them as one is the teaching of similarity,

original: gnod pa can gyi rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gnod pa can gyi rgyu mtshan ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not the reason for the fault.

original: des na don dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: des na don dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Therefore, it is meaningful,

original: 'dra ba la don rtogs pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'dra ba la don rtogs pa yin no zhe na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: because the meaning is understood from the similar.

original: gzhan gyi 'dod pa yin par dogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi 'dod pa yin par dogs pa ma yin no //
translated: This is not suspected to be the assertion of others.

original: des na sgras brjod pa las gcig pu rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: des na sgras brjod pa las gcig pu rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, the singular is understood from the expression of the word,

original: 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it apprehends the relation.

original: de bzhin du phyi ma las kyang ngo zhes gang bstan pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du phyi ma las kyang ngo zhes gang bstan pa'o //
translated: This is what is taught by the statement and so on for the subsequent [words] as well.

original: de yang 'dra ba las rjod byed yin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'dra ba las rjod byed yin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And that is not the expression from the similar.

original: 'on te 'di don yod pa yin yang su yang 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te 'di don yod pa yin yang su yang 'dzin par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: But even if it does exist, no one apprehends it.

original: phyi ma'i yang de dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyi ma'i yang de dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And the same applies to the latter.

original: 'dra ba yin na cis rjod byed ma yin zhes bya bar pha rol po'i yang mthun pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba yin na cis rjod byed ma yin zhes bya bar pha rol po'i yang mthun pa nyid yin no //
translated: If it is similar, why is it not a means of expression?

original: mang po rnams ba lang gi sgra rnams su brjod pa na de nyid la de'o zhes shes pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: mang po rnams ba lang gi sgra rnams su brjod pa na de nyid la de'o zhes shes pa ma yin nam /
translated: When many words are uttered, such as “cow,” is it not understood that it is just that?

original: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyis shes pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba nyid kyis shes pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not understood through similarity.

original: 'dra ba nyid du ma shes na de'i sgo nas kyang rjod byed ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid du ma shes na de'i sgo nas kyang rjod byed ma yin te /
translated: If it is not understood as similar, it is not a means of expression.

original: 'dra ba rnam pa gnyis la gcig par de nyid shes pa'i go bya yin la /
analyzed: 'dra ba rnam pa gnyis la gcig par de nyid shes pa'i go bya yin la /
translated: In two types of similarity, one is understood through that which is known as “that itself,”

original: gzhan ni 'dra ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni 'dra ba'i shes pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
translated: while the other produces the cognition of similarity.

original: gcig pa nyid du mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid du mthong ba dang 'gal ba'i phyir 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
translated: Because it contradicts the perception of oneness, it is mistaken.

original: brda la sogs pa yin na sgra ni lcags kyu bzhin du dran byed yin gyi /
analyzed: brda la sogs pa yin na sgra ni lcags kyu bzhin du dran byed yin gyi /
translated: If it is a convention, etc., the word is a reminder like a hook.

original: rang bzhin gyis rjod byed du ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na /🔽ji ltar snang ba de ltar yin du zad mod sgra ni du ba bzhin nam /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis rjod byed du ni mi 'gyur ro zhe na / ji ltar snang ba de ltar yin du zad mod sgra ni du ba bzhin nam /
translated: But it does not become the natural means of expression.

original: gsal ba bzhin du brjod bya la nges pa can dang gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa de ltar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba bzhin du brjod bya la nges pa can dang gsal bar byed pa ma yin pa de ltar mthong ba yin no //
translated: It is just as it appears. Sound is like smoke or like a lamp. It is seen to be certain with regard to the expressed meaning, but it is not a means of making it clear.

original: sgra dang don yang rtag par 'gyur du zin yang phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i phyir de dag las bdag gang nam mkha' bzhin du 'brel par bstan pa ni ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: sgra dang don yang rtag par 'gyur du zin yang phan tshun ltos pa med pa'i phyir de dag las bdag gang nam mkha' bzhin du 'brel par bstan pa ni ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Even if sound and meaning were permanent, they would not be mutually dependent, and therefore the self would be like space, unrelated. The teaching is that it is not tenable to be dependent.

original: gzhan la ltos pa 'brel pa yin//
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa 'brel pa yin//
translated: The definition of dependence is a relation.

original: de med ji ltar ltos pa yin //
analyzed: de med ji ltar ltos pa yin //
translated: If it does not exist, how could it be dependent?

original: yod na'ang thams cad 'dod min na //
analyzed: yod na'ang thams cad 'dod min na //
translated: Even if it exists, it is not accepted by all.

original: dngos po ji ltar ltos byed nyid //
analyzed: dngos po ji ltar ltos byed nyid //
translated: How could a thing be dependent?

original: ces bya'i tshig gi ltos pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya'i tshig gi ltos pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The definition of dependence is a relation.

original: sgra ni me dang 'dra ba rang bzhin gyis gsal byar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra ni me dang 'dra ba rang bzhin gyis gsal byar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Sound is like fire. It is naturally a means of making things clear.

original: de lta yin na rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa la @112b don med do //
analyzed: de lta yin na rtag pa nyid du sgrub pa la @112b don med do //
translated: If that were so, it would be pointless to prove that it is permanent.

original: de 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i yan lag yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de 'brel pa 'dzin pa'i yan lag yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a part that holds the connection,

original: 'dzin pa med na rtag pa yin //
analyzed: 'dzin pa med na rtag pa yin //
translated: then it is permanent if it does not hold.

original: zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la /🔽de bzhin du 'dzin pa yang mthong ba las ma yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa 'dzin par byed pa ma yin la / de bzhin du 'dzin pa yang mthong ba las ma yin te /
translated: It does not hold the connection that is stated in the words “it is permanent.”🔽Similarly, it does not hold the connection that is stated in the words “it is seen.”

original: rnam par rtog pa yang mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtag pa nyid du rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang mthong ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rtag pa nyid du rig pa ma yin te /
translated: Also, the conception that it is permanent does not follow from seeing it.

original: 'on kyang de mi byed pa rnam par gcod par byed pa na rang gi mtshan nyid kho nas yin la /
analyzed: 'on kyang de mi byed pa rnam par gcod par byed pa na rang gi mtshan nyid kho nas yin la /
translated: Rather, when it is ascertained that it does not perform a function, it is by its own characteristic.

original: de la ni dgos pa med la gzhan du yang rig pa yin no //
analyzed: de la ni dgos pa med la gzhan du yang rig pa yin no //
translated: And in that case, there is no need for it to be different.

original: de'i phyir sgra rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the proof that sound is permanent

original: nga ni mi chen po'o zhes bya ba tsam yin no //
analyzed: nga ni mi chen po'o zhes bya ba tsam yin no //
translated: is merely the statement “I am a great man.”

original: de lta yin na don dang 'brel pa ni du ba bzhin rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na don dang 'brel pa ni du ba bzhin rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: If that were so, the connection with the meaning would be impermanent by its nature, like smoke.

original: don gyis sam skyes bus phan gdags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: don gyis sam skyes bus phan gdags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: because it is to be benefited by an object or a person.🔽In response, Aryadeva says:

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
translated: Because it cannot be benefited in any way,

original: zhes bya ba ste don gyis so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste don gyis so //
translated: “Because of an object” means because of an object.🔽This is because it occurs by the power of those who wish to speak, without regard to what is near.🔽If it is not grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: de nye ba la ma ltos par byed pa'i yon tan dang / smra bar 'dod pa dag gi dbang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nye ba la ma ltos par byed pa'i yon tan dang / smra bar 'dod pa dag gi dbang gis 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: me bzhin du gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang de bzhin du 'dzin pa ma yin na mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: me bzhin du gsal bar byed pa nyid kyang de bzhin du 'dzin pa ma yin na mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa yin na me dang 'dra ba de bzhin du 'dzin pa la phan par byed pa ma yin zhes kyang bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa yin na me dang 'dra ba de bzhin du 'dzin pa la phan par byed pa ma yin zhes kyang bstan pa yin no //
translated: If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang rang bzhin gyis 'brel pa can du byed pa ni skyes bu yin no zhe na /🔽ma yin te /
analyzed: 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang rang bzhin gyis 'brel pa can du byed pa ni skyes bu yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: de'i rang bzhin la des de ltar byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin la des de ltar byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is illumination by nature, it is not illumination, just like fire.🔽If it is grasped as it is, it is not illumination, just like fire.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: If it

original: nas ni khre'i myu gu dang 'brel pa can du bya bar mi nus so //
analyzed: nas ni khre'i myu gu dang 'brel pa can du bya bar mi nus so //
translated: But it is not possible for barley to be related to the sprout of wheat.

original: phrad par byed par nus pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: phrad par byed par nus pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is possible to make them meet,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: sgra dang don dag rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyis phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang don dag rdzas ma yin pa nyid kyis phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because sound and meaning are not substances, they do not meet.

original: 'du ba 'bras bu'i rjod byed nyid ma yin pa go byed nyid du byed pa ni yin no //
analyzed: 'du ba 'bras bu'i rjod byed nyid ma yin pa go byed nyid du byed pa ni yin no //
translated: But it is possible for a non-conjunct cause to be an illuminator.

original: rjod byed ma yin pa ji ltar de ltar byed pa yin /
analyzed: rjod byed ma yin pa ji ltar de ltar byed pa yin /
translated: How can a non-conjunct cause act in that way?

original: de ltar ma yin na mes du ba'i byed pa dang go byed kyang ji ltar yin /
analyzed: de ltar ma yin na mes du ba'i byed pa dang go byed kyang ji ltar yin /
translated: If it does not act in that way, how can fire be a producer and illuminator of smoke?

original: bden te / mes bskyed bya de nyid yin pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa las /
analyzed: bden te / mes bskyed bya de nyid yin pa ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa las /
translated: It is true that fire is a producer of smoke, because it follows and reverses with it.

original: rang bzhin gyis go bar byed pa min la /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis go bar byed pa min la /
translated: But it is not a natural illuminator.

original: sgra ni de bzhin du don gyis bskyed bya dang de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni de bzhin du don gyis bskyed bya dang de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can ma yin te /
translated: Sound is not a producer of meaning, nor does it follow and reverse with it,

original: brjod par 'dod pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: brjod par 'dod pa la sogs pa las byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises from the desire to speak and so forth.

original: @113a * // de las byung ba yin yang mngon par bsam pas rjod byed yin no zhe na /
analyzed: @113a * // de las byung ba yin yang mngon par bsam pas rjod byed yin no zhe na /
translated: But even though it arises from that, it is the means of expression because it is the object of the intention.

original: rjod byed nyid dam brjod bya nyid ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtsig pa la ri mo bzhin du sgrar grub pa yin na rjod byed du 'ongs pa yin no //
analyzed: rjod byed nyid dam brjod bya nyid ni dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir rtsig pa la ri mo bzhin du sgrar grub pa yin na rjod byed du 'ongs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is established as sound like a picture on a wall, it is the means of expression because it is the means of expression or the object of expression, not because it is the object of expression.

original: skyes bus 'dus byas pa'i dngos por byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skyes bus 'dus byas pa'i dngos por byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is made into an entity that is compounded by a person.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not.

original: de lta bu'i rkyen las gzhan par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rkyen las gzhan par ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not seen as anything other than such conditions.

original: rkyen rtogs bzhin pa 'phangs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rkyen rtogs bzhin pa 'phangs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But the conditions are projected by the realization.

original: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa yang da ni dngos por thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam mkha'i me tog la sogs pa yang da ni dngos por thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then it follows that even sky flowers and so on are entities.

original: de'i phyir rjod byed nyid ni smra ba pos de ltar rnam par gzhag pa yin pas blo'i chos yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjod byed nyid ni smra ba pos de ltar rnam par gzhag pa yin pas blo'i chos yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, since the means of expression is posited in that way by the speaker, it is a phenomenon of the mind.

original: dngos po'i chos ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not a phenomenon of the object.

original: ji skad du de ni rnam par rtog pa yin pas med pa'i phyir byed bzhin pa'i yang 'brel pa ni sgra dang lhan cig byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ji skad du de ni rnam par rtog pa yin pas med pa'i phyir byed bzhin pa'i yang 'brel pa ni sgra dang lhan cig byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Because it is a conceptual thought, it does not exist. Therefore, the relation of the action to the word is not simultaneous.

original: sgra dang 'brel pa dang de'i tha snyad du byed pa rnams rim bzhin 'byung ba nyid kyis lhan cig byed bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra dang 'brel pa dang de'i tha snyad du byed pa rnams rim bzhin 'byung ba nyid kyis lhan cig byed bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the relation with the word and the performance of the convention occur in sequence, they cannot be simultaneous.

original: sgra brjod pa dang 'brel byed dang // tha snyad par ni byed pa rnams //
analyzed: sgra brjod pa dang 'brel byed dang // tha snyad par ni byed pa rnams //
translated: The word, the expression, and the performance of the convention

original: rim gyis 'byung ba'i rang bzhin phyir //
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba'i rang bzhin phyir //
translated: occur in sequence.

original: gang du cig car byed sus nus //🔽zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: gang du cig car byed sus nus // zhes smos pa'o //
translated: Who can perform them simultaneously?

original: sgra brjod pas kyang 'brel pa byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra brjod pas kyang 'brel pa byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The word does not perform the relation,

original: byed pa'i dus su sgra zhig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa'i dus su sgra zhig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the word has ceased at the time of the performance.

original: byas pa yin na yang de la dgos pa ci yang med do //
analyzed: byas pa yin na yang de la dgos pa ci yang med do //
translated: Even if it were produced, there would be no purpose for it.

original: re zhig sgra yis ma brjod na //
analyzed: re zhig sgra yis ma brjod na //
translated: If the word does not express,

original: 'brel par byed pa ci las yin //
analyzed: 'brel par byed pa ci las yin //
translated: how can it perform the relation?

original: brjod pa tsam gyis zhig pa la //
analyzed: brjod pa tsam gyis zhig pa la //
translated: If it performs the relation merely by being expressed,

original: 'brel pa dgos pa med pa yin //
analyzed: 'brel pa dgos pa med pa yin //
translated: the relation would be purposeless.

original: rnam par brtag pa la ni byed pa'am ston pa nyid la de bde bar byed pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rnam par brtag pa la ni byed pa'am ston pa nyid la de bde bar byed pa nyid yin no //
translated: In the case of conceptualization, it is the agent or the one who teaches that is the one who makes it happy.

original: de la ltos nas ;
analyzed: de la ltos nas ;
translated: In dependence on that,

original: dngos po rang nyid ma 'dres pa //
analyzed: dngos po rang nyid ma 'dres pa //
translated: the things themselves are unmixed,

original: de rnams rnam rtog gis 'dres byed //
analyzed: de rnams rnam rtog gis 'dres byed //
translated: but they are mixed by conceptualization.

original: ces bya ba'i tshig gis ni da thams cad bslad pa yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i tshig gis ni da thams cad bslad pa yin no //
translated: By this statement, all are adulterated.🔽Therefore,

original: de'i phyir / zhig med da ltar ba rnams la //
analyzed: de'i phyir / zhig med da ltar ba rnams la //
translated: in the case of the non-ceased and the present,

original: brjod pa srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: brjod pa srid pa ma yin no //
translated: expression is not possible.

original: zhes bya ba 'di la ni 'brel pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la ni 'brel pa med pa yin te /
translated: This is not related.

original: zhig pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams la ni de byed pa ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pas zhen pa'i sgra rnams la brten nas /
analyzed: zhig pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams la ni de byed pa ma yin pa rnam par gcod pa'i bdag nyid kyi rnam par rtog pas zhen pa'i sgra rnams la brten nas /
translated: In the case of words such as “ceased,” the words are based on conceptualization that has the nature of the exclusion of non-agents.

original: 'brel pa rnam par gzhag pa dang brjod pa dag yod pa'i phyir ro //🔽gang zhig gang gis byed pa'am //
analyzed: 'brel pa rnam par gzhag pa dang brjod pa dag yod pa'i phyir ro // gang zhig gang gis byed pa'am //
translated: Because the relation and the expression are established.🔽By what and through what is it done?

original: rjod par byed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa yin zhe na /
translated: Or what is expressed?

original: ma grub @113b pa yi grub pas so //
analyzed: ma grub @113b pa yi grub pas so //
translated: It is established by that which is not established.

original: gang dag grub pa yin pa ni brjod par dka' ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gang dag grub pa yin pa ni brjod par dka' ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is difficult to express what is established.

original: legs par sbyangs pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sgras ni 'di brjod sla ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: legs par sbyangs pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i sgras ni 'di brjod sla ba kho na yin no //
translated: Those who are well trained can easily express it with words.

original: yul aa dha la sogs pa'i rang skad kyi sgras legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi don go bar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: yul aa dha la sogs pa'i rang skad kyi sgras legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi don go bar mthong ba yin no //
translated: We see that the meaning of Sanskrit is understood through the words of the local languages of Adhara and so on.

original: legs par sbyar ba kho na sgra ma yin nam /
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba kho na sgra ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't Sanskrit the only language?

original: skad ces bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /🔽go'i sgra kho na brjod par 'dod kyang mi nus pa ni /
analyzed: skad ces bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te / go'i sgra kho na brjod par 'dod kyang mi nus pa ni /
translated: There is no such thing as a language called local.

original: gha ba'i sgra la sogs pa rjod par byed do //
analyzed: gha ba'i sgra la sogs pa rjod par byed do //
translated: Even when one wishes to say the word go, one is unable to and instead says gāvī.

original: don dang ldan pa gzhan ni 'dra ba nyid la rjod byed ma yin no //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa gzhan ni 'dra ba nyid la rjod byed ma yin no //
translated: Another word that has meaning is not expressive of similarity.

original: des na mi nus pas kyang shugs kyis go ba'i sgra brjod pa yang yin la /
analyzed: des na mi nus pas kyang shugs kyis go ba'i sgra brjod pa yang yin la /
translated: Therefore, even when one is unable to express it, the word is understood through implication.

original: brjod kyang go'i sgra nyid yin no //
analyzed: brjod kyang go'i sgra nyid yin no //
translated: Even when expressed, it is the word go.

original: 'dra ba nyid la rjod byed nyid yin na /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid la rjod byed nyid yin na /
translated: If it is expressive of similarity,

original: ga 'u ra'i sgra las kyang lkog shal la sogs pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ga 'u ra'i sgra las kyang lkog shal la sogs pa'i don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: And from the word gāvī, the meaning of the dewlap and so on is understood.

original: gha bi la sogs pa yang go'i blo //
analyzed: gha bi la sogs pa yang go'i blo //
translated: The words gavi and so on are the cognition of go.

original: rtsa ba'i sgra yi rjes 'brangs yin ;
analyzed: rtsa ba'i sgra yi rjes 'brangs yin ;
translated: They follow the root word.

original: /'di yi rgyu mtshan 'dra ba las //
analyzed: /'di yi rgyu mtshan 'dra ba las //
translated: The reason for this is like the word gāvī.

original: g'u ra'i sgra las nges par 'gyur //
analyzed: g'u ra'i sgra las nges par 'gyur //
translated: It is ascertained from the word gāvī.

original: smras pa / ts'a g'i bi dang / aa bi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra rnams go'i sgra dran par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: smras pa / ts'a g'i bi dang / aa bi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra rnams go'i sgra dran par byed pa yin la /
translated: Objection: The words cāgavida, abhi, and so on remind one of the word go.

original: de las go nyid du shes pa yin nam /
analyzed: de las go nyid du shes pa yin nam /
translated: From that, is it known as go?

original: 'on te go'i sgra nyid de bzhin du rtogs pa'i rjod byed yin par 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: 'on te go'i sgra nyid de bzhin du rtogs pa'i rjod byed yin par 'gyur grang na /
translated: Or is the word go itself the expression for the cognition of that?

original: re zhig dran par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig dran par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not a reminder.

original: kla kli la sogs pa bzhin rnams kyi tha snyad pa'i go'i sgra la sogs pa ni dran pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kla kli la sogs pa bzhin rnams kyi tha snyad pa'i go'i sgra la sogs pa ni dran pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the conventional words go and so on of the barbarians and so on are not remembered.

original: legs par sbyar ba rigs pa rnams kyang skad kyi tha snyad kyi dus su legs par sbyar ba dran pa las bar du chod pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro//
analyzed: legs par sbyar ba rigs pa rnams kyang skad kyi tha snyad kyi dus su legs par sbyar ba dran pa las bar du chod pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro//
translated: Also, the correct etymologies are not understood from the recollection of the correct etymologies at the time of the conventions of language.

original: go'i sgra nyid ni de ltar rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: go'i sgra nyid ni de ltar rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The word go itself is not understood in that way.

original: snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the difference in appearance.

original: ga bi la sogs pa rab tu sbyor ba la yang go'i sgra nyid rjod byed ma yin te /
analyzed: ga bi la sogs pa rab tu sbyor ba la yang go'i sgra nyid rjod byed ma yin te /
translated: Also, in the application of gavi, etc., the word go itself is not the expression,

original: ma rtogs pa ni rjod byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni rjod byed ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the non-understanding is not the expression.

original: de ltar yin na sgra rnams kyi de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar yin na sgra rnams kyi de nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it were so, it would follow that the words are the reality.

original: de'i phyir gtsang sbra can rnams kyi rnam par spros pa des chog go //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtsang sbra can rnams kyi rnam par spros pa des chog go //
translated: Therefore, the proliferation of the pure ones is sufficient.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig la gang grags pa de ni de'i rjes su 'brangs nas sam tha snyad mthong ba las gzhan du rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig la gang grags pa de ni de'i rjes su 'brangs nas sam tha snyad mthong ba las gzhan du rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, that which is renowned to someone is understood from following that or from seeing the convention, but not

original: don dam pa pa ni ma yin zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: don dam pa pa ni ma yin zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: otherwise. It is not the ultimate.🔽In that regard,

original: de la / mi rtag pa la 'ang tshad med nyid //
analyzed: de la / mi rtag pa la 'ang tshad med nyid //
translated: Impermanence is also immeasurable.

original: ces bya ba smos so //
analyzed: ces bya ba smos so //
translated: Thus, it is said.🔽How can a permanent effect be dependent on a collection of causes? It is illogical.

original: @114a * // 'bras bu la rtag pa lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa ci las yin te mi rigs so //
analyzed: @114a * // 'bras bu la rtag pa lhan cig byed pa la ltos pa ci las yin te mi rigs so //
translated: If you think that a permanent entity is the agent because it is the cause of the effect,🔽then it would be the agent of the effect that is produced by the collection of causes.

original: gang gi phyir lhan cig byed pas byas pa phul du byung ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir lhan cig byed pas byas pa phul du byung ba yin na /
translated: But how can a permanent entity be the agent of an effect that is produced by the collection of causes?

original: rtag pa yang rim gyis byed par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: rtag pa yang rim gyis byed par 'gyur ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: To respond:

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /🔽lhan cig byed pas byas pa rnams kyi gnas skabs nyid byed pa po yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas gnas skabs pa'i bya ba nyid yin na /
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir // zhes bya ba smos te / lhan cig byed pas byas pa rnams kyi gnas skabs nyid byed pa po yin pa'i phyir de'i sgo nas gnas skabs pa'i bya ba nyid yin na /
translated: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.🔽Because the state of those things that are produced by the collection of causes is the agent, the state of the effect is the activity.

original: bya ba dang cig shos dag la bye brag med par byed pa po nyid yin la /
analyzed: bya ba dang cig shos dag la bye brag med par byed pa po nyid yin la /
translated: If the permanent entity is the agent of the effect that is produced by the collection of causes, then it would be the agent of the effect that is not produced by the collection of causes.🔽But how can a permanent entity be the agent of an effect that is not produced by the collection of causes?

original: bye brag med na yang thug pa med pa yin te /🔽gnas skabs nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
analyzed: bye brag med na yang thug pa med pa yin te / gnas skabs nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rjes su byed pa'i 'bras bu yin gyi /
translated: To respond: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.🔽If a permanent entity is the agent of an effect that is produced by the collection of causes, then it would be the agent of the effect that is not produced by the collection of causes.

original: gnas skabs pa'i ma yin pa'i phyir rtag par byed pa po ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas skabs pa'i ma yin pa'i phyir rtag par byed pa po ma yin no //
translated: But how can a permanent entity be the agent of an effect that is not produced by the collection of causes?🔽To respond: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.

original: lhan cig byed pa nyid du phul du byung ba yin gyi /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa nyid du phul du byung ba yin gyi /
translated: Is it not the case that the most excellent are co-operating causes?

original: gzhan ni ma yin pa ma yin nam de yang res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang res 'ga' ba yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin pa ma yin nam de yang res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir 'bras bu yang res 'ga' ba yin gyi /
translated: And since they are sometimes absent, the effect is sometimes absent.

original: des na rtag pa ni 'ga' yang khyad par du byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rtag pa ni 'ga' yang khyad par du byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, nothing is a permanent cause,

original: byed pa yin na yang de yang ji ltar yin /
analyzed: byed pa yin na yang de yang ji ltar yin /
translated: and if it were a cause, how could it be permanent?

original: khyad par gzhan byed pa yin na yang thug pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par gzhan byed pa yin na yang thug pa med pa yin no //
translated: If it were a cause by producing a difference, there would be an infinite regress.

original: de'i phyir mtha'i gnas skabs bzhin du lhan cig byed pa po nyid kho na rgyu nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mtha'i gnas skabs bzhin du lhan cig byed pa po nyid kho na rgyu nyid yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, like the final moment, only the co-operating causes are the cause,🔽but not the special cause.

original: khyad par du byed pa po nyid ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: khyad par du byed pa po nyid ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: In response to this, he says,

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.

original: de lta yin na dang po'i gnas skabs gang yin pa can lhan cig byed pa'i dus su yang gnas skabs de nyid yin pas phan gdags pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang po bzhin du khyad par can mi bskyed pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta yin na dang po'i gnas skabs gang yin pa can lhan cig byed pa'i dus su yang gnas skabs de nyid yin pas phan gdags pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang po bzhin du khyad par can mi bskyed pa yin la /
translated: If that were so, then at the time of the first moment, it would be just that moment, and since it would not be benefited, it would not generate a subsequent moment, just as it was before.

original: dus phyis kyang yal bar 'jug pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus phyis kyang yal bar 'jug pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it would also be left as it is later.

original: 'bras bu ni lhan cig byed pa kho na las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ni lhan cig byed pa kho na las byung ba yin no //
translated: The effect arises only from the assemblage of causes and conditions.

original: de lta yin na gzhan na lhan cig byed pa yod kyang ci mi 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: de lta yin na gzhan na lhan cig byed pa yod kyang ci mi 'byung ba yin /
translated: If that were so, then even if the assemblage of causes and conditions exists, it would not arise.

original: de lta yin na dang po skyed byed ma yin pa'i ngo bo de bcad pa yin no //🔽yang na / gal te rtag pa dus gzhan na yang yod pa rim bzhin byed pa po nyid ma yin na skad cig ma ni ches shin tu ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na dang po skyed byed ma yin pa'i ngo bo de bcad pa yin no // yang na / gal te rtag pa dus gzhan na yang yod pa rim bzhin byed pa po nyid ma yin na skad cig ma ni ches shin tu ma yin te /
translated: If that were so, then the nature of the first moment would not be a producer.🔽Moreover, if a permanent thing is not a creator in a sequence of moments, then it is utterly not a creator.🔽If it is not a creator in the first moment, it is not tenable that it is a creator in later moments.

original: skad cig phyi ma la reg pa ma yin pa'i phyir rim gyis ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: skad cig phyi ma la reg pa ma yin pa'i phyir rim gyis ma yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: If it is a creator in later moments, it is not tenable that it is not a creator in the first moment.🔽If it is a creator in the first moment, it is not tenable that it is not a creator in later moments.

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya @114b ba smos te /🔽mi rtag pa la'ang rim bzhin pa la tshad ma med ces bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir // zhes bya @114b ba smos te / mi rtag pa la'ang rim bzhin pa la tshad ma med ces bya ba la /
translated: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.🔽The word “not” is repeated in the verse.

original: min zhes bya ba dang skyar ro //
analyzed: min zhes bya ba dang skyar ro //
translated: The word “not” is repeated in the verse.

original: ci las shes she na /
analyzed: ci las shes she na /
translated: How is this known?

original: mi rtag pa la rnam pa 'gas phan gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa la rnam pa 'gas phan gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the impermanent is to be benefited in some way.

original: sa la sogs pa rnams kyis sa bon la rim gyis phan byed pa mthong bas thug pa med pa yang yin te /
analyzed: sa la sogs pa rnams kyis sa bon la rim gyis phan byed pa mthong bas thug pa med pa yang yin te /
translated: The seed is seen to be benefited gradually by the earth element, etc.

original: skad cig dang po la nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu rnams kyis tshogs par khyad par can skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig dang po la nye bar 'gro ba'i rgyu rnams kyis tshogs par khyad par can skyed par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The first moment of the seed is the cause of the seed’s approach, and the collection of causes produces the seed’s distinctive state.

original: gnas skabs de kho na 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs de kho na 'bras bu skyed par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The seed in that state is not the cause of the effect,

original: phyi ma bzhin du dang po yang yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi ma bzhin du dang po yang yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it follows that the first moment of the seed is the cause of the seed in the later moments.

original: bshad par byed pas bshad pa ni //
analyzed: bshad par byed pas bshad pa ni //
translated: The author of the commentary explains:

original: tshad ma rtag pa nyid yod min //🔽zhes bya ba ni ther zug pa'i rtag pa ni /
analyzed: tshad ma rtag pa nyid yod min //🔽zhes bya ba ni ther zug pa'i rtag pa ni /
translated: Valid knowledge is not permanent.🔽The word “not” is repeated in the verse.

original: dus 'di dang dus phyi mar yang gcig pa'i bdag nyid yin la /
analyzed: dus 'di dang dus phyi mar yang gcig pa'i bdag nyid yin la /
translated: The self is the same in this life and the next.

original: de las bzlog pas khyab pa yin pas mi shes pa'i phyir yang dag nyid du gsungs zhes bya bas bsal nas /
analyzed: de las bzlog pas khyab pa yin pas mi shes pa'i phyir yang dag nyid du gsungs zhes bya bas bsal nas /
translated: Since it is the opposite of that, it is not the object of knowledge.

original: da ni rgyun gyis rtag pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi sems dang ldan pa dang sems dang mi ldan pa bzhin du skyon gyi gnyen po yon tan gyi rgyu ston par byed pas yang dag nyid gsungs ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
analyzed: da ni rgyun gyis rtag pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin rnams kyi sems dang ldan pa dang sems dang mi ldan pa bzhin du skyon gyi gnyen po yon tan gyi rgyu ston par byed pas yang dag nyid gsungs ni tshad ma nyid yin la /
translated: Now, the permanence of the continuum is like the mind and the absence of mind of those whose nature is mind. The Teacher teaches the cause of the qualities, the antidote to the faults.

original: de las byung ba ma yin pas ni des nus pa mthong bas ston pa ni de las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de las byung ba ma yin pas ni des nus pa mthong bas ston pa ni de las byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir go bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: Since it is not arisen from that, the Teacher is not a valid means of knowledge. Since its power is seen, the Teacher is not a valid means of knowledge because he is not arisen from that.

original: rnam 'gas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam 'gas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is taught by “By what means?”

original: mnyes pa yin na 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu yin pas 'di'i nus pa 'di 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: mnyes pa yin na 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i rgyu yin pas 'di'i nus pa 'di 'byung ba yin no //
translated: If it is pleasing, it is the cause of the pacification of attachment and so on. Therefore, its power arises in this way.

original: mnyes pa yin na dug zhi ba dang ri lu dang mig sman la sogs pa grub par mthong ba yin no snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: mnyes pa yin na dug zhi ba dang ri lu dang mig sman la sogs pa grub par mthong ba yin no snyam du sems pas /
translated: If he is pleased, he sees the accomplishment of the pacification of poison, the pill, the eye medicine, and so on.

original: 'on te mnyes par bya ba'i rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa zer ba la lan ni /🔽de bshad rjes su sgrub pa yis //
analyzed: 'on te mnyes par bya ba'i rim gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa zer ba la lan ni / de bshad rjes su sgrub pa yis //
translated: To the statement, But if he is pleased by the process of pleasing, and so on, the answer is:

original: 'jig rten rjes 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten rjes 'dzin zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By explaining that, he is pleasing the world

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo gnag gis rtogs pa'i srog chags sdig pa'i dug zhi bar nus pas /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i ngo bo gnag gis rtogs pa'i srog chags sdig pa'i dug zhi bar nus pas /
translated: because he is able to pacify the poison of the sinful beings who realize the nature of the pacification of attachment and so on.

original: klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug sel ba'i nus pa shes par mi rigs te /
analyzed: klu'i rgyal po 'jog po'i dug sel ba'i nus pa shes par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to know the power to remove the poison of the naga king Takshaka,

original: skyes bu'i don bag tsam byed par nus par mthong ba las /
analyzed: skyes bu'i don bag tsam byed par nus par mthong ba las /
translated: because he is seen to be able to perform a small purpose of a person.

original: phul du byung ba'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa phul du byung ba dang 'brel pa can bla na med pa'i bsod nams la sogs pas @115a * //
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa phul du byung ba dang 'brel pa can bla na med pa'i bsod nams la sogs pas @115a * //
translated: By the power of the complete perfection of the excellent qualities, the complete perfection of the excellent qualities of the complete perfection of the excellent qualities of the complete original: bsgrubs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'am de ster ba'i nus pa rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrubs pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'am de ster ba'i nus pa rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the realization of nirvana that is to be attained, or of the power that grants it,

original: thal ches pa'i phyir skyes bu'i don bag tsam byin pa'i nus pa gang yang yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir skyes bu'i don bag tsam byin pa'i nus pa gang yang yod pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because that would be absurd. The meaning is that there is no power whatsoever that grants even the slightest benefit to a person.

original: mngon sum la sogs pa ni 'jug pa'i yul nye bar 'thob par byed pa nyid kyis phan par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin nam /
analyzed: mngon sum la sogs pa ni 'jug pa'i yul nye bar 'thob par byed pa nyid kyis phan par byed pa yin pa'i phyir tshad ma ma yin nam /
translated: But isn’t perception, etc., a valid cognition because it benefits by causing the attainment of the object that is engaged?

original: phan gdags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not because it is benefited.🔽Therefore, it is not contradictory for valid cognition itself to be benefited.

original: de'i phyir tshad ma nyid la phan gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa ni 'gal ba med do snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir tshad ma nyid la phan gdags par bya ba nyid yin pa ni 'gal ba med do snyam du sems pa la /
translated: To this he says,🔽What is what?

original: gang zhig ci zhig rnam pa ltar //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang zhig ci zhig rnam pa ltar // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In what way?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mthong nas gnyen po dmigs pa na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mthong nas gnyen po dmigs pa na /
translated: When one sees the counteragent, one focuses on the antidote.

original: nus pa nye bar dmigs pa las ston par byed pa ni gzhan gyi tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: nus pa nye bar dmigs pa las ston par byed pa ni gzhan gyi tshad ma yin no //
translated: The teacher is another’s valid cognition from the observation of the power.

original: gzhan du na nus pa ma shes pa yin na mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag ji ltar ston par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽'dod chags dang bral ba nyams su myong bas ni de'i lam mam /
analyzed: gzhan du na nus pa ma shes pa yin na mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dag ji ltar ston par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i don to // 'dod chags dang bral ba nyams su myong bas ni de'i lam mam /
translated: Otherwise, if one does not understand the capacity, how can one demonstrate the antidotes and their opposites?🔽One understands the path of freedom from attachment through experience,

original: de las bzlog pa yang shugs kyis go ba kho na yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa yang shugs kyis go ba kho na yin no zhe na /
translated: or one understands it only indirectly.

original: de la ni 'di 'dra ba'i bya ba yod pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de la ni 'di 'dra ba'i bya ba yod pa ma yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In that case, it is said that there is no such activity.

original: ci yang yod ces bya bar ni /
analyzed: ci yang yod ces bya bar ni /
translated: What is there?

original: shugs kyis go ba ni bden no //
analyzed: shugs kyis go ba ni bden no //
translated: It is true that one understands it indirectly.

original: ci yang med ces rnam shes pa //
analyzed: ci yang med ces rnam shes pa //
translated: But how can one understand nothing exists

original: mi rnams la ni gang du dgos //
analyzed: mi rnams la ni gang du dgos //
translated: in any way among humans?

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du don thams cad mthong ba yang 'di'i yong pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du don thams cad mthong ba yang 'di'i yong pa ma yin nam /
translated: Just as one is free from attachment, is it not the case that one sees all objects in this way?

original: ji ltar nus pa yongs su gcod pa yin snyam du sems pas zer ba ni /
analyzed: ji ltar nus pa yongs su gcod pa yin snyam du sems pas zer ba ni /
translated: Thinking that one determines the capacity, one says:

original: 'on te de'i thams cad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te de'i thams cad ces bya ba'o //
translated: Or is it that all of that is his?

original: lan ni de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: lan ni de ni mi rigs te /
translated: The answer is: That is not reasonable.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyams su ma myong na zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa nyams su ma myong na zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one does not experience desire, etc.,

original: gzhan la ltos pa'i 'dod chags la sogs gzung bya nyid du rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa'i 'dod chags la sogs gzung bya nyid du rigs pa yin te /
translated: it is reasonable that desire, etc., which depend on another, are to be grasped.

original: rjes su 'dzin pa dang nye bar 'joms pa bdag nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pa dang nye bar 'joms pa bdag nyid kyis ni ma yin te /
translated: But not by one’s own nature, which is to be nurtured and destroyed.

original: 'di ni rnag gi rig pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di ni rnag gi rig pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is the nature of the mind.

original: de nyid kyi ngo bo rang mtshan nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyi ngo bo rang mtshan nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the own-character of that, not of another.

original: rang rig pa nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyis grol ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang rig pa nyid nyams su myong ba nyid kyis grol ba ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: The demonstration that one is not liberated by the experience of self-awareness itself is:

original: nyams su myong na ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: nyams su myong na ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: If one experiences,

original: 'on te 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'di dbang phyug nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin snyam @115b du sems pa na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa 'di dbang phyug nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin snyam @115b du sems pa na /
translated: If one thinks that one who is endowed with desire, etc., is not free from desire because he is endowed with Īśvara, etc.,

original: 'on te 'dod chags pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te 'dod chags pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: then: If one is endowed with desire, etc.,

original: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa dbang phyug nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin na gzhan la yang de'i gnyen po ston pa la don med pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'dod chags la sogs pa dbang phyug nyid kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs ma yin na gzhan la yang de'i gnyen po ston pa la don med pa yin no //
translated: If attachment and so on are not the adversaries of God, then it is pointless to teach the antidotes to them to others.

original: de kho na bzhin du de dang 'brel pa la yang dbang phyug nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes lan du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du de dang 'brel pa la yang dbang phyug nyid yod pa'i phyir ro zhes lan du brjod pa ni /
translated: In response to that, it is said:

original: gal te 'dod chags la sogs dang // ldan yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gal te 'dod chags la sogs dang // ldan yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: If one possesses attachment and so on,

original: gang dag 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa de dag gis de spangs pa yin na dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: gang dag 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan pa de dag gis de spangs pa yin na dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: If those who possess attachment and so on abandon them, they would become God.

original: ma spangs na ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma spangs na ni ma yin te /
translated: But if they do not abandon them, they would not become God.

original: rang nyid las grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang nyid las grub pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they would not be established from themselves.

original: rang nyid las grub pa yin na ni 'gal ba med do snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: rang nyid las grub pa yin na ni 'gal ba med do snyam du sems pas /
translated: If they were established from themselves, there would be no contradiction.🔽Thinking that, it is said:

original: 'on te 'di ni dngos po'i gnas lugs yin te zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'on te 'di ni dngos po'i gnas lugs yin te zhes bya ba ste /
translated: But this is the nature of things.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'brel pa can bdag por gyur pa la sogs pa yon tan rnams 'dod chags dang bcas pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'brel pa can bdag por gyur pa la sogs pa yon tan rnams 'dod chags dang bcas pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: But for one who is desirous, those qualities such as being free from attachment and being a lord are not related to one who is desirous,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because they are contradictory.

original: lan ni / gal te de ltar chags bral sogs //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lan ni / gal te de ltar chags bral sogs // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response is: If it is so, then being free from attachment, etc.🔽is related to the meditation of being free from attachment, etc.,

original: de lta yin na de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'gal ba 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa bsgom pa dang 'brel pa can dbang phyug nyid la sogs pa rnams yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de lta yin na de yang 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'gal ba 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa bsgom pa dang 'brel pa can dbang phyug nyid la sogs pa rnams yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: which are contradictory to attachment, etc. The meaning is that they are the qualities of being a lord, etc.

original: du ba dang me dag gi bskyed bya du ba'i dbye ba bzhin du goms pas bskyed bya dang cig shos tha dad par 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: du ba dang me dag gi bskyed bya du ba'i dbye ba bzhin du goms pas bskyed bya dang cig shos tha dad par 'gal ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is so, then it is contradictory that the object of meditation and the meditation are different, like the difference of smoke that is produced and the fire that produces it.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa gnyen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa gnyen po la sogs pa zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The response is: The meditation of being free from attachment, etc.🔽is related to being free from attachment, etc.,🔽which are the antidotes to attachment, etc.

original: dang po goms pa las byung ba las de las gzhan pa de las 'byung ba yin pa ni me las byung ba'i du ba las gzhan pa'i du ba zhes bya bar ni rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang po goms pa las byung ba las de las gzhan pa de las 'byung ba yin pa ni me las byung ba'i du ba las gzhan pa'i du ba zhes bya bar ni rigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: First, arising from cultivation, it is reasonable to say that it arises from that, which is other than that, like smoke arising from fire, which is other than smoke.

original: 'on te rnal 'byor pa'i nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yin yang yon tan rnams 'byung ba yang ji ltar yin /
analyzed: 'on te rnal 'byor pa'i nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'brel pa yin yang yon tan rnams 'byung ba yang ji ltar yin /
translated: But if it is related to attachment and so on, how can qualities arise, because the power of yogis is inconceivable?

original: de lta yin na de dang 'brel pa gzhan yang de'i nus pa nyid las yon tan de rnams su 'gyur la /
analyzed: de lta yin na de dang 'brel pa gzhan yang de'i nus pa nyid las yon tan de rnams su 'gyur la /
translated: If that is so, then other things related to that would be those qualities due to their own power.

original: de la yang 'dod chag sdang bral ba'i bsgom pa bstan pa la dgos pa ci yod snyam du dgongs pas /
analyzed: de la yang 'dod chag sdang bral ba'i bsgom pa bstan pa la dgos pa ci yod snyam du dgongs pas /
translated: What is the purpose of teaching the cultivation free from attachment and aversion in that case?🔽Thinking that, he says,

original: gang gis dbang phyug bsgrub pa dang // zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: gang gis dbang phyug bsgrub pa dang // zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: “By whom is Ishvara accomplished?”

original: 'on te gzhan gyi 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'gal ba las @116a * //
analyzed: 'on te gzhan gyi 'dod chags la sogs pa dang 'gal ba las @116a * //
translated: But if it is related to other attachment and so on,

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'brel pa can gyi yon tan du bya bar mi nus na ni rang la yang de rnams kyis 'gal bar byed pa ji ltar nus snyam du sems pa bzhin du bstan pa ni /🔽'on te de la nus pa de //🔽med na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang 'brel pa can gyi yon tan du bya bar mi nus na ni rang la yang de rnams kyis 'gal bar byed pa ji ltar nus snyam du sems pa bzhin du bstan pa ni / 'on te de la nus pa de // med na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: If they are not able to make the qualities related to the one who is free from attachment, how could they be able to contradict the one who is free from attachment?🔽The response to this is:

original: gzhan yang ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang ste /
translated: If they are not able to do that,

original: rang la yang byed par nus pa ji ltar yin /
analyzed: rang la yang byed par nus pa ji ltar yin /
translated: how could they be able to do that to themselves?🔽Moreover, how could they be able to do that to themselves?

original: de dag tsam ni de'i rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bas de'i skyes bu'i don nyid tshad ma ma yin par bshad nas /
analyzed: de dag tsam ni de'i rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa dang bral bas de'i skyes bu'i don nyid tshad ma ma yin par bshad nas /
translated: Since they are devoid of the perfection of one’s own and others’ aims, it is explained that their being a person’s aim is not a valid means of knowledge.

original: da ni rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa can de lta bu'i dbang phyug la ste /
analyzed: da ni rjes su 'dzin pa'i nus pa can de lta bu'i dbang phyug la ste /
translated: Now, in response to the question, “How could they be able to do that to the almighty one who has the ability to care for others?”🔽the response is:

original: gang la tshad ma med pa de zhes 'bru mang po pa'i bsdu ba'i don du bshad par byed pa ni rjes su 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gang la tshad ma med pa de zhes 'bru mang po pa'i bsdu ba'i don du bshad par byed pa ni rjes su 'dzin pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “That which is devoid of a valid means of knowledge” is explained to be the meaning of the compound.

original: de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par dbye ba ni //
translated: The analysis of that is:

original: 'di yang don yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'di yang don yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: “This is also the meaning” and so on.

original: zhi ba pa dang phyugs bdag la sogs pa'i grub mtha' las /
analyzed: zhi ba pa dang phyugs bdag la sogs pa'i grub mtha' las /
translated: The doctrines of the peace-loving, the cattle-owners, and so on,

original: 'bras bur gyur pa las byed pa po k'a dam pa ni snyan dngags la sogs pa bzhin du go ba yin la /
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa las byed pa po k'a dam pa ni snyan dngags la sogs pa bzhin du go ba yin la /
translated: say that the creator, the supreme being, is understood to be the cause of the effect, like poetry and so on.

original: de yang de ltar go pa ni grub pa'i mthas rjes su 'dzin pa bzhin du dbang phyug la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yang srid pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang de ltar go pa ni grub pa'i mthas rjes su 'dzin pa bzhin du dbang phyug la sogs pa rjes su 'dzin par byed pa yang srid pa yin no //
translated: And it is possible that the understanding of that is the way that the creator, the supreme being, and so on, take care of the world, just as the doctrines take care of the world.

original: gzhan du na 'di nyid ci'i phyir byed pa yin /
analyzed: gzhan du na 'di nyid ci'i phyir byed pa yin /
translated: Otherwise, why would he create this?

original: de ltar gnas pa yin na gang de de bzhin du mi byed pa de la mi nus pa'i phyir zhes go ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar gnas pa yin na gang de de bzhin du mi byed pa de la mi nus pa'i phyir zhes go ba yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: If he were to exist in that way, then it would be understood that he is unable to do what he does, because he does not do it that way.

original: 'on te ma nyes par byas pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'on te ma nyes par byas pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba'o //
translated: But if he is not like that, then why does he create the unrighteous and so on?

original: rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni bshad pa nyid med na'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin par byed pa de ltar ma yin na zhes bya ba ni bshad pa nyid med na'o //
translated: If he does not take care of the world in that way, then there is no explanation.🔽The answer is:

original: lan ni / des bshad rjes su bsgrubs pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: lan ni / des bshad rjes su bsgrubs pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By following his explanation,

original: de'i byed pa yin yang rjes su 'dzin gzhan byed par ci las nges pa yin /
analyzed: de'i byed pa yin yang rjes su 'dzin gzhan byed par ci las nges pa yin /
translated: But how can you be certain that it is not the other way around?

original: srid pa las nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: srid pa las nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is certain that it is the creator of the world,

original: de las bzlog pa nyid du cis mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: de las bzlog pa nyid du cis mi srid pa yin te /
translated: why is it impossible that it is the opposite of that?

original: res 'ga' ni shin du slu ba kho na'i don du de ltar byed pa yin no //
analyzed: res 'ga' ni shin du slu ba kho na'i don du de ltar byed pa yin no //
translated: Sometimes it acts in that way only to deceive.

original: 'on te lung la sogs pa las de go ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on te lung la sogs pa las de go ba yin te /
translated: But if you think that you understand it from the scriptures and so on,

original: rjes su 'dzin pa gzhan du byed par 'dod pas 'di byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pa gzhan du byed par 'dod pas 'di byed pa yin gyi /
translated: and that it acts in that way because it wants to create the world,

original: slu ba'i don du ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: slu ba'i don du ni ma yin no snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: and not for the purpose of deceiving,

original: des bshad ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: des bshad ces bya ba'o //
translated: then that is what is called “its explanation.”

original: rjes su 'dzin pa bzhin byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pa bzhin byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: It is said that it acts like a parent.

original: tshig kyang mngon sum la sogs pa'i rjes su 'dzin pa med na /
analyzed: tshig kyang mngon sum la sogs pa'i rjes su 'dzin pa med na /
translated: But if the word is not a parent of direct perception and so on,🔽then it is not a proof of its existence.

original: de'i grub pa po nyid sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhes lan du brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i grub pa po nyid sgrub par byed pa ma yin zhes lan du brjod pa ni /
translated: If you respond to that by saying,

original: de lta na phan tshun brten par 'gyur @116b zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta na phan tshun brten par 'gyur @116b zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “In that case, there would be mutual dependence,”

original: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
analyzed: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni //
translated: that is clarified in the following:

original: das bshad phyir des lung yin la //
analyzed: das bshad phyir des lung yin la //
