translated: Because it is explained by him, it is scripture.🔽

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is explained by him, therefore it is scripture.

original: rjes su 'dzin pa'i byed pa po nyid kyi tshig tshad ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'dzin pa'i byed pa po nyid kyi tshig tshad ma yin pa ni /
translated: The statement of the one who is the agent of protection is valid cognition,

original: des bshad pa la nges pa can du de byed pa po nyid kyis byas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir nges pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bye ba'i don to //
analyzed: des bshad pa la nges pa can du de byed pa po nyid kyis byas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir nges pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhes bye ba'i don to //
translated: because it is certain that what is explained by him is only done by him, the agent, and not otherwise.

original: de ltar na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na 'bras bu mi dmigs pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the non-apprehension of effect has been taught.

original: rgyu mi dmigs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu mi dmigs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: The non-apprehension of cause is taught:

original: de yi nus pa 'di 'dra ste //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de yi nus pa 'di 'dra ste // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Its power is like this.

original: thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
analyzed: thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo'o //
translated: The essence of being the protector of all and being omniscient.

original: yul dang dus dang rnam pa la nges pa'i ngo bo rgyu rkyen ma yin par ni mi rigs so //
analyzed: yul dang dus dang rnam pa la nges pa'i ngo bo rgyu rkyen ma yin par ni mi rigs so //
translated: It is not reasonable for an essence that is determined in terms of place, time, and aspect to not be a cause and condition.

original: snga ma snga ma'i rgyud du byung ba tsam zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: snga ma snga ma'i rgyud du byung ba tsam zhes bya ba ni snang bzhin pa ma yin pa rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The mere occurrence in the continuum of the former is not the realization of what is not appearing.

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It means that it is too much.

original: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la goms pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba ni kho bo cag gi ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i thabs la goms pa'i rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung ba ni kho bo cag gi ni ma yin te /
translated: The effect arising from the cause of being habituated to the means such as generosity is not ours,🔽because it is causeless.

original: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rgyu med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: The response to that is:

original: de yi thams cad mthong ba dang // rjes su 'dzin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de yi thams cad mthong ba dang // rjes su 'dzin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: “One sees all of that, and it is called ‘grasping.’ ”

original: ji ltar rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu srid pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu mthong ba las 'bras bu srid pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as one sees the effect as possible from the cause,

original: nges pa can me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba las kyang /
analyzed: nges pa can me la sogs pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba las kyang /
translated: in the same way, one sees the nature of fire, etc.,

original: de'i rang bzhin gzhan srid par mthong ba kho na yin snyam du sems pa ni /🔽'dir de lta bu byung ba'i dngos po'i zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin gzhan srid par mthong ba kho na yin snyam du sems pa ni / 'dir de lta bu byung ba'i dngos po'i zhes bya ba'o //
translated: and thinks, “The nature of that is seen as possible in another.”

original: lan ni / gal te rang bzhin mngon sum du //
analyzed: lan ni / gal te rang bzhin mngon sum du //
translated: Here, “the nature of that” is “the nature of the thing that occurs in that way.”

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is:🔽“If the nature is directly perceived,

original: nges pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba las gzhan yang nges pa can gyi rang bzhin tsam gang cung zad ces bya bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: nges pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba las gzhan yang nges pa can gyi rang bzhin tsam gang cung zad ces bya bar 'gyur la /
translated: then from seeing the nature of the ascertained, one sees the nature of the ascertained as just a little bit.

original: de yang thams cad mthong ba dang / rjes su 'dzin pa'i ngo bo dang / cig shos zhes bya bar ci las nges pa yin /
analyzed: de yang thams cad mthong ba dang / rjes su 'dzin pa'i ngo bo dang / cig shos zhes bya bar ci las nges pa yin /
translated: Moreover, what is the basis for the certainty that fire is the nature of that which is seen and that which is held, and that it is different from that?

original: de nges pa yin na 'di la dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa lan yin la /
analyzed: de nges pa yin na 'di la dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa lan yin la /
translated: If there is certainty, then the response is that which begins with “the nature of things themselves.”

original: ma nges pa la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ma nges pa la ni ma yin no //
translated: But if there is no certainty, then it is not.

original: gal te mthong ba'i yul la'ang 'di ji ltar lan yin /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba'i yul la'ang 'di ji ltar lan yin /
translated: If you say that this is the response even in regard to the object that is seen,

original: gal te mthong ba nyid kyis sreg par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba nyid kyis sreg par byed pa yin na /
translated: if it is the case that fire burns by virtue of being seen,

original: 'byung ba nyid kyang mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'byung ba nyid kyang mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then since the elements are also seen,

original: dngos po des kyang sreg par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po des kyang sreg par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: those things would also burn.

original: de'i phyir nam mkha' yang sreg byed 'gyur ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir nam mkha' yang sreg byed 'gyur ba'i phyir /
translated: And because space would also burn,

original: mthong ba nyid ni ma nges pa can yin no //🔽de'i phyir nges pa'i ngo bos sreg byed yin par @117a * //
analyzed: mthong ba nyid ni ma nges pa can yin no // de'i phyir nges pa'i ngo bos sreg byed yin par @117a * //
translated: seeing is not certain.

original: ni rigs la /
analyzed: ni rigs la /
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable that fire burns by virtue of its ascertained nature.

original: de ni mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la yang bye brag med do snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: de ni mthong ba dang ma mthong ba la yang bye brag med do snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But there is no difference between seeing and not seeing it.

original: gal te 'byung ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o //🔽nges pa can ni mthong ba na de lta bu yin no zhes smra bar nus pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'byung ba nyid kyis zhes bya ba'o // nges pa can ni mthong ba na de lta bu yin no zhes smra bar nus pa yin na /
translated: If you say, “It is because of the elements,”🔽then you are certain, and you can say, “It is like this.”

original: mthong bas ji ltar yin lan ni mi mtshungs te /
analyzed: mthong bas ji ltar yin lan ni mi mtshungs te /
translated: But it is not the same to say, “It is like this because it is seen.”

original: me ni mthong ba'i phyir dang / zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: me ni mthong ba'i phyir dang / zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response is, “Because fire is seen.”

original: ma mthong ba las de ltar smra ba yin na ni thal ches par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: ma mthong ba las de ltar smra ba yin na ni thal ches par bstan pa ni /
translated: If you say, “It is like this because it is not seen,” then the absurd consequence is taught:

original: bdag nyid mngon 'dod 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid mngon 'dod 'ga' zhig ces bya ba'o //
translated: “It is like some desire of your own.”

original: ji ltar rtag pa tshad ma yin par tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du /🔽khyed kyis 'dod pa'i mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar rtag pa tshad ma yin par tshad mas rtogs pa ma yin pa de bzhin du / khyed kyis 'dod pa'i mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Just as permanence is not understood to be valid cognition by means of valid cognition,🔽so too, impermanence is not understood to be valid cognition by means of valid cognition.

original: gang gi phyir phan byed ni phan bya slob ma bzhin du mi rtag pa'i phan byar mi 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir phan byed ni phan bya slob ma bzhin du mi rtag pa'i phan byar mi 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: This is because the benefit is not impermanent, like a student who is benefited.

original: gzhan du ni mi rtag pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du ni mi rtag pa nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Otherwise, it would not be logical for it to be impermanent.

original: rtag pa yang ma nyes pa la ltos nas rjes su byed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: rtag pa yang ma nyes pa la ltos nas rjes su byed pa yin na ni /
translated: If permanence is subsequent to the reliance on non-fault,

original: mnyes pas rjes su bya ba dang ma mnyes pas slar gnod par bya ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mnyes pas rjes su bya ba dang ma mnyes pas slar gnod par bya ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that they are pleased and act accordingly, or displeased and act accordingly.

original: 'ba' zhig de ni de yod na phan par byed pa'am /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig de ni de yod na phan par byed pa'am /
translated: If they exist, they are only thought to benefit or harm.🔽If one thinks that,

original: gnod pa byed pa yin snyam du sems pa na /
analyzed: gnod pa byed pa yin snyam du sems pa na /
translated: it is said:

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.

original: mi rtag pa la'ang tshad ma ma med nyid ces gang bstan pa de la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la'ang tshad ma ma med nyid ces gang bstan pa de la /
translated: If one teaches that impermanence is not a valid cognition,

original: min zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
analyzed: min zhes bya ba dang sbyar te /
translated: the word “not” is applied.

original: mi rtag pa yang rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung ba yin na 'u bu cag la sogs pa'i phan pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang rgyu'i dbang gis 'byung ba yin na 'u bu cag la sogs pa'i phan pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If impermanence also arises by the power of a cause, it is a valid cognition for us and so on, because it benefits.

original: mngon sum bzhin du tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽yang na rtag pa tshad ma ma yin te ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mngon sum bzhin du tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // yang na rtag pa tshad ma ma yin te ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is the meaning of the statement.🔽Or, permanence is not a valid cognition because it is not understood.

original: mi rtag pa yang tshad ma ma yin te phan bya ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi rtag pa yang tshad ma ma yin te phan bya ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Impermanence is also not a valid cognition because it does not benefit.

original: 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid ni snga na med pa mngon sum du mthong bar rang tsam rig pas ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu la sogs pa nyid ni snga na med pa mngon sum du mthong bar rang tsam rig pas ma rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The effect and so on are not seen to exist prior to the cause and so on, because one’s mere awareness does not perceive them.

original: 'on te yang /🔽don 'di la lung ni skad cig ma las sam /🔽skad cig ma ma yin pa las kyang tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: 'on te yang / don 'di la lung ni skad cig ma las sam / skad cig ma ma yin pa las kyang tshad ma ma yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: Moreover,

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
translated: in this matter, scripture is not a valid means of knowledge with regard to momentariness or non-momentariness.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is taught:🔽Because it does not benefit in any way.

original: yang na ji ltar rtag pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang na ji ltar rtag pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir /
translated: Or, just as it is not a valid means of knowledge regarding permanence because it is not understood,

original: tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul la tshad mar grub pa yin yang /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa de bzhin du mi rtag pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul la tshad mar grub pa yin yang /
translated: in the same way, impermanence is established as a valid means of knowledge in the system of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: kho bo cag gi tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag gi tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: but it is not a valid means of knowledge for us.

original: phan pa byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phan pa byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not benefit.

original: de ni bla na med pa'i chos ston pa'i sgo nas bdag cag la phan pa byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bla na med pa'i chos ston pa'i sgo nas bdag cag la phan pa byed pa ma yin te /
translated: It does not benefit us through teaching the unsurpassed Dharma,🔽because it only tames one’s own self.

original: rang gis @117b bdag nyid tsam gdul bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
analyzed: rang gis @117b bdag nyid tsam gdul bar byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa ni /
translated: This is taught:

original: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: because it is not an object of benefit for any.🔽This is what is said: “This is not an object of benefit for us, etc.,

original: bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas bdag cag la sogs pa la phan gdags par bya ba 'di la med ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i chos bstan pas bdag cag la sogs pa la phan gdags par bya ba 'di la med ces bya ba ni /
translated: by the teaching of the unsurpassed Dharma.”

original: phan gdags bya ba min pa ste //
analyzed: phan gdags bya ba min pa ste //
translated: It is not an object of benefit.

original: de'i ngo bo ni de nyid de /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo ni de nyid de /
translated: Its nature is just that.

original: de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore,

original: rig byed kyi mtha' rig pa pa rnams dang / ji srid tshol ba la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma yang rigs pa 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin par rig par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rig byed kyi mtha' rig pa pa rnams dang / ji srid tshol ba la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i tshad ma yang rigs pa 'di nyid kyis bsal ba yin par rig par bya ba'o //
translated: it should be understood that the valid cognitions that are accepted by the Vedāntins and the Mīmāṃsakas, etc., are also refuted by this very reasoning.

original: de lta mod kyi re zhig bdag dam pa gcig po ni thams cad shes pa dang byed pa po yin la /
analyzed: de lta mod kyi re zhig bdag dam pa gcig po ni thams cad shes pa dang byed pa po yin la /
translated: However, the one supreme self is the knower and the agent of all.

original: 'u bu cag rnams kyi bdag ni de'i phyogs gcig gi rang bzhin yin la /
analyzed: 'u bu cag rnams kyi bdag ni de'i phyogs gcig gi rang bzhin yin la /
translated: Our self is a part of that.

original: ma rig pa rnam par gcod pas nam mkha' la bum ba la sogs pas rnam par gcod pa bzhin du rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: ma rig pa rnam par gcod pas nam mkha' la bum ba la sogs pas rnam par gcod pa bzhin du rtog pa yin no //
translated: It is conceived by eliminating ignorance, just as a pot, etc., are conceived by eliminating space.

original: de las rnam par gcod pa'i yod pa dang med pa dag gis bcings pa dang / grol ba dang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
analyzed: de las rnam par gcod pa'i yod pa dang med pa dag gis bcings pa dang / grol ba dang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
translated: From that, existence and nonexistence that are mutually exclusive are posited as bondage and liberation, permanence and impermanence, and so on.

original: gnas skabs tha dad pas gnas skabs can du yod pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs tha dad pas gnas skabs can du yod pa'i ngo bo tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: However, the different states do not have different natures that exist in terms of the thing that has the states,

original: thams cad du gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad du gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are all the same in nature.

original: de kho na de nyid yin te /
analyzed: de kho na de nyid yin te /
translated: That is the way things really are.

original: de'i ngo bo 'dzin pa la ma 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo 'dzin pa la ma 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is undeluded with respect to apprehending that nature.

original: bum pa 'dzin pa bzhin du de'i 'dzin pa yang snam bu 'gegs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bum pa 'dzin pa bzhin du de'i 'dzin pa yang snam bu 'gegs pa ma yin te /
translated: Just as the apprehension of a pot is not the apprehension of a cloth,

original: ma 'khrul pa can nyid tshad ma ma yin no //
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa can nyid tshad ma ma yin no //
translated: because it is undeluded, it is a valid cognition.🔽Moreover, it is said:

original: de yang / med pa'i dngos po yod pa min //
analyzed: de yang / med pa'i dngos po yod pa min //
translated: A nonexistent thing does not exist.

original: yod pa'i dngos po med pa min //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: yod pa'i dngos po med pa min // zhes smos te /
translated: An existent thing does not not exist.

original: med pa bum pa la sogs pa'i yod pa ni med de /
analyzed: med pa bum pa la sogs pa'i yod pa ni med de /
translated: A nonexistent thing, such as a pot, does not exist.

original: rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rmi lam bzhin du 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is an error, like a dream.

original: yod pa ste yod pa'i ngo bo med pa ni med de /
analyzed: yod pa ste yod pa'i ngo bo med pa ni med de /
translated: An existent thing, that is, an existent nature, does not not exist.

original: ma 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'di nyid dang cig shos kyi ngo bo nye bar ston pa yin par bstan pa ni /🔽'byung po rnams kyi mtshan mo gang //
analyzed: 'di nyid dang cig shos kyi ngo bo nye bar ston pa yin par bstan pa ni / 'byung po rnams kyi mtshan mo gang //
translated: The teaching that it shows the nature of this and that is:🔽That which is night for creatures

original: de ni legs gdams rab sad yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs gdams rab sad yin te /
translated: is the dawn for those well-instructed.

original: yod ba'i ngo bo la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: yod ba'i ngo bo la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning: the nature of existence.

original: 'byung po rnams kyi rab sad gang //
analyzed: 'byung po rnams kyi rab sad gang //
translated: That which is dawn for creatures

original: de ni thub pas mtshan mor mthong ste /
analyzed: de ni thub pas mtshan mor mthong ste /
translated: is seen as night by the Sage.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i spres pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i dbye ba'i spres pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning: the net of distinctions such as pot, etc.

original: gzhan dag na re bdag dam pa rtag pa las bdag cag la sogs pa'i bdag ni spros pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re bdag dam pa rtag pa las bdag cag la sogs pa'i bdag ni spros pa yin te /
translated: Others say: Our self, etc. are elaborations from the eternal, supreme self.

original: lcags kyi gong bu las 'phros pa @118a * //
analyzed: lcags kyi gong bu las 'phros pa @118a * //
translated: Like an iron ball,

original: bzhin du skye ba yin no //
analyzed: bzhin du skye ba yin no //
translated: they are born.

original: des na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin zhes tshangs pa rig pa po rnams so //
analyzed: des na rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa yin zhes tshangs pa rig pa po rnams so //
translated: Therefore, the categories of eternal, non-eternal, etc. are established. This is the view of the Brahmins who know the Vedas.

original: ngo tsha med ba pa rnams ni srog gcig kho na rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pa 'byung bas dngos po sna tshogs pa rtogs pa gnas skabs can ni /
analyzed: ngo tsha med ba pa rnams ni srog gcig kho na rim pa dang rim pa ma yin pa 'byung bas dngos po sna tshogs pa rtogs pa gnas skabs can ni /
translated: Those who are shameless, however, are not ashamed of anything, so they are not ashamed of the various things that are to be abandoned.

original: khyad par gyi dbye bas 'byed pa na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi dbye bas 'byed pa na /
translated: When they are classified by specific types,

original: rtag pa yang rnam pa 'gas mi rtag pa yang yin zhes rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa yang rnam pa 'gas mi rtag pa yang yin zhes rnam par gzhag par byed pa yin te /
translated: they are posited as permanent and also impermanent in some way.

original: dper na yi ge ga dang a'u dang tsheg drag rnams kyang rang nyid rtag pa dang / rim pa med pa yin yang /
analyzed: dper na yi ge ga dang a'u dang tsheg drag rnams kyang rang nyid rtag pa dang / rim pa med pa yin yang /
translated: For example, the letters ga, au, and the visarga are permanent and not sequential,

original: rkan la sogs pa rnams dang / de la mngon par gsal ba'i skad gdangs rnams kyis mngon par gsal ba yin pa ni rang nyid rtag pa dang rim pas mi rtag pa ni tshad ma yin la /
analyzed: rkan la sogs pa rnams dang / de la mngon par gsal ba'i skad gdangs rnams kyis mngon par gsal ba yin pa ni rang nyid rtag pa dang rim pas mi rtag pa ni tshad ma yin la /
translated: but they are manifested by the palate and so on and the sounds that are manifested by them are impermanent and sequential.🔽This is valid knowledge.

original: gang gi phyir rim pa med na de rnams rjod byed ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rim pa med na de rnams rjod byed ma yin te /
translated: If they were not sequential, they would not be expressive.

original: de la ltos pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: de la ltos pa med pa yin na /
translated: If they did not depend on that,

original: ra sa las ra sa bzhin du byi brag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ra sa las ra sa bzhin du byi brag mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: they would not be known, like rasa from rasa.

original: yi ge kho na rim pa dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge kho na rim pa dang ldan pa yin gyi gzhan du ni ma yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the letters alone are arranged in stages, but that other things are not.🔽

original: de med kyang yi ge ga la sogs pa ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang yi ge ga la sogs pa ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is not so, because the letters ga and so on are recognized even when they are not in sequence.

original: rim pa ni gsal ba'i ngo bo bzhin du de nyid gsal byed kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed par mi nus te /
analyzed: rim pa ni gsal ba'i ngo bo bzhin du de nyid gsal byed kyi rjes su 'brang bar byed par mi nus te /
translated: And the sequence cannot be the cause of recognition, because it is not possible for the sequence to follow the manifestor, as does the nature of the manifestor.

original: de log na ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de log na ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For if the sequence were to cease, the manifestor would cease.

original: 'das pa nyid ni ngo shes pa las yin par mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'das pa nyid ni ngo shes pa las yin par mi rigs so //
translated: And it is not reasonable that the past itself is the cause of recognition.

original: shi ba yang tshogs pa yod na 'gyur ba yin la /
analyzed: shi ba yang tshogs pa yod na 'gyur ba yin la /
translated: And death occurs when the collection is present,

original: mes po la sogs pa la ni tshogs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mes po la sogs pa la ni tshogs pa med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: but the grandfather, etc., are not present in the collection.

original: ma yin te /🔽de nyid la 'chi bas gnod par byas pa'i phyir ngo shes pa las de dang gcig pa nyid du ni /
analyzed: ma yin te / de nyid la 'chi bas gnod par byas pa'i phyir ngo shes pa las de dang gcig pa nyid du ni /
translated: No, because of recognition.🔽The grandfather, etc., are recognized as the same as the one who died, because they are harmed by the same things that harm him.

original: rkan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang ; de dang gcig par byed pa'i don du yang rnam par gnas te /
analyzed: rkan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang ; de dang gcig par byed pa'i don du yang rnam par gnas te /
translated: The collection of palate, etc., and the meaning that makes them one are also established from recognition.

original: de dang don gcig par byed pa la sogs pa'i yul la ngo shes pa'i tha snyad du brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: de dang don gcig par byed pa la sogs pa'i yul la ngo shes pa'i tha snyad du brjod pa yin la /
translated: The term “cognition” is used to refer to the object of such actions.

original: 'di nyid kyis steng g-yogs dang khang khyim yang bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis steng g-yogs dang khang khyim yang bshad pa yin te /
translated: This also explains the roof and the house.

original: zhig pa bzhin du yang dang yang du phub pa'i khang khyim ni /
analyzed: zhig pa bzhin du yang dang yang du phub pa'i khang khyim ni /
translated: The house that is repeatedly built and destroyed

original: byas pa re re zhing gzhan yin yang /
analyzed: byas pa re re zhing gzhan yin yang /
translated: is different with each construction.

original: de tshogs pa gcig pa la sogs pa'i yul du ngo shes pa las gcig par smra ba yin la /
analyzed: de tshogs pa gcig pa la sogs pa'i yul du ngo shes pa las gcig par smra ba yin la /
translated: But because of the recognition of the collection of those parts as the same, it is said to be one.

original: des na 'di ni tha snyad las //
analyzed: des na 'di ni tha snyad las //
translated: Therefore, this is a conventional expression.

original: ther zug min pa'ang rtag par 'gyur //
analyzed: ther zug min pa'ang rtag par 'gyur //
translated: Even though it is impermanent, it is permanent.

original: rim bzhin byed bzhin pa yang gang su yang rung bas byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rim bzhin byed bzhin pa yang gang su yang rung bas byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The action is not performed by anyone at all.

original: 'o na ci @118b zhe na ;
analyzed: 'o na ci @118b zhe na ;
translated: What then?

original: rgan pos ji ltar mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: rgan pos ji ltar mthong ba yin no //
translated: It is as the elder saw it.

original: zhig pa ji ltar byed pa yin 'dra ba'i tshos pa las de yin pa la skyon med do //
analyzed: zhig pa ji ltar byed pa yin 'dra ba'i tshos pa las de yin pa la skyon med do //
translated: How is the destruction the action? There is no fault in saying that it is from the destruction that is similar to it.

original: smra po 'ga' yang rang dbang du //
analyzed: smra po 'ga' yang rang dbang du //
translated: No speaker is independent

original: rim pa byed pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rim pa byed pa ma yin te //
translated: in performing the action in sequence.

original: gzhan gyi ji ltar 'di brjod pa //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ji ltar 'di brjod pa //
translated: How can it be said to be other?🔽

original: de lta nyid du 'di rjod byed //
analyzed: de lta nyid du 'di rjod byed //
translated: But it is just as you say it is.

original: yi ge la yang ngo shes pa ni de dang tshogs pa gcig pa'i yul ma yin nam /
analyzed: yi ge la yang ngo shes pa ni de dang tshogs pa gcig pa'i yul ma yin nam /
translated: But is not the recognition of a letter also based on a single object, namely, the combination of the palate and so on?

original: de dang don gcig par byed pa'i yul la yang ci'i phyir ma yin /
analyzed: de dang don gcig par byed pa'i yul la yang ci'i phyir ma yin /
translated: Why is it not based on the object that is the cause of the single idea?

original: de la rkan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang / de'i don byed pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la rkan la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang / de'i don byed pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not that the combination of the palate and so on and the cause of the single idea do not exist.

original: bden te / gcig pa nyid med pa yin na /
analyzed: bden te / gcig pa nyid med pa yin na /
translated: But if there is no single entity,

original: ngo shes pa ni tshogs pa la sogs pa'i yul dang / rigs la sogs pa'i yul la rnam par gnas pa yin la /
analyzed: ngo shes pa ni tshogs pa la sogs pa'i yul dang / rigs la sogs pa'i yul la rnam par gnas pa yin la /
translated: the recognition is based on the combination and so on, and on the universal and so on.

original: rim pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams la ni gcig pa nyid mi srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rim pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge rnams la ni gcig pa nyid mi srid pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not impossible that the letters, which have a sequential order, are single.

original: tshig gzhan la yang de kho na bzhin du ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshig gzhan la yang de kho na bzhin du ngo shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the recognition is just the same in regard to another word.

original: rim pa la ni de lta bu mi srid pa yin te /🔽gzhan gyis smras pa bdag smra zhes //
analyzed: rim pa la ni de lta bu mi srid pa yin te / gzhan gyis smras pa bdag smra zhes //
translated: But it is impossible in regard to a sequential order.🔽As it is said, “I am speaking,”

original: brjod 'dod 'di 'dra las smra na ;
analyzed: brjod 'dod 'di 'dra las smra na ;
translated: and “He is speaking,”

original: / des na rtag pa nyid du ltung //
analyzed: / des na rtag pa nyid du ltung //
translated: then it follows that the self is permanent.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan ni khyod la med //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan ni khyod la med //
translated: And for another reason, it does not exist.

original: tshogs pa la sogs mtshan ma gzhan ni brtag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: tshogs pa la sogs mtshan ma gzhan ni brtag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: The other characteristics of the collection, etc., are not to be imagined,

original: gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because they are identical.

original: dus kyi chos yin pa'i rim pa la ni yi ge rnams rta'i bang mi la med pa bzhin du phan 'dogs par byed pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: dus kyi chos yin pa'i rim pa la ni yi ge rnams rta'i bang mi la med pa bzhin du phan 'dogs par byed pa med pa yin te /
translated: The order of the phonemes in the temporal order is not helpful, like the speed of a horse is not helpful to a man.

original: gcig la gcig brten pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig la gcig brten pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they are mutually dependent.

original: dus kyi rim pa las de'i rim pa yin pa dang / de las kyang dus kyi rim par 'dod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dus kyi rim pa las de'i rim pa yin pa dang / de las kyang dus kyi rim par 'dod pa ma yin te /
translated: The order of the phonemes is not from the temporal order, nor is the temporal order from the order of the phonemes.

original: dngos rnams kyi rim pa med na dus kyi rim pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: dngos rnams kyi rim pa med na dus kyi rim pa med pa yin te /
translated: If there is no order of the entities, there is no temporal order.

original: rang las de'i rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽des na / rta yi bang bzhin gzhan gyi ni //
analyzed: rang las de'i rim pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro // des na / rta yi bang bzhin gzhan gyi ni //
translated: Because the temporal order is not from itself.🔽Therefore,🔽The other is said to be a part of the phonemes,

original: chos la'ang yan lag nyid du brjod //
analyzed: chos la'ang yan lag nyid du brjod //
translated: like the speed of a horse.

original: ces bya ba 'di yang gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: ces bya ba 'di yang gsal ba yin no //
translated: This is also clear.

original: gzhan gyi chos la yang ni dus kyi chos la yang ngo //
analyzed: gzhan gyi chos la yang ni dus kyi chos la yang ngo //
translated: The other is the temporal order.

original: dngos po gang dag kho na rim pa dang ldan pa 'am /
analyzed: dngos po gang dag kho na rim pa dang ldan pa 'am /
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The present is the time of the action itself.

original: gzhan ni dus yin no //🔽nyin zhag la byas pa dang myur du byas pa zhes bya ba dang / byas pa las gzhan yin par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ni dus yin no // nyin zhag la byas pa dang myur du byas pa zhes bya ba dang / byas pa las gzhan yin par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: The past is the time of the action other than the present.🔽The future is the time of the action other than the present and the past.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: bya ba rigs pa nyid ni myur ba ma yin te /🔽de'i shes pa dang mi mthun ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba rigs pa nyid ni myur ba ma yin te / de'i shes pa dang mi mthun ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: bya ba kha cig nyid la myur ba zhes brjod kyi /🔽ma mthong ba ni brtag bya ma yin te /
analyzed: bya ba kha cig nyid la myur ba zhes brjod kyi / ma mthong ba ni brtag bya ma yin te /
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: bye brag nyid du mi rigs pa'i @119a * //🔽phyir ro // khyad par ma bzung na khyad par can la blo mi skye ste /
analyzed: bye brag nyid du mi rigs pa'i @119a * // phyir ro // khyad par ma bzung na khyad par can la blo mi skye ste /
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: rang gi shes pas gzhan la rgod par byed pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi shes pas gzhan la rgod par byed pa ni khyad par zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.🔽The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: ba zhos tsam du 'dug ces bya ba ni bya ba nyid bya ba gzhan yongs su gcod pa tsam du snang ngo zhes de ltar yang brtag par mi bya'o //
analyzed: ba zhos tsam du 'dug ces bya ba ni bya ba nyid bya ba gzhan yongs su gcod pa tsam du snang ngo zhes de ltar yang brtag par mi bya'o //
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of the Sūtra.

original: de bzhin du gcig dmigs bya yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gcig dmigs bya yin na /
translated: The order of the words is the same as that of

original: gzhan dmigs nas zhig pa ni 'das pa yin la rgyu'i chogs pa can mthong ba las byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa yin zhing /
analyzed: gzhan dmigs nas zhig pa ni 'das pa yin la rgyu'i chogs pa can mthong ba las byung ba ni ma 'ongs pa yin zhing /
translated: But when one observes the collection of causes of the past, it is the future.

original: nye bar dmigs bzhin pa ni da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs bzhin pa ni da ltar ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And when it is observed as present, it is the present.

original: dngos po nyid dus su brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po nyid dus su brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, the entity itself is to be described in terms of time.

original: gzhan khyab bdag rim pa ma yin pa ni 'das pa nyid la sogs pa yin pa mi srid do //
analyzed: gzhan khyab bdag rim pa ma yin pa ni 'das pa nyid la sogs pa yin pa mi srid do //
translated: But it is impossible for the other, the all-pervading Lord, to be past, etc.

original: de'i phyir yi ge rim pa dang ldan pa gsal bzhin pa rnams kho na rjod byed yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir yi ge rim pa dang ldan pa gsal bzhin pa rnams kho na rjod byed yin te /
translated: Therefore, only the manifest letters endowed with order are the expressers.

original: skyes bu skyon can rjes su zhugs pas gzhan du byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: skyes bu skyon can rjes su zhugs pas gzhan du byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it the case that they are made otherwise by the fault-ridden person who follows them,

original: rim pa snga ma snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa snga ma snga ma'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because he follows the former order.

original: 'di yis rtogs par byed bzhin pa'ang //
analyzed: 'di yis rtogs par byed bzhin pa'ang //
translated: And that which is being understood by this🔽is not the expresser of those letters,

original: yi ge de rnams rim pa yi //
analyzed: yi ge de rnams rim pa yi //
translated: because of the disorder of the letters.

original: rtogs byed ma yin 'dra min te //
analyzed: rtogs byed ma yin 'dra min te //
translated: It is not the same,

original: sngar grub yongs su 'dzin phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar grub yongs su 'dzin phyir ro //
translated: because the former is already established and the latter is not.

original: mi rtag pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'i mi rtag pa'i yi ge rnams rjod byed yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i rim pa dang ldan pa'i mi rtag pa'i yi ge rnams rjod byed yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The letters of impermanence, which are endowed with the stages of impermanence, are the means of expression.🔽This is the meaning.

original: dngos po'i bdag nyid thams cad kho na rnam pa 'gas ni 'jig pa yin la /
analyzed: dngos po'i bdag nyid thams cad kho na rnam pa 'gas ni 'jig pa yin la /
translated: Since all the natures of entities are in some way perishable,

original: rnam pa 'gas ni gnas pa yin pa'i phyir gtan zhig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa 'gas ni gnas pa yin pa'i phyir gtan zhig pa ma yin no //
translated: and in some way enduring, they are not utterly destroyed.

original: kha cig tu yod pa 'di ni rtag pa yin par brjod do //
analyzed: kha cig tu yod pa 'di ni rtag pa yin par brjod do //
translated: This existence in some places is called permanent.

original: kha cig tu yod pa 'di ni rtag pa ma yin par brjod do //
analyzed: kha cig tu yod pa 'di ni rtag pa ma yin par brjod do //
translated: This existence in some places is called impermanent.

original: gal te skye ba can yin no //
analyzed: gal te skye ba can yin no //
translated: If it has arising,

original: mi rtag nyid dang 'jig nyid brjod //
analyzed: mi rtag nyid dang 'jig nyid brjod //
translated: impermanence and destruction are expressed.

original: bye brag can du ma grub pas //
analyzed: bye brag can du ma grub pas //
translated: Since it is not established as having distinctions,

original: de phyir 'di las mi mthun 'gyur //
analyzed: de phyir 'di las mi mthun 'gyur //
translated: therefore there is no contradiction in this.

original: 'on te sgra ni snga ma'i gnas skabs las rnam pa gang gis kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te sgra ni snga ma'i gnas skabs las rnam pa gang gis kyang gzhan du 'gyur ba yin na /
translated: If sound is different in any way from its previous state,

original: de las grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: de las grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
translated: then it is established from that,

original: mngon par gsal ba yin pa'i gnas skabs la /
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba yin pa'i gnas skabs la /
translated: in the state of manifestation.

original: mngon par gsal ba'i gnas skabs su rnam pa 'gas mi rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: mngon par gsal ba'i gnas skabs su rnam pa 'gas mi rtag pa nyid du khas blangs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni phyogs gzhan gyi rnam par rtog pa yin par bstan to //
translated: The phrase “because it is sometimes accepted that the aspect is impermanent at the time of manifestation” indicates another interpretation.

original: ji ltar rnam 'gar 'dod yin na //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam 'gar 'dod yin na //
translated: How is it that you accept it in some way?

original: mi rtag pa ni brjod bya nyid //
analyzed: mi rtag pa ni brjod bya nyid //
translated: Impermanence is the very thing that is expressed.

original: mngon par gsal min gnas skabs las //
analyzed: mngon par gsal min gnas skabs las //
translated: It is not impermanent at the time of nonmanifestation,

original: de ni gsal ba'i gnas skabs 'dod //
analyzed: de ni gsal ba'i gnas skabs 'dod //
translated: but it is impermanent at the time of manifestation.

original: de yang @119b gsal ba 'di mthong ba dang brjod par yang bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: de yang @119b gsal ba 'di mthong ba dang brjod par yang bstan pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, it is shown that the manifestation is seen and expressed.

original: de yang don gyis shes ba'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don du rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed cing mi rtag pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba la gnod par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang don gyis shes ba'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyi don du rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed cing mi rtag pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba la gnod par byed pa yin no //
translated: Since that is a part of the understanding of the meaning, it is established as permanent for the benefit of others, and it undermines the assertion of impermanence.

original: mi rtag pa'i phyogs la ni rang gi don du smra ba'i nus pa med de ;
analyzed: mi rtag pa'i phyogs la ni rang gi don du smra ba'i nus pa med de ;
translated: In the position of impermanence, there is no ability to speak for one’s own benefit.

original: 'brel pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas rang gi tshig dang khas blangs pa dang 'gal bar smras pa yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa la ltos pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas rang gi tshig dang khas blangs pa dang 'gal bar smras pa yin no //
translated: Thus, you have spoken words that contradict your own assertions.

original: des na don gyis shes thob phyir //
analyzed: des na don gyis shes thob phyir //
translated: Since the meaning is understood by implication,

original: rtag pas mi rtag la mngon yin //
analyzed: rtag pas mi rtag la mngon yin //
translated: the permanent is manifest to the impermanent.

original: don brjod pa yi shugs kyis ni //
analyzed: don brjod pa yi shugs kyis ni //
translated: By the power of expressing the meaning,

original: khas blangs pa ni sgrub par byed //
analyzed: khas blangs pa ni sgrub par byed //
translated: the assertion is established.

original: dang por khas blangs pa yis ni //
analyzed: dang por khas blangs pa yis ni //
translated: First, by the assertion,

original: mi rtag nyid la gnas par byed //🔽rnam 'jig nyid du sgra gang gis //
analyzed: mi rtag nyid la gnas par byed // rnam 'jig nyid du sgra gang gis //
translated: one abides in impermanence.🔽One must state the proof

original: sgrub par byed pa smra dgos te //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa smra dgos te //
translated: by which the sound is destroyed.

original: yon tan gsum 'di 'am gang zag gam //
analyzed: yon tan gsum 'di 'am gang zag gam //
translated: Are these three qualities, or a person,

original: yang na nam mkha'i yon tan nam //
analyzed: yang na nam mkha'i yon tan nam //
translated: or are they qualities of space?

original: yi ge las gzhan pa'am de dag nyid //
analyzed: yi ge las gzhan pa'am de dag nyid //
translated: Are they different from the letters, or are they the letters themselves?

original: rlung gis dngos sam mi brjod pa'am //
analyzed: rlung gis dngos sam mi brjod pa'am //
translated: Are they expressed by wind, or not expressed?

original: tshig dag bdag nyid gsal byed pa'am /
analyzed: tshig dag bdag nyid gsal byed pa'am /
translated: Are the words themselves the clarifiers,

original: 'dra ba'i dngos las mi ldog pa 'am //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i dngos las mi ldog pa 'am //
translated: or are they not excluded from similar things?

original: zhes gang smras pa de rnams yin na ni bsgrub bya nyid sgrub pa dang / bzhi kho bo lam grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes gang smras pa de rnams yin na ni bsgrub bya nyid sgrub pa dang / bzhi kho bo lam grub pa'i gtan tshigs su 'gyur ro //
translated: If that is what you are saying, then the probandum itself is being proven, and the four positions would be a logical proof for establishing the self.

original: kho bo cag 'dod pa'i sgra'i chos 'di de bzhin du khyed kyis khas blangs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sun 'don byed pa de ni rtsed mo tsam yin te /
analyzed: kho bo cag 'dod pa'i sgra'i chos 'di de bzhin du khyed kyis khas blangs pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sun 'don byed pa de ni rtsed mo tsam yin te /
translated: The refutation that “you are accepting exactly what we are asserting, namely that sound is a quality of space,” and so on, is just a joke.

original: 'jig rten la grags pa'i chos dang / chos can dpe khas blangs pa tsam gyis tha snyad mthun pa ni gzhan du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa'i chos dang / chos can dpe khas blangs pa tsam gyis tha snyad mthun pa ni gzhan du mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the mere acceptance of the subject and example that are known in the world and the mere agreement on the convention are not established elsewhere.

original: gong bu rnams nyid kho na 'jig rten na sgra'i brjod bya yin te /
analyzed: gong bu rnams nyid kho na 'jig rten na sgra'i brjod bya yin te /
translated: Only the aggregates are the object expressed by the word “self” in the world.

original: rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'jug don byed par nus pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa dang ldan pa 'jug don byed par nus pa la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the one who understands is able to engage in the activity of the self.

original: ji ltar de la gnas pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar de la gnas pa yin zhe na /
translated: How is it that he is able to engage in the activity of the self?

original: rtog ge pa rnams dpyod par byed pa yin pas smra ba ni /
analyzed: rtog ge pa rnams dpyod par byed pa yin pas smra ba ni /
translated: The logicians analyze and say:

original: spyi yis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: spyi yis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: “By the universal.”

original: bstan bcos la grags pa'i chos khas blangs pas tha snyad 'ga' yang 'grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bstan bcos la grags pa'i chos khas blangs pas tha snyad 'ga' yang 'grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, by accepting a phenomenon that is renowned in treatises, not even a few conventions are established.

original: de nyid bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bstan pa ni /
translated: To explain just that, he says,

original: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bstan bcos la ltos pa ma yin par khas len par ston par byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rang nyid ces bya ba ni bstan bcos la ltos pa ma yin par khas len par ston par byed pa yin no zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: “itself” shows that it is not accepted in reliance on treatises.

original: de'i phyir gong bu'i sgra'i tshig gis ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni mi rigs te /🔽thams cad kyis go'i sgra cig car brjod pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir gong bu'i sgra'i tshig gis ni brjod par nus pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni mi rigs te / thams cad kyis go'i sgra cig car brjod pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the statement, “It is not possible to express it with the word ‘aggregate,’” is unreasonable.

original: @120a * // ba lang thams cad shes pas rtogs pa'i phyir rnam pa brjod pa nyid yin gyi mi rtag pa brjod pa zhig pa ni /
analyzed: @120a * // ba lang thams cad shes pas rtogs pa'i phyir rnam pa brjod pa nyid yin gyi mi rtag pa brjod pa zhig pa ni /
translated: Since the word “cow” is uttered simultaneously by all, it is the expression of the individual cow that is understood by all.

original: rnam par 'brel par bya bar mi nus te /
analyzed: rnam par 'brel par bya bar mi nus te /
translated: The expression of impermanence is not possible,

original: rnam ba'i bye brag la nges par rtog pa'i dus kyi bar du mi gnas pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam ba'i bye brag la nges par rtog pa'i dus kyi bar du mi gnas pa'i phyir /
translated: because the particular of the class cannot remain until the time of the ascertainment of the individual.🔽The word “cow” is not a universal because it is a word that is applied to many things,

original: sa yi rdzas kyi yod la sogs //
analyzed: sa yi rdzas kyi yod la sogs //
translated: like the words “earth,” “substance,” “existence,” and so on.

original: mjug ma nyid sogs 'dus phyir dang // rab tu sbyor ba mang ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mjug ma nyid sogs 'dus phyir dang // rab tu sbyor ba mang ba'i phyir //
translated: It is not a universal because it is a word that is applied to many things,🔽like the words “earth,” “substance,” “existence,” and so on.

original: ba lang nyid du nges bzung min //🔽'dir mi rtag pa la sgra ni mthong bas zhig pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ba lang nyid du nges bzung min // 'dir mi rtag pa la sgra ni mthong bas zhig pa'i phyir /
translated: It is not ascertained as just an ox.🔽Here, it is understood that sound is not capable of being related to impermanence because it is seen to be destroyed.

original: 'brel par bya bar mi nus zhes bya ba'i rtag pa la nus pa yin no zhes bya bar shes pa yin te /
analyzed: 'brel par bya bar mi nus zhes bya ba'i rtag pa la nus pa yin no zhes bya bar shes pa yin te /
translated: But it is capable of being related to permanence.

original: mig g-yon pas mthong ba bkag pa yin na /
analyzed: mig g-yon pas mthong ba bkag pa yin na /
translated: For example, if seeing with the left eye is negated,

original: mig g-yas pa yin par sgrub par shes pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: mig g-yas pa yin par sgrub par shes pa lta bu'o //
translated: it is understood that it is established as seeing with the right eye.

original: mi rtag pa la ni don dang 'brel pa dang ldan par kha cig tu 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: mi rtag pa la ni don dang 'brel pa dang ldan par kha cig tu 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: With impermanence, there is sometimes a connection with the meaning, but

original: thams cad la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad la ni ma yin no //
translated: not always.

original: des na 'brel par byed pa yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya ba 'di'i don yin gyi ;
analyzed: des na 'brel par byed pa yod par khas blangs pa'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya ba 'di'i don yin gyi ;
translated: Therefore, since the existence of a connection is accepted, this is the meaning of what is called permanence.

original: 'brel pa ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni bcos ma yin pa'i phyir rtag pa ma yin no //
translated: But the connection is not permanent because it is fabricated.

original: des na 'di bstan pa yin no //🔽'brel pa bcos ma nyid yin te //
analyzed: des na 'di bstan pa yin no // 'brel pa bcos ma nyid yin te //
translated: Therefore, this is taught:🔽The connection is fabricated

original: de yi sbyor nyid shes pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de yi sbyor nyid shes pa'i phyir //
translated: because the connection is known to be fabricated.

original: gong bu de gcig la gnas phyir //
analyzed: gong bu de gcig la gnas phyir //
translated: Because it abides in one mass,

original: thams cad du ni 'gro ba min //
analyzed: thams cad du ni 'gro ba min //
translated: it does not go everywhere.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: sbyor ba dman pa spangs nas gzhan du de'i sbyor ba mthong ba'i phyir 'ga' yang don dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs bas 'brel pa med pa kho na yin par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: sbyor ba dman pa spangs nas gzhan du de'i sbyor ba mthong ba'i phyir 'ga' yang don dang ldan pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs bas 'brel pa med pa kho na yin par 'gyur gyi /
translated: For, having abandoned the inferior application, one sees the application of another. Therefore, it is not reasonable to say that no one has a purpose.

original: gong bu gcig la gnas pa nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gong bu gcig la gnas pa nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: The connection is not tenable.

original: yang na ba lang gi sgra'i rjod par byed pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ldog nges pa'i brjod bya nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba can du brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: yang na ba lang gi sgra'i rjod par byed pa nyid kyis rjes su 'gro ldog nges pa'i brjod bya nyid ni mi rtag pa nyid dang 'gal ba can du brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: Or else, the mere expression of the word cow, which is ascertained as occurring when there is going and not occurring when there is no going, is to be expressed as contradictory to impermanence.

original: yan gar go sgra brjod pa nyid //
analyzed: yan gar go sgra brjod pa nyid //
translated: The mere expression of the word cow

original: ring nas rtogs par byed yin la //
analyzed: ring nas rtogs par byed yin la //
translated: is what causes understanding from a distance.

original: de srid bar du bstan pa ni //
analyzed: de srid bar du bstan pa ni //
translated: Until that time, the teaching

original: phyis ni gang gis 'jig 'gyur yin //
analyzed: phyis ni gang gis 'jig 'gyur yin //
translated: would later be destroyed by what?

original: yang rnam pa ni dpag bya nyid yin pas gzhan la sgra gcig pus bstan par bya ba brjod bya yin la /
analyzed: yang rnam pa ni dpag bya nyid yin pas gzhan la sgra gcig pus bstan par bya ba brjod bya yin la /
translated: Moreover, since the aspect is to be inferred, the mere word is to be expressed as the object of teaching to another.

original: de'i rgyu las snga rol du ma rtogs pa'i phyir 'brel pa byed par nus pa ma yin par smra ba ste /
analyzed: de'i rgyu las snga rol du ma rtogs pa'i phyir 'brel pa byed par nus pa ma yin par smra ba ste /
translated: Because it is not realized prior to its cause, it is said that it is not able to make a connection.

original: go'i sgra lan brgyad nyid brjod pa yin zhes zer ba ni grangs med pa'i phyir go'i sgra brgyad ma yin te /
analyzed: go'i sgra lan brgyad nyid brjod pa yin zhes zer ba ni grangs med pa'i phyir go'i sgra brgyad ma yin te /
translated: The statement “The word go is uttered eight times” is not the word go uttered eight times, because it is not a number.

original: gang du lan grangs kyi sgra yin pa der ngo shes pa nges @120b par 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: gang du lan grangs kyi sgra yin pa der ngo shes pa nges @120b par 'byung ba yin te /
translated: Where there is the word “time,” there is recognition, which is ascertained.

original: bya ba'i spyi la'ang de la brten pa la des de nye bar brjod pas ngo shes pa nyid du mtshon pa yin la /
analyzed: bya ba'i spyi la'ang de la brten pa la des de nye bar brjod pas ngo shes pa nyid du mtshon pa yin la /
translated: Also, in the case of the universal of action, it is indicated by the recognition that it is expressed by that which is based on it.

original: ngo shes pa las kyang smra ni rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ngo shes pa las kyang smra ni rtag pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: And from recognition, it is understood that the speaker is permanent.🔽And that is stated:🔽By this application,

original: de yang / sbyor ba 'dis ni ngo shes la //🔽nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin //
analyzed: de yang / sbyor ba 'dis ni ngo shes la // nye bar mtshon par byed pa yin //
translated: Recognition

original: zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smos pa'o //
translated: Is indicated.

original: shin tu 'dra ba'i phyir gzhan nyid du mi rtogs pas /
analyzed: shin tu 'dra ba'i phyir gzhan nyid du mi rtogs pas /
translated: Because of being very similar, it is not understood to be different.

original: de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba'i las bzhin du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba'i las bzhin du 'gyur ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is like the action “That is this.”

original: 'dra ba nyid du ma rtogs pa yin na de'i rgyu mtshan ji ltar yin /
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid du ma rtogs pa yin na de'i rgyu mtshan ji ltar yin /
translated: If it is not understood as being similar, what is the reason for that?

original: 'dra ba nyid du rtogs pa yin pa ni cung zad ma rtogs pa las de nyid 'di zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'di 'khrul pa can yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid du rtogs pa yin pa ni cung zad ma rtogs pa las de nyid 'di zhes bya ba 'byung ba 'di 'khrul pa can yin no //
translated: If it is understood as being similar, then the statement “That is this” is mistaken, because it is not understood at all.

original: rtag tu 'dra ba nyid ces pa //
analyzed: rtag tu 'dra ba nyid ces pa //
translated: It is always understood as being similar,

original: gang la gnas pa'i blor 'gyur te //
analyzed: gang la gnas pa'i blor 'gyur te //
translated: and the mind is fixed on that.

original: de zhes bya bar ngo shes pa //
analyzed: de zhes bya bar ngo shes pa //
translated: The recognition “That is this”🔽is considered to be a mistake.

original: de la 'khrul pa yin par brtag / sna tshogs pa nyid dang / 'dra ba nyid du ma rtogs pa kho na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de la 'khrul pa yin par brtag / sna tshogs pa nyid dang / 'dra ba nyid du ma rtogs pa kho na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t it just the case that the recognition of the diversity and the recognition of the similarity do not occur?🔽That is true, but how can the reason be stated when the recognition occurs?

original: bden te / de rtogs pa yin yang rgyu mtshan brjod par ji ltar 'gyur res 'ga' dmigs pa nyid yin no zhe na /🔽ma yin te /
analyzed: bden te / de rtogs pa yin yang rgyu mtshan brjod par ji ltar 'gyur res 'ga' dmigs pa nyid yin no zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: It is sometimes the case that the recognition occurs.

original: ba lang gi sgra rnams la de lta bu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //🔽'di la rtag tu de nyid ces //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra rnams la de lta bu nyid du ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro // 'di la rtag tu de nyid ces //
translated: That is not so, because the recognition of the sound of the word “cow” does not occur in that way.🔽In this case, if the consciousness always arises

original: rnam shes brtan po skye 'gyur na //
analyzed: rnam shes brtan po skye 'gyur na //
translated: as “That is this,”

original: de tshe yod nyid rtag pa las //
analyzed: de tshe yod nyid rtag pa las //
translated: then existence is permanent.

original: de yis tshad ma nyid bsgrubs 'gyur ;
analyzed: de yis tshad ma nyid bsgrubs 'gyur ;
translated: That establishes the validity of the cognition.

original: / go'i sgral de nyid du shes pa ni 'dra ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nyid du mi shes pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: / go'i sgral de nyid du shes pa ni 'dra ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nyid du mi shes pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t the recognition of the word “cow” as the same just a reason of similarity?

original: las su ni shes pa kho na yin no //
analyzed: las su ni shes pa kho na yin no //
translated: But the object is only the cognition.

original: yul gsal ba tha dad pa las rigs pa tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yul gsal ba tha dad pa las rigs pa tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The object is not different from the different clear cognitions,

original: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that would be absurd.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la gnod pa yod na de'i mtshan nyid kho na sun phyung ba yin gsungs pa ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa la gnod pa yod na de'i mtshan nyid kho na sun phyung ba yin gsungs pa ste /
translated: If there is a fault in having a definition, then the definition itself is refuted.

original: re zhig rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa las ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig rjes su dpag pa la sogs pa las ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ma yin te /
translated: First, recognition is not from inference, etc., because

original: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it has a universal as its object.

original: mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa'i ngo bo gcig pa nyid yul yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa'i ngo bo gcig pa nyid yul yin te /
translated: The object is the same entity as the seen and the appearing,

original: de lta bu'i gcig pa nyid ni 'dir rtag pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i gcig pa nyid ni 'dir rtag pa nyid kyi dbang du byas pa yin no //
translated: and such sameness is in terms of permanence.

original: de yang mngon sum nyid kyi bye brag kho na las sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang mngon sum nyid kyi bye brag kho na las sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that recognition of what was seen previously is due only to a particular kind of perception.

original: de'i bye brag can gyi mngon sum gyi yin gyi yan gar bas ni ma yin no //🔽des na de nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag par 'dod pos bsgrub par bya ba'am /
analyzed: de'i bye brag can gyi mngon sum gyi yin gyi yan gar bas ni ma yin no // des na de nyid rtag pa dang mi rtag par 'dod pos bsgrub par bya ba'am /
translated: It is not due to a perception that is not a particular kind.

original: dgag @121a * //
analyzed: dgag @121a * //
translated: Therefore, it is only that which is accepted as permanent or impermanent that is to be established or refuted.

original: par bya ba yin gyi da tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: par bya ba yin gyi da tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not that which is merely present.

original: ngo shes pa la ma ltos pa'i mngon sum gyis ni ci zhig dgos /
analyzed: ngo shes pa la ma ltos pa'i mngon sum gyis ni ci zhig dgos /
translated: What need is there for a perception that does not depend on recognition?

original: de'i phyir de dag ni mngon sum ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag ni mngon sum ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, these are not perceptions.

original: 'on te nga ni mngon sum dag rtag pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on te nga ni mngon sum dag rtag pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: But if you say that perceptions are only permanent,

original: 'dir 'di'i don yin no //
analyzed: 'dir 'di'i don yin no //
translated: then this is the meaning of that statement.

original: mngon sum gyi bye brag can gyi sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa yin te /🔽bye brag can gyi yul yin pa'i phyir gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum gyi bye brag can gyi sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni rtag pa nyid du sgrub par byed pa yin te / bye brag can gyi yul yin pa'i phyir gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: Recognition of what was seen previously, which is a particular kind of perception, establishes that it is permanent.🔽It is not the other, because it has a particular object.

original: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not a universal, because it has a particular object.

original: mngon sum bkag pa yin yang de'i bye brag can gyi sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni bkag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum bkag pa yin yang de'i bye brag can gyi sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni bkag pa ma yin no //
translated: Although direct perception is refuted, the recognition of what was previously seen, which is a particular kind of direct perception, is not refuted.

original: mngon sum yin pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i las kyi mngon sum pa dang / dbang po'i bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi blo yang mi shes pa ni /
analyzed: mngon sum yin pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i las kyi mngon sum pa dang / dbang po'i bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi blo yang mi shes pa ni /
translated: The direct perception of the action that exists in a substance that is direct perception, and the cognition that has the characteristic of the activity of the sense faculty, are not known.

original: rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin to //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan zin to //
translated: It has been explained by such statements as “It is understood from inference.”

original: dbang po las 'das las gnas gang //
analyzed: dbang po las 'das las gnas gang //
translated: The state of what is beyond the senses

original: de ni mngon sum min zhes brjod //
analyzed: de ni mngon sum min zhes brjod //
translated: is said to be not direct perception.

original: mngon sum min pa'i blo yis ni //
analyzed: mngon sum min pa'i blo yis ni //
translated: The cognition that is not direct perception

original: stong par smra bas nges par brtags //🔽mngon sum pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i las sam /
analyzed: stong par smra bas nges par brtags // mngon sum pa'i rdzas la yod pa'i las sam /
translated: is ascertained by the proponents of emptiness.🔽The action that exists in a substance that is direct perception, or form and so on, like a letter, is made evident by the recognition of what was previously seen by direct perception.

original: gzugs la sogs pa yang yi ge bzhin du mngon sum gyis sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las rtag pa yin par gsal bar byed pa'i chos kyi rjes su byed pa las kyang /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa yang yi ge bzhin du mngon sum gyis sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las rtag pa yin par gsal bar byed pa'i chos kyi rjes su byed pa las kyang /
translated: From the fact that it conforms to the characteristics of a permanent entity,

original: myur ba dang dal ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni myur ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin du yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin can ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na legs par rtogs pa ste /
analyzed: myur ba dang dal ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni myur ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba bzhin du yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin can ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'di kho na legs par rtogs pa ste /
translated: This is just what is well understood.

original: yang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of lightness.

original: gsal ba dang rigs dang de'i byed pa po'i gsal ba dang tha dad pa dang rtag pa nyid rnams kyi so so'i gzhung lugs la sogs pa ni ma mthong ba'i rtog pas nyam thag pa la tshad ma gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba dang rigs dang de'i byed pa po'i gsal ba dang tha dad pa dang rtag pa nyid rnams kyi so so'i gzhung lugs la sogs pa ni ma mthong ba'i rtog pas nyam thag pa la tshad ma gang yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The individual doctrines, etc. of the manifest, the class, the manifest that is different from the maker of that, and permanence, etc. are not any valid means of knowledge for the helpless one who is ignorant.🔽The existence of the manifest

original: mngon sum rdzas la yod rnams kyi //
analyzed: mngon sum rdzas la yod rnams kyi //
translated: is seen in the substance of direct perception.

original: bya ba gang zhig snang gyur pa //
analyzed: bya ba gang zhig snang gyur pa //
translated: Whatever action is seen

original: de rnams yi ge bzhin du ni //
analyzed: de rnams yi ge bzhin du ni //
translated: of those, like the letters,🔽is accepted as permanent

original: ngo shes pa las rtag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: ngo shes pa las rtag nyid 'dod //
translated: from recognition.

original: de yi gsal byed med rnams kyi //
analyzed: de yi gsal byed med rnams kyi //
translated: The nonexistence of the manifest

original: rtag tu yod par ma mthong nyid //
analyzed: rtag tu yod par ma mthong nyid //
translated: is not seen as permanent.

original: de ltar de nyid kyi sgo nas //
analyzed: de ltar de nyid kyi sgo nas //
translated: Thus, by that very door,

original: brjod bya dkar sogs kyang rtag nyid //
analyzed: brjod bya dkar sogs kyang rtag nyid //
translated: the expressed, white, etc. is also permanent.

original: 'dres pa'i dbye ba tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i dbye ba tsam gyis ni //
translated: But by the mere division of the mixed,

original: de la 'ang tha dad blo ru 'gyur //🔽rang gi dngos la de nyid ces //
analyzed: de la 'ang tha dad blo ru 'gyur // rang gi dngos la de nyid ces //
translated: there would be a different cognition of it.🔽How could one understand that

original: rigs su @121b su zhig rtogs byed 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: rigs su @121b su zhig rtogs byed 'gyur // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: the very thing is the same in nature?

original: sgra dang las dang gzugs la sogs pa sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las gcig pa nyid yin du zin kyang /
analyzed: sgra dang las dang gzugs la sogs pa sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las gcig pa nyid yin du zin kyang /
translated: Even though sound, action, form, etc., are the same because of the recognition of what was seen before,

original: blo ni rang rig pa'i ngo bo yin te /
analyzed: blo ni rang rig pa'i ngo bo yin te /
translated: the cognition is the nature of self-awareness.

original: rtogs bya re re zhing tha dad par yang dag par rig bzhin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtogs bya re re zhing tha dad par yang dag par rig bzhin pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it that each object of understanding is correctly cognized as distinct?

original: ji ltar gcig pa nyid du rjod par byed /
analyzed: ji ltar gcig pa nyid du rjod par byed /
translated: How can it be said to be the same?

original: de yang sems can gyi bdag nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: de yang sems can gyi bdag nyid tha mi dad pa'i phyir gcig nyid yin no //
translated: Moreover, it is the same because of the non-difference of the nature of sentient beings.

original: shes bya yod pa dang med pa'i dus rtag tu bye brag med pas /
analyzed: shes bya yod pa dang med pa'i dus rtag tu bye brag med pas /
translated: Since there is no difference between the existence and non-existence of the object of cognition at all times,

original: shes bya'i dus su yang yal bar 'dug pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar de yang dag par rig par rnam par gzhag par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: shes bya'i dus su yang yal bar 'dug pa nyid kyi phyir ji ltar de yang dag par rig par rnam par gzhag par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: it remains as if abandoned even at the time of the object of cognition. How then could it be established as the correct cognition?

original: ji ltar me long la gang dang gang nye bar byas pa de dang de'i gnas skabs la yang snang ba yin pa dang / ji ltar me ni sreg par nus pa can yin yang nye ba'i bsreg bya kho na sreg par byed pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar me long la gang dang gang nye bar byas pa de dang de'i gnas skabs la yang snang ba yin pa dang / ji ltar me ni sreg par nus pa can yin yang nye ba'i bsreg bya kho na sreg par byed pa nyid yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: and just as fire, though capable of burning, burns only what is placed near it, not anything else.

original: ji ltar me ni rang ngo bos //
analyzed: ji ltar me ni rang ngo bos //
translated: Just as fire, by its very nature,

original: rtag tu sreg byed las can ni //
analyzed: rtag tu sreg byed las can ni //
translated: is always capable of burning,

original: nye don bsreg bya sreg byed kyi //
analyzed: nye don bsreg bya sreg byed kyi //
translated: it burns only what is placed near it,

original: gzhan min gzhan gyi dus su 'ang min //🔽ji ltar dang ba'i me long ngam //
analyzed: gzhan min gzhan gyi dus su 'ang min // ji ltar dang ba'i me long ngam //
translated: not the other, nor at another time.🔽Just as a clear mirror

original: ji ltar shel sgong dang ba la //🔽gang dag nye bar gyur pa de'i //
analyzed: ji ltar shel sgong dang ba la // gang dag nye bar gyur pa de'i //
translated: or a clear crystal

original: de yi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin //
analyzed: de yi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin //
translated: reflects the image of whatever is placed in front of it,🔽so it is with the nature of mind.

original: de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yang ma rig pa'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i skyes bu ni shin tu gnyid log pa lta bur 'dug pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du sems kyi rang bzhin yang ma rig pa'i dri mas g-yogs pa'i skyes bu ni shin tu gnyid log pa lta bur 'dug pa yin la /
translated: The person whose mind is covered by the stains of ignorance is like one who is in deep sleep.

original: gang gi tshe de chos dang chos ma yin pas bskul pa'i dbang po la sogs par byed pa'i grong khyer bum pa la sogs pa la nye bar byed pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de chos dang chos ma yin pas bskul pa'i dbang po la sogs par byed pa'i grong khyer bum pa la sogs pa la nye bar byed pa de'i tshe /
translated: When it is activated by virtue and nonvirtue, it causes the faculties and so on to engage in such activities as creating pots and so on.

original: rtogs par byed pa yin la bya ba de nye bar zad na'ang de kho na ltar shin tu gnyid log pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i phyir ;
analyzed: rtogs par byed pa yin la bya ba de nye bar zad na'ang de kho na ltar shin tu gnyid log pa bzhin du 'dug pa'i phyir ;
translated: When the activity is finished, it remains just as it was, like someone who is very sleepy.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i dbang dang nye bar byed pa po'i dbang gis nam zhig 'bras bu mthong ba yin na yang rtag pa'i 'bras bu nyams pa ma yin no //🔽de bzhin rtag tu sems bcas pa'i //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i dbang dang nye bar byed pa po'i dbang gis nam zhig 'bras bu mthong ba yin na yang rtag pa'i 'bras bu nyams pa ma yin no // de bzhin rtag tu sems bcas pa'i //
translated: When the result is seen, it is due to the power of the cooperating conditions and the power of the appropriator. But the permanent result is not impaired.🔽Similarly, the body of embodied beings

original: skyes bu rnams kyi lus gnas pa //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams kyi lus gnas pa //
translated: always abides due to the mind.

original: gzugs sogs byed pas blangs nas ni //
analyzed: gzugs sogs byed pas blangs nas ni //
translated: Form and so on are grasped by the mind

original: 'dzin pa 'di ni blor 'dod do //
analyzed: 'dzin pa 'di ni blor 'dod do //
translated: and this is asserted to be consciousness.

original: de yang 'di ni shes bya gzhan dang gzhan nye bar bzung ba'i dbang gis tha mi dad pa yin na yang tha dad pa bzhin du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di ni shes bya gzhan dang gzhan nye bar bzung ba'i dbang gis tha mi dad pa yin na yang tha dad pa bzhin du snang ba yin te /
translated: Moreover, although it is not different due to apprehending other objects of knowledge, it appears as if it is different.

original: bum pa glang po sogs blo nyid //
analyzed: bum pa glang po sogs blo nyid //
translated: The pot, the elephant, etc. are the mind itself.

original: de tha dad par 'jig rten 'dod //
analyzed: de tha dad par 'jig rten 'dod //
translated: The world believes that they are different.

original: des na de nyid tha dad don //
analyzed: des na de nyid tha dad don //
translated: Therefore, the mind itself is the object that is different.

original: rjes 'brang rnams kyi blor 'dod do //
analyzed: rjes 'brang rnams kyi blor 'dod do //
translated: The followers believe that.

original: @122a * // yul gyi dbye ba yongs su dor nas dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa kho na rtogs par byad na 'byung ba ni de nyid yin no zhes sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin no //
analyzed: @122a * // yul gyi dbye ba yongs su dor nas dag pa'i yang dag par rig pa kho na rtogs par byad na 'byung ba ni de nyid yin no zhes sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa yin no //
translated: If, having abandoned the division of objects, one understands only the pure cognition, then the cognition is that which was seen before, and it is recognized as “that itself.”

original: tha dad don la brten min na //
analyzed: tha dad don la brten min na //
translated: If it is not based on a different object,

original: sngar mthong ngo shes yod ma yin //
analyzed: sngar mthong ngo shes yod ma yin //
translated: the recognition of what was seen before does not exist.

original: bum pa rig pa tha dad pa ma yin pa yang snam bu'i dus su yul ches tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid yin par rtogs par mi byed pa na tha dad par rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: bum pa rig pa tha dad pa ma yin pa yang snam bu'i dus su yul ches tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir de nyid yin par rtogs par mi byed pa na tha dad par rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The cognition of the pot is not different, but at the time of the cloth, it is a very different object, and so it does not cognize “that itself.” It cognizes “different.”

original: de bzhin du don dam pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The ultimate is not like that. This is the meaning.

original: de gang las ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba yin na nye ba ma yin pa yang sna tshogs pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin la ;
analyzed: de gang las ma rig pa'i dri ma dang bral ba yin na nye ba ma yin pa yang sna tshogs pa sna tshogs pa'i ngo bor snang ba yin la ;
translated: If it is free from the stain of ignorance, it is not near, but it is the appearance of the various natures of the various things.

original: des na 'di thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, all this is seen.

original: de'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs pa'i byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: de'i 'dod pa'i dbang gis mngon par 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir sna tshogs pa'i byed pa po yin no //
translated: Since it is the manifestation of the desire for that, it is the various agents.

original: de yod pa dang med pa'i dus dag tu 'di la bye brag med pas nam mkha' bzhin du mi shes pa ni byed pa por mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: de yod pa dang med pa'i dus dag tu 'di la bye brag med pas nam mkha' bzhin du mi shes pa ni byed pa por mi 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Since there is no difference in it at the times of existence and nonexistence, is it not the case that the unknowing one is not the agent, like space?

original: sna tshogs pa kho na rang gi rgyus de lta de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang yin no //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa kho na rang gi rgyus de lta de ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba yang yin no //
translated: It is just the various things that become so and so through their own causes.
