original: smras pa yod pa'i ngo bo rigs pa dang de snang ba ni rmi lam bzhin du mi shes pa ni byed pa por mi 'gyur skye ba snang ba'i bdag nyid gzhan dang gzhan du yang 'dod pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
analyzed: smras pa yod pa'i ngo bo rigs pa dang de snang ba ni rmi lam bzhin du mi shes pa ni byed pa por mi 'gyur skye ba snang ba'i bdag nyid gzhan dang gzhan du yang 'dod pa'i ngo bo ma yin te /
translated: It is said that the nature of existence is reasonable, and the appearance of that is like a dream. The unknowing one is not the agent. The nature of the appearance of birth is not the nature of another and another.

original: srog ni phyir rol gyi rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha dad pa yin yang rig pa'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: srog ni phyir rol gyi rig pa'i bdag nyid kyi tha dad pa yin yang rig pa'i bdag nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Life is external, having a different nature from consciousness, but it is not of the nature of consciousness.

original: shes pa'i ngo bo'i rnam pa ni rtag pa yin yang 'gal ba med pa ni /
analyzed: shes pa'i ngo bo'i rnam pa ni rtag pa yin yang 'gal ba med pa ni /
translated: The form of the nature of consciousness is permanent, but there is no contradiction.

original: mngon par gsal min gnas skabs las //
analyzed: mngon par gsal min gnas skabs las //
translated: It is not manifest, but it is in a state

original: de mngon par gsal bdag nyid 'dod //
analyzed: de mngon par gsal bdag nyid 'dod //
translated: from which it is held to be manifest.

original: ces bya ba'i tshig gis rtag pa dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'i bye brag med pa'i skyon med do //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i tshig gis rtag pa dang cig shos kyi bdag nyid ces bya ba'i bye brag med pa'i skyon med do //
translated: The fault of the absence of the distinction of “permanent” and “having a different nature” is not committed by the words.

original: sgra dang blo la sogs pa yang yod pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: sgra dang blo la sogs pa yang yod pa'i phyir skad cig ma nyid ma yin nam /
translated: But since sound, cognition, and so on exist, they are not momentary.

original: yod pa ni don byed pa'i byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: yod pa ni don byed pa'i byed pa po yin no //
translated: Existence is the agent of the performance of a function.

original: rim dang cig car nyid yod na dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: rim dang cig car nyid yod na dmigs pa yin la /
translated: If sequence and simultaneity exist, they are perceived,

original: de dag gis khyab pa yin pa'i phyir de dag log na ldog pa ni mi rtag pa rnams la yang gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag gis khyab pa yin pa'i phyir de dag log na ldog pa ni mi rtag pa rnams la yang gnas pa yin te /
translated: and since they are pervaded by those, when they are refuted, the refutation is also in the case of impermanent things.

original: rtag pa la rim gyis 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa la rim gyis 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin te /
translated: A permanent thing does not produce an effect in sequence,

original: shin tu ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is utterly independent.

original: lhan cig byed pa nyid shin tu res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid las 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa nyid shin tu res 'ga' ba yin pa'i phyir de nyid las 'bras bur 'gyur ba ni de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the co-operation is very occasional, the effect would be from that itself, because it is similar to that.

original: gzhan gyi tshe de yod @122b kyang ci'i phyir mi 'byung ba yin /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe de yod @122b kyang ci'i phyir mi 'byung ba yin /
translated: But why does it not arise at another time, even though it exists?

original: de lta yin yang de'i dus su snga ma pa'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa bcad pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin yang de'i dus su snga ma pa'i ngo bo skyed par byed pa bcad pa yin no //
translated: Even though that is so, at that time the prior nature is cut off, and it is the producer.

original: bcad pa dang cig shos kyang de bzhin du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bcad pa dang cig shos kyang de bzhin du rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: And the other is understood in the same way as the cut off.

original: ma yin te /🔽bcad pa las cig shos tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma yin te / bcad pa las cig shos tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That is not so,🔽because the other is different from what is cut.

original: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid du de gnas so //
analyzed: byed pa po ma yin pa nyid du de gnas so //
translated: because the other is different from the cut off, it remains as non-producer.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.🔽

original: bcad pa nyid la ma bcad pa yin zhes rtogs pa la skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcad pa nyid la ma bcad pa yin zhes rtogs pa la skyon med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no fault in understanding that the cut off itself is the not cut off.

original: rtogs pa ni brgal zhing brtag par byas pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtogs pa ni brgal zhing brtag par byas pa ma yin te /
translated: The understanding is not to be disputed.

original: mi rtag par gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni mngon sum med pa yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag par gcig pa'i ngo bo nyid la ni mngon sum med pa yin te /
translated: There is no direct perception of the nature of the one impermanent,

original: mthong ba dang rtag pa nyid mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba dang rtag pa nyid mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because seeing and permanence are not mutually exclusive.

original: rtag pa la skad cig gcig la mthong bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin la /
analyzed: rtag pa la skad cig gcig la mthong bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin la /
translated: It is not that the permanent is not seen in a single moment.

original: de tsam mthong bas snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig dag la med pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam mthong bas snga ma dang phyi ma'i skad cig dag la med pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not that it does not exist in the prior and subsequent moments, because it is seen to that extent.

original: spyi la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi la yang de ltar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The same consequence applies to universals.

original: spyi ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag la med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: spyi ni snga ma dang phyi ma dag la med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that universals do not exist in the prior and subsequent moments.

original: 'dir ni spyi gang cung zad kyang //
analyzed: 'dir ni spyi gang cung zad kyang //
translated: Here, any universal whatsoever

original: kun gyis rtag par rtogs par byed //
analyzed: kun gyis rtag par rtogs par byed //
translated: is perceived as permanent by all.

original: mi rtag nyid na gong bu rnams //
analyzed: mi rtag nyid na gong bu rnams //
translated: If impermanence,

original: gang la'ang khyab pa can mi 'gyur //🔽mthong ba tsam mam /
analyzed: gang la'ang khyab pa can mi 'gyur // mthong ba tsam mam /
translated: it would not pervade any of the aggregates.🔽It is not a thing that is merely seen,

original: de tsam las byung ba yang dngos po ma yin te /
analyzed: de tsam las byung ba yang dngos po ma yin te /
translated: or that arises from that alone.

original: de gcig gis mthong ba las dngos po ma yin na gzhan gyis ma mthong ba las dngos po ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de gcig gis mthong ba las dngos po ma yin na gzhan gyis ma mthong ba las dngos po ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not a thing because it is not seen by one, it is not a thing because it is not seen by another.

original: de'i phyir rang gi tshogs pa las byung bar mthong bas snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi tshogs pa las byung bar mthong bas snang ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is an appearance because it is seen to arise from its own collection.

original: de ltar yang mthong ba'i dus kyi nges pa dang ldan par mthong ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang mthong ba'i dus kyi nges pa dang ldan par mthong ba ni tshad ma ma yin te /
translated: Thus, seeing that possesses the ascertainment of the time of seeing is not valid knowledge.

original: nges pa yang sngon po nyid la yin gyi /
analyzed: nges pa yang sngon po nyid la yin gyi /
translated: Ascertainment is with respect to blue itself,

original: skad cig ma nyid la ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la ni ma yin no //
translated: but not with respect to momentariness.

original: gal te sngon po nyid bzhin du de la yang yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te sngon po nyid bzhin du de la yang yin na ni /
translated: If it were with respect to that just as it is with respect to blue,

original: 'khor ba thog ma med pa la skad cig par yang nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba thog ma med pa la skad cig par yang nges pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: then cyclic existence, which is beginningless, would definitely be momentary.

original: de yang ma mthong ba tsam gyis med pa yin par go nas zhig pa yin par brtag par byas pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang ma mthong ba tsam gyis med pa yin par go nas zhig pa yin par brtag par byas pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, it is not that one infers disintegration because one understands that it does not exist due to mere nonseeing.

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du rig pa nyid yin /
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du rig pa nyid yin /
translated: It is that one understands that it is not valid knowledge.

original: med pa yin zhes bya bar go ba yin no //
analyzed: med pa yin zhes bya bar go ba yin no //
translated: One understands that it does not exist.

original: des na de bzhin du mthong ba dang rtag pa nyid 'gal ba med pas de nyid la de nges pa'am mthong ba nyid ni tsha ma yin te /
analyzed: des na de bzhin du mthong ba dang rtag pa nyid 'gal ba med pas de nyid la de nges pa'am mthong ba nyid ni tsha ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, since there is no contradiction between seeing that way and permanence, seeing that itself or ascertaining that itself is not valid knowledge.

original: ma mthong ba la dran pa mi 'gyur pa'i phyir nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba la dran pa mi 'gyur pa'i phyir nges pa med do zhes bya ba ni gzhan gyi 'dod pa'o //
translated: Since memory does not occur with respect to what is not seen, there is no ascertainment. This is the assertion of others.

original: rgyu med par 'jig pa yin na /
analyzed: rgyu med par 'jig pa yin na /
translated: If destruction were causeless,

original: de ma thag kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de ma thag kho nar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: it would occur immediately after the thing comes into existence.

original: de bzhin du snga ma la yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du snga ma la yang 'gyur te /
translated: But the same would be true of the thing itself.

original: @123a * // rgyu med pa nyid kyis rtag tu bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @123a * // rgyu med pa nyid kyis rtag tu bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: And it would follow, absurdly, that the thing would be permanent, because it would be causeless.

original: nges pa yin yang de nyid du rgyu yin pa'i phyir zhig pa ni 'bras bu nyid yin no //
analyzed: nges pa yin yang de nyid du rgyu yin pa'i phyir zhig pa ni 'bras bu nyid yin no //
translated: Even if it were certain that the thing existed, it would still be the cause of its own destruction, because it is the cause of itself.

original: de yod pa yin na yang de'i gnas skabs can nyid dngos po yin pa'am /
analyzed: de yod pa yin na yang de'i gnas skabs can nyid dngos po yin pa'am /
translated: If it existed, it would be a thing that has that state,

original: dngos po med po'i rgyu /
analyzed: dngos po med po'i rgyu /
translated: or it would be the cause of a non-thing.🔽But it is not possible for a thing to be made into a non-thing, and so on.

original: dngos por bya bar nus pa nyid ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan la rang nyid kyis smras pa'i skyon thob pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos por bya bar nus pa nyid ma yin pa la sogs pa gzhan la rang nyid kyis smras pa'i skyon thob pa yin no //
translated: You have incurred the faults that you yourself have charged against others.

original: de ma thag tu zhig par snang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ma thag tu zhig par snang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that destruction appears immediately after the thing.

original: gang gi tshe mthong ba de'i tshe yang rgyu la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir mthar zhig pa mthong ba las snga na yod pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mthong ba de'i tshe yang rgyu la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir mthar zhig pa mthong ba las snga na yod pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
translated: Even when it is seen, it is seen only in dependence on its cause, and so it is not the case that its prior existence is inferred from the later observation of its destruction.

original: de'i tshe de'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe de'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because at that time it would have no cause.

original: zhig pa 'bras bu nyid yin na 'jig pa'i zhig pa las dngos por ldang ba ni zhig pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhig pa 'bras bu nyid yin na 'jig pa'i zhig pa las dngos por ldang ba ni zhig pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If the disintegration were the effect, then the arising of an entity from the disintegration of the disintegration of destruction would be causeless.

original: de ltar byas kyang dngos por byung ba ci dgos she na /
analyzed: de ltar byas kyang dngos por byung ba ci dgos she na /
translated: Even though it is like that, what is the use of the arising of an entity?

original: des na dngos po cung zad kyang byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des na dngos po cung zad kyang byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it does not make even the slightest entity.

original: de'i rgyus dngos po de byas pa yin zhes bya bar gsal ba ni nye bar btags nas dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i rgyus dngos po de byas pa yin zhes bya bar gsal ba ni nye bar btags nas dngos po med pa'i tha snyad du byed pa yin te /
translated: The statement “That entity is made by its cause” is a mere designation, for it is a convention of non-entity.

original: de dag tsam gyis dngos po zhig pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis dngos po zhig pa yin no //
translated: By that alone, the entity is disintegrated.

original: sgra dang blo sogs pa rnams kyi ni de lta bu'i 'jig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang blo sogs pa rnams kyi ni de lta bu'i 'jig pa ma yin te /
translated: Sound, cognition, and so on do not have such a disintegration,

original: yal lag la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yal lag la mi ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they do not depend on branches.

original: snal ma la sogs pa'i yal lag la ltos pa'i rnam bu la sogs pa ni /🔽de'i phan tshun sbrel ba bkrol ba'am /
analyzed: snal ma la sogs pa'i yal lag la ltos pa'i rnam bu la sogs pa ni / de'i phan tshun sbrel ba bkrol ba'am /
translated: Cloth and so on, which depend on branches such as thread,🔽are understood to disintegrate when the mutual connection of those is undone

original: de zhig pas 'jig par 'gyur pa yin par rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de zhig pas 'jig par 'gyur pa yin par rtogs pa yin no //
translated: or when they disintegrate.

original: yan lag gam yan lag can gzhan yang rung ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yan lag gam yan lag can gzhan yang rung ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Nor is there any other part or whole,

original: 'brel par snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel par snang ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of a connection is not perceived.

original: rlung sgra nyid du gyur pa yin no zhes na /
analyzed: rlung sgra nyid du gyur pa yin no zhes na /
translated: If you say that sound is just wind,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: sgra la sogs pa la reg pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dang / 'brel pa mi snang ba yin la /
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa la reg pa la sogs pa'i yan lag dang / 'brel pa mi snang ba yin la /
translated: The connection of sound, etc. with touch, etc. is not perceived.

original: de'i phyir 'di lta bu'i ngo bo gang yin pa ni 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di lta bu'i ngo bo gang yin pa ni 'jig par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, that which has such a nature does not perish,

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is perceived in that way.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa la dmigs bya ma yin pa nyid zhig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa la dmigs bya ma yin pa nyid zhig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the object of the second moment is just the destruction of the first,

original: de'i tshe de yin du zin kyang ci zhig 'ongs nas gang gis snga ma 'jig par 'gyur /
analyzed: de'i tshe de yin du zin kyang ci zhig 'ongs nas gang gis snga ma 'jig par 'gyur /
translated: then even if that were so, what comes to be that which causes the destruction of the former?

original: de lta yin na de ni de la nges pa can yin na /
analyzed: de lta yin na de ni de la nges pa can yin na /
translated: If that were so, then it would be certain that

original: de'i bskyed bya ni dngos po las tha dad pa'am gzhan du ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de'i bskyed bya ni dngos po las tha dad pa'am gzhan du ni mi rigs te /
translated: the product of that would be different from the thing, but it is not logical that it be different,

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no purpose.

original: de'i byed pa la sogs pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur bas 'ga' zhig gis nye bar dmigs pa la yang /
analyzed: de'i byed pa la sogs pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur bas 'ga' zhig gis nye bar dmigs pa la yang /
translated: and the fault of the activity of the sense faculty and so on would follow.

original: @123b gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa'i phyir med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @123b gzhan gyis ma dmigs pa'i phyir med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, because one person perceives it and another does not, it would be nonexistent.

original: dmigs pa thams cad ldog pa'i phyir med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad ldog pa'i phyir med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is nonexistent because all perception has ceased,

original: me yin te /
analyzed: me yin te /
translated: then it is not so,

original: thams cad kyi dmigs pa ldog pa yin zhes bya ba 'di ni go bar dka' ba yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi dmigs pa ldog pa yin zhes bya ba 'di ni go bar dka' ba yin no //
translated: because this statement that all perception has ceased is difficult to understand.

original: gzhan rgyu ma tshang ba med pas rung ba'i mi dmigs pa med pa nyid du shes pa'i 'bras bu can ni cig shos ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni go bla ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan rgyu ma tshang ba med pas rung ba'i mi dmigs pa med pa nyid du shes pa'i 'bras bu can ni cig shos ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni go bla ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the other, which is the result of the knowledge that the nonperception of a suitable object is due to the incompleteness of the other causes, is not so,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then it is not so,

original: de nyid 'di yin no zhes shes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no zhes shes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is known that it is just that.

original: ji lta ba kho na'i sngon po'i zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
analyzed: ji lta ba kho na'i sngon po'i zhes bya ba mngon sum gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
translated: The conceptual cognition that follows perception, such as “This is just blue,”

original: mngon sum nyid yin la 'gal ba med pas tha snyad mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid yin la 'gal ba med pas tha snyad mthun pa yin no //
translated: is perception itself, and because there is no contradiction, it is a conventional cognition.

original: de bzhin du de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba 'di las kyang yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du de nyid 'di yin zhes bya ba 'di las kyang yin no //
translated: Likewise, it is also so of the statement, “This is that very thing.”

original: gzhan du na mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag mi mthun pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan du na mthong ba dang rnam par rtog pa dag mi mthun pa'i phyir /
translated: Otherwise, because of the incompatibility of seeing and conceptual thought,

original: tha snyad med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha snyad med par 'gyur ro //
translated: there would be no conventional usage.

original: sngon po dang rtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang phul du byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po dang rtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa dag la yang phul du byung ba ma yin te /
translated: Also, the conceptual thoughts of “blue” and “permanent” are not distinguished,

original: mthong ba dang bag chags las skyes pa las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba dang bag chags las skyes pa las khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference between that which arises from seeing and that which arises from habitual tendencies.

original: de skad du yang tshad ma'i thu bo mngon sum yod kyang /
analyzed: de skad du yang tshad ma'i thu bo mngon sum yod kyang /
translated: In the same way, even though direct perception is the foremost of the valid cognitions,

original: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes smos pa'o //
analyzed: tshad ma ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba ni ma yin no zhes smos pa'o //
translated: it is not the case that it is not a valid cognition.

original: nges pa las ni mthong ba'i yul yin la /
analyzed: nges pa las ni mthong ba'i yul yin la /
translated: From ascertainment, the object of seeing is ascertained,

original: sngon po bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sngon po bzhin du mi rtag pa nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: but impermanence is not like blue,

original: tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no conventional usage.

original: de bzhin du rtag pa nyid ni ma yin no //🔽de nyid rtogs pa las rjes su dpag pas nges pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de bzhin du rtag pa nyid ni ma yin no // de nyid rtogs pa las rjes su dpag pas nges pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Likewise, permanence is not.🔽If it is said that ascertainment by inference is from the realization of thatness,

original: mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin na /
analyzed: mngon sum dang 'gal ba yin na /
translated: then, because it is in contradiction with direct perception,

original: rjes su dpag pa tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin no //🔽don byed pa po nyid yod pa nyid ni rim dang cig char la mi ltos pas des khyab pa yin nam /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa tshad mar 'gyur ba ma yin no // don byed pa po nyid yod pa nyid ni rim dang cig char la mi ltos pas des khyab pa yin nam /
translated: and inference is not a valid cognition.🔽If the existence of a functioning thing does not depend on sequence or simultaneity, then it is pervaded by that.

original: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid la lan cig kyang de yod na med pa'i phyir rtag pa ni rim pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid la lan cig kyang de yod na med pa'i phyir rtag pa ni rim pa ma yin te /
translated: But if it does depend on them, then it is not permanent, because it does not exist when they do not exist.

original: dus gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang de'i tshe kho na 'byung pas sdod par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus gzhan 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po yang de'i tshe kho na 'byung pas sdod par 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And if a thing that occurs at another time were to exist at that time, it would be contradictory for it to endure, because it would be arising.

original: sdod pa ni rim pa yin no //
analyzed: sdod pa ni rim pa yin no //
translated: Enduring is sequential.

original: rim pa med pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rim pa med pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not nonsequential,

original: sdod par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdod par mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is seen to endure.

original: de nyid dus gzhan la yang yul gzhan bzhin du kun du rgyu ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid dus gzhan la yang yul gzhan bzhin du kun du rgyu ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is sequential, then it would move to another place, just as it does to another time.

original: rang bzhin de ma bor na kun du rgyu ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin de ma bor na kun du rgyu ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: If it does not abandon its intrinsic nature, then it is not called “moving.”

original: gnas skabs tha dad pa la yang gnas skabs can ni mi rgyu ba yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs tha dad pa la yang gnas skabs can ni mi rgyu ba yin te /
translated: Even though there is a difference in states, the thing that has the states does not move,

original: gnas skabs de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is that state.

original: de ma yin pa'i gnas skabs yin na phyogs nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: de ma yin pa'i gnas skabs yin na phyogs nyams pa yin no //
translated: If it were otherwise, the thesis would be contradicted.

original: @124a * // gnas skabs gzhan khas blangs pa la yang skyon de dang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: @124a * // gnas skabs gzhan khas blangs pa la yang skyon de dang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: The same fault would apply to the thesis that the self is a different entity in each moment.

original: shi ba kho na 'byung ba yin pas kun du rgyu ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shi ba kho na 'byung ba yin pas kun du rgyu ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the self is a continuum because it is only the aggregates that die and are reborn,

original: snga ma dran pa med pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyis na phyi ma yang ma yin no //
analyzed: snga ma dran pa med pa'i phyir dang / de nyid kyis na phyi ma yang ma yin no //
translated: we reply that the self cannot be a continuum because it does not remember the former birth and because it is not seen to be born again.

original: gcig po dus gcig gi tshe yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin no ;
analyzed: gcig po dus gcig gi tshe yod pa dang med pa yang ma yin no ;
translated: It cannot be that the self exists and does not exist at the same time.

original: /'chi ba dang skye ba dag skad cig ma nyung zad du gnas pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: /'chi ba dang skye ba dag skad cig ma nyung zad du gnas pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Death and birth do not occur in a very short time,

original: mthong ba rgyun chad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: mthong ba rgyun chad pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is contradictory that what is seen is interrupted.

original: kho bo'i phyogs la snga ma'i shi ba phyi ma nyid yin pa la skyon med do //
analyzed: kho bo'i phyogs la snga ma'i shi ba phyi ma nyid yin pa la skyon med do //
translated: In our system, there is no fault in saying that the self of the previous birth is the same as the self of the later birth.

original: de lta de ltar rtag pa las bzlog pa la rim pa nye bar dmigs pa de dang 'gal ba yin no zhes 'dir gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta de ltar rtag pa las bzlog pa la rim pa nye bar dmigs pa de dang 'gal ba yin no zhes 'dir gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, it is said that the self is not perceived in a sequence that is contrary to permanence.

original: skad cig nyid du mthong ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig nyid du mthong ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not seen to be momentary.

original: des na rim pa dang ldan pa dang yod pa nyid ni bzlog pa dang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: des na rim pa dang ldan pa dang yod pa nyid ni bzlog pa dang 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in the fact that the possession of stages and existence are negated.

original: ldog pa nye bar dmigs pa ni phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa 'joms par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog pa nye bar dmigs pa ni phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa 'joms par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The perception of the negation is not the destroyer of the superimposition of the opposite,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because of contradiction.

original: de nyid nye bar dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: de nyid nye bar dmigs pa yin na /
translated: If it were the perception of that itself,

original: rim pa dang ldan pa dmigs pa la sogs pa nyid dang skad cig pa nyid du 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: rim pa dang ldan pa dmigs pa la sogs pa nyid dang skad cig pa nyid du 'gal ba yin te /
translated: the possession of stages would be contradictory to the perception of momentariness,

original: phyin ci log pas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log pas khyab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the pervasion by the opposite.

original: ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not unestablished,

original: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtogs pas rtag pa nyid bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par rtogs pas rtag pa nyid bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is established by the conceptual thought that follows after seeing, like permanence.

original: de rtogs pas bzlog pa ma rtogs pa yin na 'gal ba yin te /
analyzed: de rtogs pas bzlog pa ma rtogs pa yin na 'gal ba yin te /
translated: If it is the realization of that, the negation is not realized, because of contradiction.

original: gnyi ga'i ngo bor rtogs pa yin na 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i ngo bor rtogs pa yin na 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is the realization of the nature of both, there is no contradiction.

original: blo la mi gnas pa ji ltar 'gal ba can yin zhe na /
analyzed: blo la mi gnas pa ji ltar 'gal ba can yin zhe na /
translated: How can that which does not abide in the mind be contradictory?

original: sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: sgro btags pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault, because it is a superimposition.

original: de lta yin yang dngos su ba'i 'gal ba ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin yang dngos su ba'i 'gal ba ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: But this is not a contradiction in fact.

original: phyin ci log tu rtogs pa dngos su ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log tu rtogs pa dngos su ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the erroneous conception is in fact.

original: de lta yin yang gnod pa can gyi bzhi po dag don gcig pa nyid du rtogs pa'i don nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin yang gnod pa can gyi bzhi po dag don gcig pa nyid du rtogs pa'i don nyid ma yin te /
translated: But even though this is so, the four kinds of invalid cognition are not understood to have the same meaning.

original: thun mongs ba dang cig shos kyi dbye bas yul tha dad pa'i phyir shing ma yin pa dang me ma yin pa bzhin du phyin ci log tu ma grub pa yin yang /
analyzed: thun mongs ba dang cig shos kyi dbye bas yul tha dad pa'i phyir shing ma yin pa dang me ma yin pa bzhin du phyin ci log tu ma grub pa yin yang /
translated: Because they are different objects, distinguished as general and particular, like a non-tree and a non-fire, they are not established as erroneous.

original: ldog par ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ldog par ma nges pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But they are not indeterminate,

original: nye bar dmigs pa yul du rnam par gzhag pas phyin ci log spangs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa yul du rnam par gzhag pas phyin ci log spangs pa'i phyir /
translated: because they are established as objects of perception, and because error is eliminated.

original: dro ba dang dro ba ma yin pa nyid bzhin du 'gal ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dro ba dang dro ba ma yin pa nyid bzhin du 'gal ba grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are established as contradictory, like heat and non-heat.

original: thams cad rig pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo la nges pas rim pa 'dzin pa med pa ni ma @124b yin no //
analyzed: thams cad rig pa rnams kyi rang gi ngo bo la nges pas rim pa 'dzin pa med pa ni ma @124b yin no //
translated: But it is not the case that those who know everything do not apprehend the stages, because they are certain about their own nature.

original: bag chags kyi dbang gis byung bas 'das pa rig pa dran pa'i rnam par rtog pas rig pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bag chags kyi dbang gis byung bas 'das pa rig pa dran pa'i rnam par rtog pas rig pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises from the power of latent impressions, and because it is cognized by the conceptual thought that remembers the past.

original: bag chags kyang da dang 'dra ba'i rnam par rtogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba yin pa ni dgag par bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bag chags kyang da dang 'dra ba'i rnam par rtogs pa gzhan gyis bskyed par bya ba yin pa ni dgag par bya ba ma yin no //
translated: And it is not being denied that latent impressions are produced by other conceptual thoughts that are similar to the present one.

original: rnam par rtog pa yang kha cig ni sngon po'o zhes gzung ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa yang kha cig ni sngon po'o zhes gzung ba'i rjes su 'brangs pa yin la /
translated: And some conceptual thoughts are based on the apprehension of something as blue,

original: kha cig la ni de'i khyad par gyi rim pa'o //
analyzed: kha cig la ni de'i khyad par gyi rim pa'o //
translated: some on the order of its distinctions,

original: kha cig ni de yod na 'byung ba nyid dam /
analyzed: kha cig ni de yod na 'byung ba nyid dam /
translated: some on the mere fact that it exists,

original: 'bras bu dang rgyu zhes bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu dang rgyu zhes bya ba yang ngo //
translated: and some on the relation of cause and effect.

original: rtogs pa de yang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa gzhan shugs kyis rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtogs pa de yang mtshams sbyor bar byed pa gzhan shugs kyis rtogs par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: And that conceptual thought is not understood by implication as the connecting link between the two.

original: bag chags yod na de las bdag gis 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba bzhin du rtag pa srid dam /
analyzed: bag chags yod na de las bdag gis 'di mthong ngo zhes bya ba bzhin du rtag pa srid dam /
translated: If there are latent impressions, it is possible to have the thought “I saw this before,”

original: mi rtag pa srid par rtogs pa ni tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: mi rtag pa srid par rtogs pa ni tshad ma yin te /
translated: and it is possible to have the thought “It is impermanent,” and these thoughts are valid cognitions.

original: rnam pa gsum gzhan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum gzhan dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the three aspects are perceived as other.

original: de lta bur ma mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: de lta bur ma mthong ba yin na /
translated: If one does not see it in this way,

original: dmigs bzhin pa las yod par khas blangs pa dgag par nges par mi nus te /
analyzed: dmigs bzhin pa las yod par khas blangs pa dgag par nges par mi nus te /
translated: one cannot definitely deny the assertion that what is perceived exists,

original: ma bskal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma bskal ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not refuted.

original: de nyid 'di yin zhes bya bas //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin zhes bya bas //
translated: This is not that.

original: 'di'i de nyid dran bya ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'di'i de nyid dran bya ba ma yin /
translated: This is not the recollection of that.

original: dbang po'i stobs bya ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i stobs bya ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the power of the sense faculty,

original: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo yul yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo yul yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because the nature of the entity is the object.

original: de'i thog ma mthong ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: de'i thog ma mthong ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like seeing the beginning of that.

original: de lta yin na de nyid rig pa 'di ni mi slu ba'i bdag nyid can gyi yid kyi yin gyi /
analyzed: de lta yin na de nyid rig pa 'di ni mi slu ba'i bdag nyid can gyi yid kyi yin gyi /
translated: If that is so, this knowledge of that is not the nature of the mind, which is undeceiving.

original: dngos su ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos su ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not direct perception.

original: shes pa snga ma'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: shes pa snga ma'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Because it is not the object of prior cognition,

original: de'i khyad par can rig pa'i shugs kyis don nyid de'i ngo bo yin pa yang rung ba sngar mthong ba ngo shes go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i khyad par can rig pa'i shugs kyis don nyid de'i ngo bo yin pa yang rung ba sngar mthong ba ngo shes go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: or because the object itself is the nature of that, which is known by the power of that, it is recognized as what was seen before.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na gnod pa med pas de ltar rtogs pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin na gnod pa med pas de ltar rtogs pa mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is not the nature of that, then it is not reasonable to understand it in that way, because it is not contradicted.

original: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba dang ldan pa rtogs pa'i don rtogs par byed pa ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las so //
analyzed: dran pa dang nyams su myong ba dang ldan pa rtogs pa'i don rtogs par byed pa ni sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa las so //
translated: The object of understanding is understood through the memory and experience of one who understands, from the recognition of what was seen before.

original: de kho na bzhin du nang gi rtogs pa yang yin no //
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du nang gi rtogs pa yang yin no //
translated: It is also an internal understanding just as it is.

original: sngar rtogs pa dus phyis rtogs pa na de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i dran pas nyams su myong ba'i yul du gyur par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: sngar rtogs pa dus phyis rtogs pa na de nyid 'di yin no zhes bya ba'i dran pas nyams su myong ba'i yul du gyur par nges pa yin no //
translated: When one understands later what was understood before, one ascertains the object of experience through memory, “That is this.”

original: dang po mthong ba bzhin du dngos po tsam ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po ma yin nam /
analyzed: dang po mthong ba bzhin du dngos po tsam ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the mere thing is understood just as it is, as it was seen at first?

original: de 'grub pa ni de las ltos pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: de 'grub pa ni de las ltos pa'i phyir ro snyam du sems pa la /
translated: It is thought that its establishment depends on that.

original: de'i phyir mi rtag na yang ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi rtag na yang ste /
translated: Therefore, even if it is impermanent,

original: yang gi sgras rtag pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang gi sgras rtag pa yang zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The word “also” means “even if it is permanent.”

original: de gnyis ka'i ngo bo yang khas blangs pa yin na ni @125a * //
analyzed: de gnyis ka'i ngo bo yang khas blangs pa yin na ni @125a * //
translated: If the nature of both is accepted,

original: tshad ma ste /
analyzed: tshad ma ste /
translated: There is no valid cognition.

original: 'di'i go byed kyi tshad ma nyid med do //
analyzed: 'di'i go byed kyi tshad ma nyid med do //
translated: There is no valid cognition that would cause one to understand this.

original: ci las shes she na /
analyzed: ci las shes she na /
translated: How is this known?🔽It is said:

original: smras pa / rnam 'gas te /
analyzed: smras pa / rnam 'gas te /
translated: By no means.🔽By what means?

original: rnam pa gang gis kyang /
analyzed: rnam pa gang gis kyang /
translated: By no means.

original: rtag pa la min zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: rtag pa la min zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning is that there is no permanent thing that is the object of a valid cognition.

original: phan gdags par bya ba yod pa min pa ni /🔽snang ba dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis sam /
analyzed: phan gdags par bya ba yod pa min pa ni / snang ba dang 'brel pa can nyid kyis sam /
translated: That which is to be benefited does not exist.

original: de nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul nyid kyis 'di la de bskyed par bya ba de lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid du sgro btags pa'i yul nyid kyis 'di la de bskyed par bya ba de lta bu nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because of the connection with appearance, or because of being the object that is imputed as that, it is to be generated in that way.

original: sgra dang blo la sogs pas rtag pa'i rnam pa 'dzin par snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra dang blo la sogs pas rtag pa'i rnam pa 'dzin par snang ba ma yin te /
translated: Sound, cognition, and so on do not appear to apprehend the aspect of permanence.

original: der snang ba can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: der snang ba can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they do not appear as that.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag la 'bar ba dang / bregs pa'i sgra'i skye ba bzhin du 'dra ba'i yul du rnam par gnas pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag la 'bar ba dang / bregs pa'i sgra'i skye ba bzhin du 'dra ba'i yul du rnam par gnas pa yin te /
translated: Imagination is like the appearance of the sound of burning and cutting in relation to what is seen and what appears. It is established as an object that is similar.

original: de nyid la ni phyin ci log tu 'dzin par mthong pas 'gal pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de nyid la ni phyin ci log tu 'dzin par mthong pas 'gal pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is seen that there is the apprehension of the opposite in relation to that, there is a contradiction.

original: mthun pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //🔽spyi bzhin du de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mthun pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro // spyi bzhin du de ltar 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /
translated: it would follow, absurdly, that it would not be a universal.🔽It is not like a universal because

original: khas blangs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is not accepted to be so.

original: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
analyzed: ba lang ngo zhes bya ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni /
translated: The conceptual thought that thinks “cow”

original: ji ltar gcig de byed pa ma yin par rnam par gcod par byed pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar gcig de byed pa ma yin par rnam par gcod par byed pa'i bdag nyid du rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhan yang yin pa'i phyir /
translated: is understood to be the nature of the exclusion of non-cow, just as the exclusion of non-cow is the nature of the exclusion of cow.

original: de ni de rnams kyi spyi yin par brjod do //
analyzed: de ni de rnams kyi spyi yin par brjod do //
translated: Therefore it is said that that is the universal of those.

original: des ni 'dir spyi gang cung zad kyang rtag par thams cad kyis brtags pa bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni 'dir spyi gang cung zad kyang rtag par thams cad kyis brtags pa bkag pa yin no //
translated: Thus here any sort of universal whatsoever is refuted as being imputed by all.

original: zhig pa bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhig pa bzhin du 'di yang 'gyur ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t this like the case of destruction?

original: zhig pa ni sna ma dang phyi ma yang mi dmigs pa yin yang /
analyzed: zhig pa ni sna ma dang phyi ma yang mi dmigs pa yin yang /
translated: Although the nonapprehension of the prior and subsequent moments of a thing is its destruction,

original: de'i tshe kho na skye dpar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe kho na skye dpar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: at that time it is not being used as an example.

original: skye ba dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'jig pa mthong bas de zhig pa yin na /
analyzed: skye ba dang ldan pa thams cad kyi 'jig pa mthong bas de zhig pa yin na /
translated: This is because the destruction of all that which arises is seen, and if it were destroyed,

original: dngos por ldan bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos por ldan bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: it would follow, absurdly, that it would possess a thing.

original: gang la rgyu yod de 'jig pa'ang //
analyzed: gang la rgyu yod de 'jig pa'ang //
translated: And that which has a cause is seen to perish,

original: myu gu bzhin du mthong ba yin //
analyzed: myu gu bzhin du mthong ba yin //
translated: like a sprout, for example.

original: zhig pa la ni 'jig med pa //
analyzed: zhig pa la ni 'jig med pa //
translated: But that which is destroyed is not destroyed,

original: de phyir byas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de phyir byas pa ma yin no //
translated: therefore it is not a product.

original: byas pa yang rgyu med pa las 'jig pa ma yin par ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: byas pa yang rgyu med pa las 'jig pa ma yin par ni mi rigs te /
translated: And it is not reasonable that a product should perish without a cause,

original: yun ring po ra ma mthong ba rnams kyang yang 'byung bar mthong ba'i dngos po lta bu'o //
analyzed: yun ring po ra ma mthong ba rnams kyang yang 'byung bar mthong ba'i dngos po lta bu'o //
translated: because things that have not been seen for a long time are seen again.

original: srid bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa dag bdag nyid thams cad kyi mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: srid bzhin pa yin pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa dag bdag nyid thams cad kyi mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: And because it exists, it is not the case that existence and nonexistence are the same in every respect.

original: de nyid kyis nam byung ba yang snga na med pa'i 'jig pa yin no zhes na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis nam byung ba yang snga na med pa'i 'jig pa yin no zhes na /
translated: And by that very fact, that which has arisen is not destroyed, because it did not exist previously.

original: de lta yin na byas pa nyid dam cig shos kyang zhig pa nyid du'am /
analyzed: de lta yin na byas pa nyid dam cig shos kyang zhig pa nyid du'am /
translated: If that were so, then that which is a product or the other would be destroyed or

original: gzhan du yang nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du yang nges pa ma yin no //
translated: it would not be ascertained as different.

original: zhig pa'am @125b snga ma med pa'am de med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhig pa'am @125b snga ma med pa'am de med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would arise even if it were destroyed or did not exist previously or did not exist.

original: dngos po nyid kyi bye brag ni 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po nyid kyi bye brag ni 'khrul pa can ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The difference of an entity is not mistaken.

original: de bzhin du dngos po la yang 'khrul par dogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du dngos po la yang 'khrul par dogs pa yin na /
translated: Likewise, if there is doubt about the error in regard to an entity,

original: bye brag gis skyob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bye brag gis skyob pa ma yin no //
translated: then the particular is not the protector.

original: de'i phyir 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa can yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'jig pa'i rgyu med pa can yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is without a cause of destruction.

original: rgyu btsal ma thag nyid du dmigs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: rgyu btsal ma thag nyid du dmigs pa yin gyi /
translated: The cause is perceived immediately after the search,

original: snga ma dang phyi ma ni ma yin pas 'khrul pa'i phyir de'i byas pa nyid dam med pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma ni ma yin pas 'khrul pa'i phyir de'i byas pa nyid dam med pa nyid mi 'grub bo //
translated: but not before or after. Therefore, because of error, its production or non-existence is not established.

original: zhig pa ni gnas skabs las snga ma dang phyi ma yod pa'i gnas skabs ma yin nam /
analyzed: zhig pa ni gnas skabs las snga ma dang phyi ma yod pa'i gnas skabs ma yin nam /
translated: Is not destruction a state that is neither before nor after the state?

original: de'i tshe zhig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe zhig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: At that time, it is not destruction,

original: dngos po dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is incompatible with an entity.

original: de'i tshe kho na 'byung ni ji ltar rgyu med pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe kho na 'byung ni ji ltar rgyu med pa yin te /
translated: If it occurs just at that time, how can it be without a cause?

original: nges pa ni rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir dang / de la rag lus pa ma yin na rgyu la nges par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa ni rgyu la rag las pa'i phyir dang / de la rag lus pa ma yin na rgyu la nges par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the certainty that depends on a cause, and because if it does not depend on that, it is not reasonable to depend on a cause.

original: de yon na 'byung ba'i dngos po'i rgyus ci zhig byas pa yin /
analyzed: de yon na 'byung ba'i dngos po'i rgyus ci zhig byas pa yin /
translated: If it exists, what has been done by the cause of the entity that occurs?

original: gang gis sngar bzhin du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni de dag 'gal ba yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: gang gis sngar bzhin du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba ni de dag 'gal ba yin zhes bya ba ni mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to say that they are contradictory because they do not function in the same way as before.

original: cung zad kyang mi byed pas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: cung zad kyang mi byed pas 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they do not function at all, there is no contradiction.

original: rgyus de'i rang gi ngo bo nyams pa kho na byas pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rgyus de'i rang gi ngo bo nyams pa kho na byas pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the cause merely destroys the entity’s own nature,

original: de yin na yang /
analyzed: de yin na yang /
translated: then even though that is so,

original: dngos po yang rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po yang rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
translated: the entity would still continue to exist.

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it does not continue to exist because of contradiction,

original: cung zad kyang mi byed pas ji ltar 'gal ba yin zhes pa de nyid slar khyod la dri bar bya'o //
analyzed: cung zad kyang mi byed pas ji ltar 'gal ba yin zhes pa de nyid slar khyod la dri bar bya'o //
translated: then we ask you again, how can there be contradiction if there is no function at all?

original: dngos po'i zhig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dngos po'i zhig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the entity is destroyed,

original: de yang bya ba'i rgyu ma yin te dngos po dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang / thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang bya ba'i rgyu ma yin te dngos po dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang / thug pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: then that is not the cause of its function, because it is contradictory to the entity and because there is an infinite regress.

original: de yod na dngos po rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: de yod na dngos po rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa yin te /
translated: If it exists, the entity would not have its own nature,

original: de las cung zad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de las cung zad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: because nothing would arise from it.

original: de yod kyang de dang 'dra ba 'di sngar bzhin du phyis kyang /
analyzed: de yod kyang de dang 'dra ba 'di sngar bzhin du phyis kyang /
translated: But even if it does exist, it would still be the same as before, and

original: don byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa yin te /
analyzed: don byed pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur pa yin te /
translated: it would still follow that it would perform a function later,

original: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there would be no difference.

original: de nyid bye brag yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid bye brag yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the difference itself is the difference,

original: 'di la de yod kyang de ci zhig byas pa yin zhes smras zin to //
analyzed: 'di la de yod kyang de ci zhig byas pa yin zhes smras zin to //
translated: we have already said that even if it exists, what would it do?

original: kho bo'i phyogs la ni de med pa yin la /
analyzed: kho bo'i phyogs la ni de med pa yin la /
translated: In our system, it does not exist,

original: de ni gzhan kho na skyes pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni gzhan kho na skyes pa yin te /
translated: but something else is produced,

original: dus gzhan na yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dus gzhan na yod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: and it does not exist at another time. This is the meaning.

original: de lta yin na mi skye ba de nyid med pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta yin na mi skye ba de nyid med pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then that which is not produced is itself nonexistent.

original: de'i zhig pa la ltos nas /🔽de lta bu'i tha snyad yin par bden mod kyi gzhan skye ba la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i zhig pa la ltos nas / de lta bu'i tha snyad yin par bden mod kyi gzhan skye ba la ni ma yin te /
translated: In dependence on its disintegration,

original: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is true that such a convention exists, but it does not exist in the case of arising from another, because there is no contradiction.

original: de lta mod kyi ma dmigs pa ni med pa ma yin @126a * //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi ma dmigs pa ni med pa ma yin @126a * //
translated: However, nonobservation does not mean nonexistence,

original: te ; yod pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te ; yod pa la yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists in the case of existence.

original: rung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it suitable,🔽because it is not tenable that it is nonexistent.

original: sgrub byed med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgrub byed med pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the nature of a non-existent to be without proof.

original: de'i phyir de lta bu'i dmigs pa yod pa nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir de log pas sdog pa grub pa yin pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa ni med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de lta bu'i dmigs pa yod pa nyid kyis khyab pa'i phyir de log pas sdog pa grub pa yin pa'i phyir ma dmigs pa ni med pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since the existence of such an object is pervaded by its existence, the non-existence of the object is established by the non-existence of that [object], and non-apprehension is not non-existence.

original: gal te dmigs pa med pa bzhin du rung ba'i med pa yang rang las rtogs par cis mi 'dod /
analyzed: gal te dmigs pa med pa bzhin du rung ba'i med pa yang rang las rtogs par cis mi 'dod /
translated: If, like the non-existence of an object, the non-existence of a suitable [object] is also accepted as being understood from itself,

original: de lta bu'i med pa ni ma nges pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta bu'i med pa ni ma nges pa ma yin no //
translated: such non-existence is not uncertain.

original: de lta bu'i rtogs par dka' ba yin no zhe na yang /
analyzed: de lta bu'i rtogs par dka' ba yin no zhe na yang /
translated: Even if it is difficult to understand in that way,

original: dmigs par ji ltar nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs par ji ltar nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: how is it indicated as an object?

original: de'i yang ma rtogs pas ma rtogs pa'i phyir med pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i yang ma rtogs pas ma rtogs pa'i phyir med pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Since it is not understood by that [object], it is not non-existent due to non-understanding.

original: de'i phyir rung ba dang dmigs pa yang ma rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir rung ba dang dmigs pa yang ma rtogs pa ni /
translated: Therefore, the non-understanding of a suitable [object] and an object

original: de ma yin pa rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de ma yin pa rtogs pa yin na /
translated: is the understanding of what is not that [object].

original: gzugs bzhin du brjod pa dang 'dre ba la ltos pa med pa dbang po'i bya ba bskyed pa'i shes pas shes par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: gzugs bzhin du brjod pa dang 'dre ba la ltos pa med pa dbang po'i bya ba bskyed pa'i shes pas shes par byed pa yin no //
translated: Like form, it is cognized by a cognition that generates a sense faculty activity, without depending on contact with expression.

original: de nyid kyis na rang bzhin thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na rang bzhin thams cad dang bral ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not that the nature of the non-existent is devoid of all natures,

original: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mngon sum la sogs pas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du mngon sum la sogs pas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the non-existent is established by direct perception and so on.

original: nus pa thams cad dang bral ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nus pa thams cad dang bral ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it is devoid of all abilities,

original: shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of consciousness.

original: yod pa dang zhig pa dag gi rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin zhes bya ba la sogs par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: yod pa dang zhig pa dag gi rgyu tha dad pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin zhes bya ba la sogs par shes par bya'o //
translated: It is different from the existent and the destroyed, because their causes are different.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It is not so,

original: de la de'i rtogs pa dgag pa'am /
analyzed: de la de'i rtogs pa dgag pa'am /
translated: because the understanding of that is the negation of that,

original: de'i mi skye ba'i ngo bo'am gzhan rtogs pa yang yin zhes bya ba de dag tsam gyi dbye bas yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i mi skye ba'i ngo bo'am gzhan rtogs pa yang yin zhes bya ba de dag tsam gyi dbye bas yod pa yin te /
translated: or the nature of its non-arising, or the understanding of another. Those are the distinctions of existence.

original: de'i bral ba ni de'i ma 'dres pa nyid yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de'i mi skye ba kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bral ba ni de'i ma 'dres pa nyid yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang de'i mi skye ba kho na yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: The absence of that is the non-mixture of that, and so on. That is only the non-arising of that, not another.

original: gzhan shes pa yin na ma rtogs pa po 'ba' zhig ni yod pa ma yin par bstan pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan shes pa yin na ma rtogs pa po 'ba' zhig ni yod pa ma yin par bstan pa yin la /
translated: If it were the understanding of another, it would be taught that only the non-understander exists.

original: de bstan pas yod pa las bzlog pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de bstan pas yod pa las bzlog pa gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: And by teaching that, it is not the case that something other than existence is taught.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gyi mngon sum yin na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gyi mngon sum yin na /
translated: In the same way, if it is a direct perception of the other,

original: de'i tha snyad yin pa'i phyir med pa mngon sum du grub par brjod do //
analyzed: de'i tha snyad yin pa'i phyir med pa mngon sum du grub par brjod do //
translated: it is said that nonexistence is established as a direct perception, because it is the convention of that.

original: ma rtogs pa nyid ma yin par khas blangs na /
analyzed: ma rtogs pa nyid ma yin par khas blangs na /
translated: If it is accepted that it is not non-apprehension,

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i nus pa rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa dang 'gal ba med pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i nus pa rtogs pa po'i rtogs pa dang 'gal ba med pa yin te /
translated: then there is no contradiction with the apprehension of the apprehender of the capacity that is dissimilar to that.

original: de lta bu'i rtogs pas rtogs bya rtogs pa nyid ni de'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i rtogs pas rtogs bya rtogs pa nyid ni de'i tha snyad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the cause of the convention of such an apprehension is the apprehension of the object of that apprehension.

original: dmigs su rung ba ma rtogs na /
analyzed: dmigs su rung ba ma rtogs na /
translated: If the suitable object is not apprehended,

original: rgyu gzhan tshogs pa yin na yang med pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan tshogs pa yin na yang med pa yin par bstan pa yin no //
translated: even if the assembly of other causes is present, it is taught that it is nonexistent.

original: dmus long gnyis tha snyad 'dogs pa ni sngon po la @126b sogs pa la de yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dmus long gnyis tha snyad 'dogs pa ni sngon po la @126b sogs pa la de yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The designation of the two blind people is not present in blue, etc.

original: de bzhin du 'jig pa la rgyu med pa nyid du smra ba pos ma rtogs pa tsam du bstan pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'jig pa la rgyu med pa nyid du smra ba pos ma rtogs pa tsam du bstan pa yin gyi /
translated: In the same way, it is taught that the non-apprehension of the non-existence of a cause in destruction is mere non-apprehension,

original: tha snyad du yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad du yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but it is not conventionally existent.

original: des na de bzhin du mthong ba ni sgra la'am /
analyzed: des na de bzhin du mthong ba ni sgra la'am /
translated: Therefore, seeing in that way is seeing sound.🔽

original: blo la snga ma dang phyi ma'i de'am de la rung ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: blo la snga ma dang phyi ma'i de'am de la rung ba'i rang bzhin rtogs par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, seeing in that way does not cause one to understand the nature of sound or the mind as being either the same or different.

original: sngar med pa'i byas pa nyid phyis yod pa'i ngo bo ni mi rtag pa yin zhes de dag gi 'brel pa nges pa yin te /
analyzed: sngar med pa'i byas pa nyid phyis yod pa'i ngo bo ni mi rtag pa yin zhes de dag gi 'brel pa nges pa yin te /
translated: The relation between the two is ascertained as follows: The impermanent is the nature of the produced that did not exist previously but exists later.

original: snga na med pa la sogs pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snga na med pa la sogs pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because there is no other alternative to nonexistence prior to production.

original: de yang skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos can gyi dngos po nyid ni 'jig pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de yang gzhan las rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni zhig pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang skad cig mar gnas pa'i chos can gyi dngos po nyid ni 'jig pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de yang gzhan las rang bzhin gyis mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni zhig pa yin gyi /
translated: Moreover, it is said that the nature of a thing that endures for an instant is to perish, and that perishing is characterized by the nonarising of that thing from another.

original: rang bzhin yongs su 'dor ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin yongs su 'dor ba'i mtshan nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not characterized by the abandonment of its intrinsic nature.

original: rang bzhin gyis zums  pa dang / bsdus pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / mi 'dzin pa rnams ni don tha dad pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis zums  pa dang / bsdus pa dang / ma rtogs pa dang / mi 'dzin pa rnams ni don tha dad pa ma yin no //
translated: The terms “contraction,” “aggregation,” “nonrealization,” and “nonapprehension” are not synonymous with “difference.”

original: gnyid stug pos non pa la sogs pa'i ma rtogs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gnyid stug pos non pa la sogs pa'i ma rtogs pa ni med pa'i tha snyad sgrub par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The non-apprehension of something, such as the presence of deep sleep, does not establish the convention of non-existence,

original: rang gi ngo bo nye bar bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni de sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nye bar bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ni de sgrub par byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the nature of the thing itself is withdrawn, and that establishes its existence.

original: rgyu gzhan tshang ba yin na rung ba'i ma rtogs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan tshang ba yin na rung ba'i ma rtogs pa nyid kyi 'bras bu ni /
translated: The result of the non-apprehension of something suitable when the other causes are present

original: med pa nyid kyi shes pa yin gyi /
analyzed: med pa nyid kyi shes pa yin gyi /
translated: is the cognition of non-existence,

original: gzhan gyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir bye brag tu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni ma yin pa'i phyir bye brag tu bstan pa yin no //
translated: not of anything else. Therefore, it is specified.

original: khyab byed log pas khyab bya ldog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyab byed log pas khyab bya ldog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The absence of the pervaded is not the absence of the pervader.

original: de bzhin du tha snyad ni shes pa la yod pa yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du tha snyad ni shes pa la yod pa yin la /
translated: Similarly, the convention exists in cognition.

original: khyad par can du ma rtogs pa ni med pa'i blo sgrub par byed pa yin par gcig dmigs pa nyams su myong ba la sogs pa zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: khyad par can du ma rtogs pa ni med pa'i blo sgrub par byed pa yin par gcig dmigs pa nyams su myong ba la sogs pa zhes bya bas bstan pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the qualified establishes the cognition of non-existence. This is shown by the phrase the experience of the apprehension of one thing, etc.

original: 'di ngas ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba skyes bu'i mchog gi tshig la yang shes pa kho na bzhin du 'di yang de lta bu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin gyi de log pas ni ma yin no //🔽des na de ltar snga ma nyid la sogs pa la 'di 'am /🔽de 'dir rang bzhin nye bar bsdus pa las sam /
analyzed: 'di ngas ma mthong ngo zhes bya ba skyes bu'i mchog gi tshig la yang shes pa kho na bzhin du 'di yang de lta bu yin no snyam du dgongs pa yin gyi de log pas ni ma yin no // des na de ltar snga ma nyid la sogs pa la 'di 'am / de 'dir rang bzhin nye bar bsdus pa las sam /
translated: The statement I do not see this is the statement of a supreme being, and it is the thought that just as I know this, so it is for others, but it is not the thought that it is not so for others.

original: de las bzlog pa'i rang bzhin rnams la ni skad cig ma ma yin pa med pa yin zhes smras pa yin no //🔽des na / skad cig min la med de rnams //🔽rim dang rim min 'gal phyir ro //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa'i rang bzhin rnams la ni skad cig ma ma yin pa med pa yin zhes smras pa yin no // des na / skad cig min la med de rnams // rim dang rim min 'gal phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is said that in the same way, in the case of the prior entity and so on, or in the case of the opposite of that, there is no nonmomentariness.

original: zhes bya ba yang legs par gsungs pa yin no //🔽des na sngon po ni de med pa rnam par gcod par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i tshig gi rang bzhin gyi 'dus bsgrub par byed @127a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang legs par gsungs pa yin no // des na sngon po ni de med pa rnam par gcod par byed pa yin zhes bya ba'i tshig gi rang bzhin gyi 'dus bsgrub par byed @127a * //
translated: Thus, the statement In the case of the nonmomentary, there is no succession and no simultaneity, is also well stated.

original: pa yin gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa yin gyi gzhan la ni ma yin no zhes blta bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the statement blue excludes the absence of blue is a natural syllogistic proof, but it is not a syllogistic proof based on another's assertion.

original: de nyid kyis na mngon sum gnod pa can yin par bstan pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mngon sum gnod pa can yin par bstan pas rjes su 'gro ba la sogs pa ma grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since it is shown that perception is not contradicted, the reason is not unestablished.

original: rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa bzhin du skad cig ma yin pa'i sgra yang rang gi nye bar len pa las skye ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa bzhin du skad cig ma yin pa'i sgra yang rang gi nye bar len pa las skye ba ma yin nam /
translated: Is sound, which is momentary like a root, water, etc., not produced from its own material cause?

original: de'i bya ba las skyes ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i bya ba las skyes ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not produced from the activity of that.

original: nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: nye bar dmigs pa'i rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: The cause of perception is also twofold:🔽The sense faculties, etc., and sound, etc.

original: dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyang sgra rnams kyang rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa la /🔽dbang po dang sa la sogs pa'i sgrib g-yogs med pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa rnams kyang sgra rnams kyang rtsa ba dang chu la sogs pa la / dbang po dang sa la sogs pa'i sgrib g-yogs med pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Just as the absence of obstruction by the sense faculties, earth, etc., to roots, water, etc.,

original: de dag tsam yin gyi de'i bya ba'i bskyed bya ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de dag tsam yin gyi de'i bya ba'i bskyed bya ni ma yin te /
translated: is merely that, and not the product of the activity of that,

original: rang gi nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skyes bu'i bya ba 'ba' zhig rgyu mtshan tsam yin no //
analyzed: rang gi nye bar len pa las byung ba'i skyes bu'i bya ba 'ba' zhig rgyu mtshan tsam yin no //
translated: the mere presence of the sense faculties, etc., is merely the reason for the production of sound, etc., from their own material causes.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.

original: de'i bya bas gsal byar ni //🔽byas pa'am rtsa ba chu sogs kyi //
analyzed: de'i bya bas gsal byar ni //🔽byas pa'am rtsa ba chu sogs kyi //
translated: It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity of that.🔽It is not produced from the activity

original: gsal byas byas pa nyid kyang rung //
analyzed: gsal byas byas pa nyid kyang rung //
translated: Or, it is the one that is illuminated.

original: de rnams brkos sogs kyis bskyed min //
analyzed: de rnams brkos sogs kyis bskyed min //
translated: They are not produced by carving, etc.

original: bud shing span spun la sogs pa'i rtse mthong bas rtsa ba la sogs pa yod pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa /
analyzed: bud shing span spun la sogs pa'i rtse mthong bas rtsa ba la sogs pa yod pa nyid du rjes su dpag pa /
translated: The root, etc., of a bundle of sticks, etc., is inferred to exist because the top, etc., is seen.

original: skyes bu'i bya bas gsal bar byed pa yin par brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: skyes bu'i bya bas gsal bar byed pa yin par brjod pa yin la /
translated: It is said that the person’s action illuminates it.

original: sgra ni snga na yod pa nyid du dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sgra ni snga na yod pa nyid du dpag par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: But sound is not to be inferred to exist previously,

original: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag kho na'i gcig pa nyid du yin gyi /
analyzed: sngar mthong ba ngo shes pa ni mthong ba dang snang bzhin pa dag kho na'i gcig pa nyid du yin gyi /
translated: because recognition of what was seen previously is only the sameness of what is seen and what is presently appearing.

original: de'i tshe yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not exist at that time.

original: de'i tshe yod pa ma yin na gcig pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe yod pa ma yin na gcig pa nyid du yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not exist at that time, it is not the same.

original: zhe na / gcig pa nyid ni 'dra ba nyid kyis kyang yin pa'i phyir don gyis go ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: zhe na / gcig pa nyid ni 'dra ba nyid kyis kyang yin pa'i phyir don gyis go ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar 'dod pa'o //
translated: But because sameness is also similarity, it is accepted that the meaning is not understood.

original: snga na yod na brtsams ma thag / byung ba'i shes pa nges mi 'byung //
analyzed: snga na yod na brtsams ma thag / byung ba'i shes pa nges mi 'byung //
translated: If it existed previously, the cognition that arises immediately after the composition would not definitely arise.

original: zhes bya ba yang ngo //
analyzed: zhes bya ba yang ngo //
translated: This is also the case.

original: de nyid ni rtag par rung ba med na rgyu mi dmigs pa yin te /🔽thog med bag chags las byung ba'i /
analyzed: de nyid ni rtag par rung ba med na rgyu mi dmigs pa yin te / thog med bag chags las byung ba'i /
translated: If that is not possible, then the non-observation of a cause is the reason.🔽The subject and the predicate are established by conceptual thought that arises from beginningless latent potentialities.

original: rnam par rtog pas yongs bsgrubs pa ni chos dang chos can te phyin ci log tu rtogs pa de dgag par rtogs pa ni 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas yongs bsgrubs pa ni chos dang chos can te phyin ci log tu rtogs pa de dgag par rtogs pa ni 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The purpose of the refutation of the misconception is the result.

original: ma grub pa nyid la sogs par sma ba ni 'brel pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: ma grub pa nyid la sogs par sma ba ni 'brel pa can ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that the reason is not established is not relevant.

original: 'ba' zhig po yod kyang ma mthong ba ni yul ma 'ongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig po yod kyang ma mthong ba ni yul ma 'ongs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even if the reason is established, it is not seen because the object is future.

original: de'i phyir rang nyid las phyis gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba ma grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang nyid las phyis gnas pa ma yin zhes bya ba ma grub pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that the reason is not established, “It does not endure later from itself,” is not correct.

original: yang na rtag pa ni dbang po bzhin du rung ba nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: yang na rtag pa ni dbang po bzhin du rung ba nyid ma yin te /
translated: Or, the permanent is not suitable as a cause, like a sense faculty.

original: dbang po @127b 'ba' zhig ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po @127b 'ba' zhig ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin te /
translated: Only a sense faculty is the object of inference, not the other.

original: khas blangs pa tsam du grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas blangs pa tsam du grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is established by mere assertion.

original: 'gro ba dang 'bras bu 'dis kyang rgyur gyur ba 'phangs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la /🔽rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'bras bu 'dis kyang rgyur gyur ba 'phangs pa yin no snyam du sems pa la / rnam 'gas phan gdags bya min phyir //
translated: One might think that the cause is projected by this effect and going.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Because it is not to be benefited in any way.

original: dbang po'i nus pa ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bus rim pa can nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin la rtag pa ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i nus pa ni rim pa dang ldan pa'i 'bras bus rim pa can nyid du rtogs par byed pa yin la rtag pa ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: The capacity of the sense faculty is understood to be sequential because of the sequential effect, but not so for the permanent.

original: rim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rim pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no sequence.

original: gcig tu nye bar bsdus pa gzhan las skyes pa'i ngo bo ni gzhan la 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig tu nye bar bsdus pa gzhan las skyes pa'i ngo bo ni gzhan la 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The nature that arises from the collection of one thing is not different from the other.

original: rnam 'gas kyang rim pa med pa nyid kyis bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang ; phan gdags pa ni rnam par bsgyur ba tsam nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam 'gas kyang rim pa med pa nyid kyis bsgyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang ; phan gdags pa ni rnam par bsgyur ba tsam nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not transformed by any sequence, and because the benefit is merely indicated by the transformation.

original: 'on te rtogs pa ni rim pa med pa yin yang lhan cig byed pa'i rigs las rim gyis bya ba byed pa ni mar me lta bu ste /
