analyzed: 'on te rtogs pa ni rim pa med pa yin yang lhan cig byed pa'i rigs las rim gyis bya ba byed pa ni mar me lta bu ste /
translated: Even though the understanding is not sequential, the action is performed sequentially from the type of co-originator, like a lamp.

original: mar me ni ji ltar gcig nyid kyang lhan cig byed pa'i dbye ba las rnam par shes pa dang / sdod bu'i 'gyur ba dang / 'bar ba'i rgyun phyi ma rnams kyi byad pa yin la /
analyzed: mar me ni ji ltar gcig nyid kyang lhan cig byed pa'i dbye ba las rnam par shes pa dang / sdod bu'i 'gyur ba dang / 'bar ba'i rgyun phyi ma rnams kyi byad pa yin la /
translated: The lamp is a single entity, but it is the cause of the arising of the consciousness, the change in the wick, and the continuation of the flame, due to the division of its simultaneous effects.

original: de tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de tha dad pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not different.

original: dus dang ngo bo dang yul rnams tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa nyid du tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus dang ngo bo dang yul rnams tha mi dad pas tha mi dad pa nyid du tshad mas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is established by valid cognition that it is not different, because the time, nature, and place are not different.

original: gcig nyid nus pa'i bye brag gis de rnams skyed par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig nyid nus pa'i bye brag gis de rnams skyed par byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it produces them by the specification of its singularity.

original: so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'brel pa med na /
analyzed: so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'brel pa med na /
translated: If there is no connection with a nature that is individually ascertained,

original: de rnams kyi thams cad du skye ba sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi thams cad du skye ba sngar ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then it would be seen that they arise everywhere, as was not previously seen.

original: rang bzhin gang gis sdod bu'i 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa de kho nas 'bar ba dang / nye bar dmigs dag gis yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gang gis sdod bu'i 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa de kho nas 'bar ba dang / nye bar dmigs dag gis yang ma yin te /
translated: It is not that by the very nature that is the cause of the change in the wick, it is the cause of the arising of the flame and the burning of the wick,

original: sdod bu'i 'gyur ba bzhin du de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdod bu'i 'gyur ba bzhin du de dag kyang de'i rang bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it follows that they would have the same nature as the change in the wick.

original: lhan cig pa nyid kho na rjes su 'gro ldog dag gis thams cad du rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: lhan cig pa nyid kho na rjes su 'gro ldog dag gis thams cad du rgyu nyid du rtogs pa yin gyi /
translated: It is only by concomitance and counter-concomitance that we understand the causal relation in all cases.

original: gcig gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig gi ngo bo ni ma yin te /
translated: [The causal relation is not the same as the relation of identity.]

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin tha dad pa med pa yin na /
translated: If the nature of the cause is not different,

original: 'bras bu tha dad pa glo bur pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha dad pa glo bur pa can nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then the difference of the effect would be adventitious.

original: de lta yin na sna tshogs pa'i tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid la rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na sna tshogs pa'i tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid la rgyu med par 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, the various different natures would be without a cause.

original: lhan cig byed pa de rnams kyis 'di la cung zad kyang byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa de rnams kyis 'di la cung zad kyang byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Those co-operating factors do not do anything to it at all,

original: de rnams kyi phul du byung ba'i bye brag tu byas par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi phul du byung ba'i bye brag tu byas par ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their special contribution is not perceived.🔽It would follow that the field, etc. would be like the seed.

original: zhing la sogs pa rnams sa bon la sdod pa bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro //🔽de dang ldan pa ma tshad ba @128a * //🔽'ba' zhig ni ma tshang ba med pas gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhing la sogs pa rnams sa bon la sdod pa bzhin du thal bar 'gyur ro // de dang ldan pa ma tshad ba @128a * // 'ba' zhig ni ma tshang ba med pas gsal ba yin te /
translated: The seed, etc. would be like the field, etc.🔽Only the complete [set of causes and conditions] is the manifest,

original: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the incomplete [set] is contradictory [to the manifest].

original: rtag pa ni de bzhin du cig car byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rtag pa ni de bzhin du cig car byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Permanence is not like that, because it is not simultaneous.

original: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi rang gi rgyu ma tshang ba nyid kyis cig car ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi rang gi rgyu ma tshang ba nyid kyis cig car ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the assemblage of causes is not complete, it is not simultaneous.

original: de bzhin mar me bzhin dang mtha'i tshogs pa bzhin du lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi ma tshang ba bsal bas /
analyzed: de bzhin mar me bzhin dang mtha'i tshogs pa bzhin du lhan cig byed pa rnams kyi ma tshang ba bsal bas /
translated: Just as a lamp, and just as the final assemblage, the assemblage of causes is not complete,

original: ma nyams pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtag pa ni rim gyis byed pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la /
analyzed: ma nyams pa'i bdag nyid kyi rtag pa ni rim gyis byed pa yang yin no snyam du sems pa la /
translated: and the permanent, which is not impaired, is also sequential.

original: rnam 'gas zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rnam 'gas zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: In response to this, the present verse states, “By what means?”

original: rnam pa 'gas kyang ste lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam pa 'gas kyang ste lhan cig byed pa rnams kyis phan gdags par bya ba nyid ma yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: By no means, because it is not something that is benefited by the assemblage of causes.

original: ma tshang ba nyid med kyang de de'i dus nye bar mtshon pa'i byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma tshang ba nyid med kyang de de'i dus nye bar mtshon pa'i byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the assemblage is not incomplete, it is not the agent that manifests it at that time, because it does not abandon its nature of not being an agent.

original: ma tshad ba nyid kho na mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ma tshad ba nyid kho na mi byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it does not act because of incompleteness.

original: de nye bar mtshon pa yang de dang mtshungs pas de dang 'brel ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: de nye bar mtshon pa yang de dang mtshungs pas de dang 'brel ba nyid yin no //
translated: and the example is similar to that.

original: rgyu'i rang bzhin kho na yin yang /
analyzed: rgyu'i rang bzhin kho na yin yang /
translated: Even though it is the nature of the cause,

original: de'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: the effect does not arise.

original: 'bras bu la gegs byed pa yin na /
analyzed: 'bras bu la gegs byed pa yin na /
translated: If it is an obstruction to the effect,

original: de la gnas pa'i byed pa po nyid la gegs byas pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de la gnas pa'i byed pa po nyid la gegs byas pa yin gyi /
translated: the obstruction is to the agent that is in that state.

original: ji ltar mar me la yin /
analyzed: ji ltar mar me la yin /
translated: How is it to the lamp?

original: de'i yang ma tshang bar nye bar mtshon pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i yang ma tshang bar nye bar mtshon pa yin na /
translated: If the example is incomplete,

original: tshad ba yin yang ma tshang ba bzhin du nyams pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ba yin yang ma tshang ba bzhin du nyams pa yin no //
translated: it is defective, like the incomplete syllogism.

original: mtha'i tshogs pa ni re re zhing de'i 'bras bu la nus pa can yin te /
analyzed: mtha'i tshogs pa ni re re zhing de'i 'bras bu la nus pa can yin te /
translated: The final collection is capable of each effect,

original: rgyu'i dbang gis de bzhin du 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: rgyu'i dbang gis de bzhin du 'byung ba yin no //
translated: because it arises in that way by the power of the cause.

original: lhan cig byed pa gcig nye bar gyur pas bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu yang rgyun tu 'byung ba'i shes pa la sogs pa nus pa tha dad pa las rang bzhin tha dad pa ni gzhan gyi bye brag can ma yin te /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa gcig nye bar gyur pas bsgrub par bya ba 'bras bu yang rgyun tu 'byung ba'i shes pa la sogs pa nus pa tha dad pa las rang bzhin tha dad pa ni gzhan gyi bye brag can ma yin te /
translated: The effect to be established also arises continuously from the different potencies of the cognition, etc. There is no difference in nature due to difference in other particulars.

original: skad cig ma'i dbye ba tsam skyed byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i dbye ba tsam skyed byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause that generates the mere distinction of the momentary.

original: mar me la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la yang sdong bu'i 'gyur ba dang shes pa dang / 'bar ba'i rgyun phyi ma 'bras bu'i byed pa po la so so'i lhan cig byad pa'i rkyen gyis byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo ma nyams pa yin pa la yang /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa'i mi rtag pa la yang sdong bu'i 'gyur ba dang shes pa dang / 'bar ba'i rgyun phyi ma 'bras bu'i byed pa po la so so'i lhan cig byad pa'i rkyen gyis byed pa po ma yin pa'i ngo bo ma nyams pa yin pa la yang /
translated: Also, in the case of impermanent things such as a flame, the cause of the subsequent continuum of the flame, consciousness, and light is not the agent of the effect, but rather the cause that is the condition of the individual simultaneous factors, and the nature of the agent is not impaired.

original: tshad ma yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: tshad ma yod pa ma yin na /
translated: If valid cognition does not exist

original: rtag pa gcig pu'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin la lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rtag pa gcig pu'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin la lta ci smos zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in that case, what need is there to speak of the nature of permanent, unitary entities?

original: de'i phyir rang gi rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu du ma byed pa'i tshogs pa phyi ma gzugs dang ro la sogs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu du ma byed pa'i tshogs pa phyi ma gzugs dang ro la sogs pa bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, the effect that is produced from the assembly of its causes is a multiplicity, just like the subsequent assembly of causes such as form, taste, and so on.

original: ji ltar mthong ba khas blang bar bya ba yin no //🔽nye bar len pa dang lhan cig byed pa la sogs pa nyid ni /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba khas blang bar bya ba yin no // nye bar len pa dang lhan cig byed pa la sogs pa nyid ni /
translated: One should accept things just as they are seen.

original: @128b ci nas kyang gang gi yang yin no //
analyzed: @128b ci nas kyang gang gi yang yin no //
translated: The mere fact that something is a substantial entity that is the basis of the appropriator and the simultaneous factors🔽is not the appropriator and the simultaneous factors.

original: kha cig tu ni bstan bcos kyi rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig tu ni bstan bcos kyi rnam par dbye ba ji lta ba kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: In some places, it is just the division of the treatise.

original: shin tu snying po med pa blo gros ngan pa'i spros pa ring du bsrings pas chog go //
analyzed: shin tu snying po med pa blo gros ngan pa'i spros pa ring du bsrings pas chog go //
translated: It is enough to have cast far away the useless, foolish proliferation of bad ideas.

original: skad cig ma nyid la snga ma nyid tsam las rgyu nyid ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: skad cig ma nyid la snga ma nyid tsam las rgyu nyid ji ltar yin te /
translated: How can the prior moment be the cause of the very thing that is momentary?

original: thal ches pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: thal ches pa ma yin nam /
translated: Isn’t this too much of a stretch?

original: dri la dri dang gzugs dag snga ma nyid las bye brag med do //
analyzed: dri la dri dang gzugs dag snga ma nyid las bye brag med do //
translated: There is no difference between the prior smell and the prior form.

original: bya ba la yin no //
analyzed: bya ba la yin no //
translated: It is with regard to action.

original: zhe na / skad cig ma la bya ba med do //
analyzed: zhe na / skad cig ma la bya ba med do //
translated: There is no action in the momentary.

original: skye bzhin pa'i dri la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe gzugs zhig pa de'i 'bras bu mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: skye bzhin pa'i dri la sogs pa ni gang gi tshe gzugs zhig pa de'i 'bras bu mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Just as the arising smell, etc. is not accepted as the effect of the disintegrated form,

original: gzugs gzhan rnams kyang yin no //
analyzed: gzugs gzhan rnams kyang yin no //
translated: so it is with other forms.

original: rtag pa ni dus gzhan du yang rjes su gnas bzhin pa yin pas bya ba byed par nus pa yin pa'i phyir rgyu yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa ni dus gzhan du yang rjes su gnas bzhin pa yin pas bya ba byed par nus pa yin pa'i phyir rgyu yin no //
translated: Since the permanent exists at other times as well, it is able to perform the action of a cause.

original: de'i phyir sngar 'bras grub pa la //
analyzed: de'i phyir sngar 'bras grub pa la //
translated: Therefore, the prior cause

original: gang gi bya ba mthong ba ni //
analyzed: gang gi bya ba mthong ba ni //
translated: The one who sees the activity🔽

original: de nyid de yi rgyu yin gyi //
analyzed: de nyid de yi rgyu yin gyi //
translated: The cause of an effect is that which is seen to be invariably concomitant with it.

original: de ma thag pa tsam nyid min //
analyzed: de ma thag pa tsam nyid min //
translated: It is not merely the immediately preceding condition.

original: gal te bya ba yin yang rgyu yin zhes ci las shes rgyu nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gal te bya ba yin yang rgyu yin zhes ci las shes rgyu nyid kyis rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If it is an activity, how do you know it is a cause? Because it is understood to be a cause.

original: 'di la yang de'i 'bras bu nyid yul yin pa de nyid kyis rtogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la yang de'i 'bras bu nyid yul yin pa de nyid kyis rtogs pa ni /
translated: Here, the effect itself is the object, and it is understood by that very fact.

original: lha sbyin gyi bu la lha sbyin du shes pa bzhin du /
analyzed: lha sbyin gyi bu la lha sbyin du shes pa bzhin du /
translated: It is like knowing Devadatta as the son of Devadatta.

original: gang la yod pa de nyid rgyu yin gyi /
analyzed: gang la yod pa de nyid rgyu yin gyi /
translated: That which exists is the cause,

original: gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rnam par dbye ba'o //
translated: not anything else. This is the distinction.

original: 'bras bu la rang bzhin gyis rjes su 'gro bar nges pa rgyu nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu la rang bzhin gyis rjes su 'gro bar nges pa rgyu nyid yin te /
translated: The cause is that which is ascertained to be invariably concomitant with the effect by nature.

original: dri la ro'i ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dri la ro'i ni ma yin no //
translated: But smell is not the cause of taste.

original: ji ltar ji lta bas rgyu ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar ji lta bas rgyu ni ma yin te /
translated: How can something be a cause if it is not ascertained?

original: gang zhig gang las kyang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nges pa ma yin par ma mthong ba la thal 'gyur yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las kyang thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir nges pa ma yin par ma mthong ba la thal 'gyur yang ma yin te /
translated: Because it is seen to follow from something else. But if it is not seen, it is not ascertained.

original: de ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows what is seen.

original: 'jig rten pa ni 'ga' la yang skad cig ma nyid du zhen pa med do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ni 'ga' la yang skad cig ma nyid du zhen pa med do //
translated: No one in the world believes that anything is momentary.

original: de'i phyir rgyu khas blangs pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu khas blangs pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if you accept that there is a cause,

original: snga ma snga ma'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snga ma snga ma'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
translated: the cause must be the preceding moment.

original: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi mthun pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not a cause that is of a different nature,

original: de lta bur ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa na mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nye bar gnas pa'i gnas skabs gang yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de lta bur ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod pa na mtshan nyid mi mthun pa nye bar gnas pa'i gnas skabs gang yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: because it is not perceived in that way.

original: gting dpag dka' 'di gting thag ni //
analyzed: gting dpag dka' 'di gting thag ni //
translated: The depth of this difficult to fathom

original: blo dman bdag gis mi chod cing //
analyzed: blo dman bdag gis mi chod cing //
translated: cannot be measured by the likes of me.

original: 'di la'ang shing rta che'ang dub na //
analyzed: 'di la'ang shing rta che'ang dub na //
translated: Even the great charioteers are exhausted by it,

original: ches dman la gtam ga la yod //
analyzed: ches dman la gtam ga la yod //
translated: so how can the likes of me speak of it?

original: de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid du sgrub pa la //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshad ma nyid du sgrub pa la //
translated: In this way, the proof of the validity of the scriptures

original: yang dag nyid gsungs shes pa las gzhan pa rjes su dpag pa yin zhes smos pa yin la /
analyzed: yang dag nyid gsungs shes pa las gzhan pa rjes su dpag pa yin zhes smos pa yin la /
translated: is stated to be inference, which is different from the knowledge of the one who has spoken the truth.

original: rtsod pa'i gzhi ni nye bar dmigs @129a * //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i gzhi ni nye bar dmigs @129a * //
translated: The basis of the dispute is that which is perceived

original: pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu can yin te /
analyzed: pa dang ldan pa'i rgyu can yin te /
translated: and has a cause,

original: skye ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: because it possesses arising.

original: sems dang mi ldan pa nye bar dmigs pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir gos la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: sems dang mi ldan pa nye bar dmigs pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir gos la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: because it is observed to be non-mental and to have a proximate object, like clothing, etc.

original: gang kho na gzhan gyi blo dang ldan pa nyid kyi rgyu can yin par 'gegs par byed pa de kho na rtsod pa'i yul du brjod pas rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gang kho na gzhan gyi blo dang ldan pa nyid kyi rgyu can yin par 'gegs par byed pa de kho na rtsod pa'i yul du brjod pas rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The reason is stated in the form of a syllogism, and the subject is understood by implication, since it is the very thing that is being denied as the cause of the possession of the other’s mind.

original: bsgrub bya'i bye brag brjod pas ni bye brag grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i bye brag brjod pas ni bye brag grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The difference in the probandum is stated in order to establish the difference.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: bsgrub bya la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni rtsod pa'i zla bo la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgrub bya la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni rtsod pa'i zla bo la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the arrangement of the probandum, etc., depends on the opponent in the debate.

original: rang bzhin pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: rang bzhin pa nyid yin na /
translated: If it were natural,

original: rang gi ngo bo bzhin du phyogs nyid la sogs pa yang ji srid rdzas yod kyi bar du yin par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo bzhin du phyogs nyid la sogs pa yang ji srid rdzas yod kyi bar du yin par 'gyur la /
translated: then the subject, etc., would be just like its own nature, and would last as long as the substance exists.

original: smra ba po gzhan la ltos nas gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: smra ba po gzhan la ltos nas gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: It would not become different in dependence on another speaker,

original: de bzhin du bsam pa'i bskyed byar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam pa'i bskyed byar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: and in the same way, it would be produced by intention.

original: tshad mas ma bkag pa'i bsam pas bskyed pa ni de log kyang log pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tshad mas ma bkag pa'i bsam pas bskyed pa ni de log kyang log pa ma yin te /
translated: That which is produced by intention is not reversed even when that is reversed, unless it is blocked by a valid cognition.

original: gang gi phyir rdza mkhan ldog pa yin yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rdza mkhan ldog pa yin yang /
translated: Because even though the potter stops,

original: de las gzhan pa'i bum pa med pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i bum pa med pa ma yin no ;
translated: it is not the case that the pot does not exist apart from him.

original: / bsam pa yang phyi rol gyi skyed byed nyid yin na /
analyzed: / bsam pa yang phyi rol gyi skyed byed nyid yin na /
translated: If the intention is that the external cause is the producer,

original: bkag pa yang skye bar byed par 'gyur te /
analyzed: bkag pa yang skye bar byed par 'gyur te /
translated: then the negation would also be a producer.

original: rang gi ngo bor bor ba dang / bar du chod pa dag med pa'i phyir nges pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor bor ba dang / bar du chod pa dag med pa'i phyir nges pa med pa yin na /
translated: Because there is no certainty that the negation is not the nature of the object and that it is not obstructed,

original: gtan tshigs nyid phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gtan tshigs nyid phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i phyir /
translated: the reason itself becomes mistaken.

original: 'khrul pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang de'i snang ba dag tu rnam par gzhag pa chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa can du 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang de'i snang ba dag tu rnam par gzhag pa chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it becomes mistaken, the presentation of the cause and its appearance would be severed.

original: smra ba po'i 'dod pa tsam las byung ba nyid kyis dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: smra ba po'i 'dod pa tsam las byung ba nyid kyis dngos su ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it arises from the mere desire of the speaker, it is not actually a negation.

original: dngos su khyab pa can gyi 'brel pa'i rjes 'byung bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos su khyab pa can gyi 'brel pa'i rjes 'byung bar byed pa'i gtan tshigs yin gyi /
translated: It is a reason that is a subsequent producer of an actual pervasion.

original: de'i rnam par gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam par gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not a subsequent engagement of its presentation.

original: des na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i rnam bzhag 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs la sogs pa'i rnam bzhag 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the presentation of the reason and so on is established.

original: bsgrub bya'i bye brag kho na rtsod pa 'dzin pa yin gyi gzhan la rtsod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i bye brag kho na rtsod pa 'dzin pa yin gyi gzhan la rtsod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Thus, only the specific thesis is held to be the object of dispute, not anything else.

original: de 'dzin pa yin na gnas skabs mi shes pas pham par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de 'dzin pa yin na gnas skabs mi shes pas pham par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If one holds that, then one loses because one does not understand the context.

original: bsgrub bya'i tshig 'di yang bsgrub bya dngos su grub pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i tshig 'di yang bsgrub bya dngos su grub pa'i yan lag ma yin te /
translated: This statement of the thesis is not a part of the proof of the thesis,

original: gtan tshigs smras pa la don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs smras pa la don med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would be pointless to state a reason.

original: sgrub byed la dad pa bskyed pa'i don du 'dod pa 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgrub byed la dad pa bskyed pa'i don du 'dod pa 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not held for the purpose of generating faith in the proof.

original: khyab pa can ni sgrub byed med na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyab pa can ni sgrub byed med na nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if there is no proof, there is no certainty.

original: yul shes par byed pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yul shes par byed pa'i don du yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is for the purpose of making the object known,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: de'i shes pa ni de lta bu'i sgrub byed brjod pa kho nas grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i shes pa ni de lta bu'i sgrub byed brjod pa kho nas grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the knowledge of that is established merely by stating the proof.

original: @129b gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: @129b gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent.

original: bum pa la sogs pa lta bu zhes brjod pa la phyin ci log tu dogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa lta bu zhes brjod pa la phyin ci log tu dogs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a case of misapprehension to say that a pot, etc.

original: rtag pa la byas pa nyid rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa ni ji ltar 'khrul pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rtag pa la byas pa nyid rjes su 'gro bar brjod pa ni ji ltar 'khrul pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: How is it a mistake to say that the produced is pervaded by permanence?

original: de lta yin na /
analyzed: de lta yin na /
translated: If that is so,

original: de nyid kyis rtag pa la phyir ci log tu brjod pa yin par cis mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de nyid kyis rtag pa la phyir ci log tu brjod pa yin par cis mi 'gyur /
translated: why is it not a case of misapprehension to say that permanence is pervaded by the produced?

original: byas pa nyid ni gang gis nam mkha' la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par rjod par byed pa yin pa des na sgra la yang rtag pa nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byas pa nyid ni gang gis nam mkha' la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid kyis khyab par rjod par byed pa yin pa des na sgra la yang rtag pa nyid du 'dod par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since the produced is said to pervade permanence in space, etc., by permanence, sound would also be accepted as permanent.

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang chos can dang / dpe dang rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyi yul ni bye brag yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dang chos can dang / dpe dang rjes su 'gro ba rnams kyi yul ni bye brag yin no zhe na /
translated: The domain of the probandum, probans, subject, example, and pervasion is difference.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.🔽

original: 'gal ba can la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gal ba can la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is similar even in the case of contradiction.

original: bsgrub bya dang 'gal ba'i chos can dpe la ni phyin ci log gi khyab pa can du rtogs pa'i shugs kyis gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa ni bya bar sla ba nyid do //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang 'gal ba'i chos can dpe la ni phyin ci log gi khyab pa can du rtogs pa'i shugs kyis gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa ni bya bar sla ba nyid do //
translated: In the case of an example that has the property that is incompatible with the probandum, it is easy to understand that the reason proves the opposite of the probandum by the force of the pervasion that is the opposite of the pervasion in the similar instance.

original: nam mkha' la sogs pa la ni byas pa nyid med pas bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid kho na pham pa'i gzhi yin gyi /
analyzed: nam mkha' la sogs pa la ni byas pa nyid med pas bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid kho na pham pa'i gzhi yin gyi /
translated: Since the probandum, being produced, does not exist in space and so on, the mere noncompleteness of the probandum is the basis of defeat.

original: phyin ci log pas khyab pa can ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phyin ci log pas khyab pa can ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the opposite pervasion.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa spangs pa yongs su brtags pa'i yul nyid yin pas de'i tshe ring nas rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i rtag pa nyid la sogs pa spangs pa yongs su brtags pa'i yul nyid yin pas de'i tshe ring nas rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the object of investigation is the abandonment of the permanence of a pot and so on, and so on.

original: bsgrub bya'i tshig med na rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig ni gnyi ga la mtshungs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i tshig med na rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig ni gnyi ga la mtshungs pa'i phyir /
translated: If the words of the probandum are not stated, the words of the pervasion are the same for both.

original: phyin ci log pa can las de kho na nyid smra ba po la khyad par can du rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log pa can las de kho na nyid smra ba po la khyad par can du rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the proponent of reality will not be understood to be special from one who has the opposite pervasion.

original: gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro ba'i nges pa can med pas shugs kyi phyin ci log gis khyab par nges par bzung ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gang zhig gang gi rjes su 'gro ba'i nges pa can med pas shugs kyi phyin ci log gis khyab par nges par bzung ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because there is no certainty that something follows from something, there is no apprehension of the pervasion of the opposite by the reverse.

original: 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya bstan pa la ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya bstan pa la ni /
translated: In the demonstration of the probandum,

original: yid mi ches pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: yid mi ches pa med pa yin te /
translated: there is no lack of confidence.

original: ngag gi bye brag gi yon tan dang skyon brjod pas de slong bar byed pa'i bsam pas nyid kyi phyir ci log pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid grub pa yin la /
analyzed: ngag gi bye brag gi yon tan dang skyon brjod pas de slong bar byed pa'i bsam pas nyid kyi phyir ci log pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa nyid grub pa yin la /
translated: Because the statement of the qualities and faults of the particular words is made with the intention of bringing that about, the correctness and incorrectness are established.

original: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
translated: But not by another,

original: de bsgrub pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa la tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no valid cognition for establishing that.

original: de bstan pa la yang chos can gyi tshig ni gnyi ga la mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: de bstan pa la yang chos can gyi tshig ni gnyi ga la mtshungs pa ma yin nam /
translated: And in the demonstration of that, is not the word of the subject the same for both?

original: chos kyi tshig ni mthong ba kho na bzhin du 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: chos kyi tshig ni mthong ba kho na bzhin du 'khrul pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: The word of the property is the cause of error just as it is seen.

original: lan gnyis brjod pas 'khrul pa ma yin no //
analyzed: lan gnyis brjod pas 'khrul pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not an error because it is stated twice.

original: zhe na / de lta yin na gtan tshigs la sogs pa la 'khrul par dogs pa med @130a * //
analyzed: zhe na / de lta yin na gtan tshigs la sogs pa la 'khrul par dogs pa med @130a * //
translated: If that is so, there is no doubt of error in the reason, etc.

original: par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not so,

original: gzhan la de med pas gzhan la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la de med pas gzhan la yang de bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: because it does not exist in the other, and it is not so in the other.

original: lhag pa'i skyon du yang thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: lhag pa'i skyon du yang thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Moreover, the fault of excess would follow,

original: 'khrul pa srid pa yang yang brjod pa yang ma bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khrul pa srid pa yang yang brjod pa yang ma bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: because the possibility of error is not eliminated by the repeated statement.

original: ngag gi bye brag las de lta bu'i bsam pas rtogs pas yon tan dang skyon sems pa yin pa ni 'khrul par dogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ngag gi bye brag las de lta bu'i bsam pas rtogs pas yon tan dang skyon sems pa yin pa ni 'khrul par dogs pa ma yin no //
translated: But it is not suspected that there is error in the thought of good and bad qualities, because of understanding that from the particular of speech.

original: zhe na / cig shos la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhe na / cig shos la yang mtshungs pa yin no //
translated: If you say that it is not so, it is the same for the other.

original: 'gal ba can la ji ltar 'khrul par rtogs pa yin /🔽ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gal ba can la ji ltar 'khrul par rtogs pa yin / ma yin te /
translated: How is there the understanding of error in that which is contradictory?🔽No,

original: de la yang /
analyzed: de la yang /
translated: because in that case,

original: smras pa sems pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: smras pa sems pa nyid yin no //
translated: it is said that it is thought.

original: 'ba' zhig ni khyab pa grub pa las phyin ci log par brjod bzhin pa la spyod par byed na /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig ni khyab pa grub pa las phyin ci log par brjod bzhin pa la spyod par byed na /
translated: If one engages in the mere statement of the establishment of pervasion,

original: 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i shes pa yin no //
translated: it is an erroneous consciousness.

original: phyin ci log pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya dang / 'gal ba'i chos can gyi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: phyin ci log pa'i gtan tshigs ni bsgrub bya dang / 'gal ba'i chos can gyi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba yin no //
translated: The reason of error is the pervasion of the example of the subject that is contradictory with the probandum.

original: de dag tsam gyis ni sngar rab tu grub pa la dpyod par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis ni sngar rab tu grub pa la dpyod par byed pa yin te /
translated: But that alone does not constitute an analysis of what has already been established.

original: phyin ci log pas khyab pa la rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyin ci log pas khyab pa la rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no cognition of pervasion by the opposite.

original: de la dpyod pa la gnyi gar yongs su rtogs pas du ba la de dang 'dra ba yod pa'i phyir dang / de'i tshe nyid bsgrub bya phyin ci log pa la khyab pa'i blo can gyis /🔽phyin ci log pa'i ngag brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyis mi srid pa'i phyir dang / gang byas pa de ni rtag pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la dpyod pa la gnyi gar yongs su rtogs pas du ba la de dang 'dra ba yod pa'i phyir dang / de'i tshe nyid bsgrub bya phyin ci log pa la khyab pa'i blo can gyis / phyin ci log pa'i ngag brjod par mi nus pa nyid kyis mi srid pa'i phyir dang / gang byas pa de ni rtag pa nyid yin te /
translated: In that analysis, both are cognized, because smoke exists in that way, and because at that time, the one who has the cognition of the pervasion of the opposite of the probandum,🔽cannot express the opposite by means of words, because it is impossible.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes dper brjod pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes dper brjod pa nyid yin la /
translated: And the example is just that which is expressed as “Whatever is produced is impermanent, like a vase,” and “Whatever is permanent is not produced, like space.”

original: rab tu grub pa las phyin ci log par brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: rab tu grub pa las phyin ci log par brjod pa yin na /
translated: But if one expresses the opposite of what has been established,

original: myur bar phyin ci log par khyab pa nyid du blo la snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: myur bar phyin ci log par khyab pa nyid du blo la snang ba'i phyir /
translated: then because the pervasion by the opposite appears to the mind,

original: bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa'i skyon nyid yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya phyin ci log tu sgrub par byed pa'i skyon nyid yin no //
translated: it is just the fault of proving the opposite of the probandum.

original: sgrub byed ma tshang ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub byed ma tshang ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the proof is incomplete.

original: ring nas rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ring nas rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is realized after a long time.

original: phyogs bstan pa las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs ma yin te /
analyzed: phyogs bstan pa las gzhan pa'i gnas skabs ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the occasion is different from the indication of the position,

original: gang las bsgrub bya'i bye brag sgrub pa yin zhes gang smras pa de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang las bsgrub bya'i bye brag sgrub pa yin zhes gang smras pa de ni ma yin te /
translated: because it is the proof of the specific probandum that was stated.

original: gang cung zad bstan pa sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang cung zad bstan pa sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that any indication is the proof of the syllogism,

original: de ltar 'jug pa ni smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du lhur blang bar bya ba ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar 'jug pa ni smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du lhur blang bar bya ba ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it would follow, absurdly, that such an engagement would not be something to be undertaken, like the words of a madman.

original: gang gis kyang rtsed pa byed pa ni 'dri ba po nye ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gis kyang rtsed pa byed pa ni 'dri ba po nye ba yin na /
translated: If the questioner is the one who is playing,

original: de'i sbyor ba 'byung ba ni gnas skabs kyi rjes thogs su 'byung ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba 'byung ba ni gnas skabs kyi rjes thogs su 'byung ba yin la /
translated: then the occurrence of his syllogism would occur after the occasion,

original: spyi'i gnas skabs la ni sgrub pa'i bye brag sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: spyi'i gnas skabs la ni sgrub pa'i bye brag sbyor bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: and the occasion of the general would not be the occasion for the application of the specific proof.

original: lhur @130b blang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
analyzed: lhur @130b blang bar bya ba ma yin pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba kho na'o //
translated: It would follow, absurdly, that it would not be something to be undertaken.

original: de'i phyir smras pa'i khyab pa can la gtan tshigs kyi nus pas bsgrub bya grub pa yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir smras pa'i khyab pa can la gtan tshigs kyi nus pas bsgrub bya grub pa yin na /
translated: Therefore, if the probandum is established by the power of the reason in the pervasion that is stated,

original: de bstan pa lhag pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de bstan pa lhag pa nyid yin no //
translated: then it is redundant to teach that pervasion.

original: khyab pa 'di la mkhas pa rnams la ni gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig brjod byar byed ces gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: khyab pa 'di la mkhas pa rnams la ni gtan tshigs 'ba' zhig brjod byar byed ces gsungs pa'o //
translated: It is said that for the wise, the reason alone is to be stated in a proof.

original: yongs su rtogs pas dub pa rnams la gsal ba'i don du bsgrub bya brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: yongs su rtogs pas dub pa rnams la gsal ba'i don du bsgrub bya brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: But for those who are weary of understanding, the probandum should be stated in order to clarify the proof.

original: gzhan du na khyab pa bye brag med pas sgrub byed tsam las bsgrub bya mtshon par rtogs pa yin na /🔽mi 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya yang 'phan pa'i phyir /🔽de nyid du smra ba dang 'gal ba smra ba dag la bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na khyab pa bye brag med pas sgrub byed tsam las bsgrub bya mtshon par rtogs pa yin na / mi 'dod pa'i bsgrub bya yang 'phan pa'i phyir / de nyid du smra ba dang 'gal ba smra ba dag la bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, if the probandum is understood from the proof alone because the pervasion is not specified,🔽then even a nonimplicative negation would be a proof because the probandum would be established.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.

original: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa 'os pa zhes bya bas /
analyzed: 'dis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub par byed pa 'os pa zhes bya bas /
translated: And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.🔽And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag tu nye bar bkod pa'i phyir thal ches pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed dag tu nye bar bkod pa'i phyir thal ches pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: And it would be pointless to state a reason because the probandum would be established by the mere proof.

original: de lta yin na 'gal pa'i gtam tsam yang nub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na 'gal pa'i gtam tsam yang nub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: If that were so, then even the mere words of contradiction would disappear.

original: 'khrul pas yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pas yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it exists because of error,

original: de lta yin na dgag pa'i don du 'dod pa'i tshig smos pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na dgag pa'i don du 'dod pa'i tshig smos pa ma yin no //
translated: then it is not a word that is asserted to have the meaning of negation.

original: thams cad du gos pa med pa yin na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byed pa ni nga rgyal can gyi skyes bu'i bya ba tsam du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad du gos pa med pa yin na phyogs kyi mtshan nyid byed pa ni nga rgyal can gyi skyes bu'i bya ba tsam du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is not attached to anything, then the character of the direction would be the mere activity of a conceited person.

original: de'i bsgrub bya dang bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i dngos po shes par byed pa ni 'bras bu yin no zhe na ;
analyzed: de'i bsgrub bya dang bsgrub bya ma yin pa'i dngos po shes par byed pa ni 'bras bu yin no zhe na ;
translated: If the purpose of the word is to make known the thing that is to be established and that which is not to be established, then it is a result.

original: gtan tshigs tsam sbyor ba yin na phyin ci log pa dang / de kho na nyid du smra ba po'i khyad par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs tsam sbyor ba yin na phyin ci log pa dang / de kho na nyid du smra ba po'i khyad par rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If one merely employs the reason, then one does not understand the difference between the one who speaks falsely and the one who speaks reality.

original: de'i phyir de nges par brjod pa ma yin zhes bya bas nges par bkag pa ma nges pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir de nges par brjod pa ma yin zhes bya bas nges par bkag pa ma nges pa sgrub par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is not that it is not expressed by that, and so the negation of the ascertainment is the establishment of the uncertain.

original: rang gi ngo bo 'gegs pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo 'gegs pa ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the negation of its own nature.

original: de lta na dpe la med na mi 'byung bar nges pa'i gtan tshigs nye bar sbyor ba ni /
analyzed: de lta na dpe la med na mi 'byung bar nges pa'i gtan tshigs nye bar sbyor ba ni /
translated: Thus, when one applies a reason that is ascertained to be invariably concomitant with the example,

original: phyogs la khyab par byed pa nyid du grub pa yin na /🔽bsgrub bya la nges par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: phyogs la khyab par byed pa nyid du grub pa yin na / bsgrub bya la nges par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: then the pervasion of the subject is established.

original: de la nye bar sbyor ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin no //
analyzed: de la nye bar sbyor ba ni sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag yin no //
translated: Because of that, the application of the reason is a part of the proof.

original: gzhan du na nges pa can bsgrub par bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na nges pa can bsgrub par bya ba mi rigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be illogical to prove what is already ascertained.

original: bden te / dam bca' ba smras pa'i gtan tshigs la chos can rjes su 'gro ba grub pa yin na /
analyzed: bden te / dam bca' ba smras pa'i gtan tshigs la chos can rjes su 'gro ba grub pa yin na /
translated: Granted, but if the reason is stated and the subject is ascertained,

original: yang brjod pa la dgos pa med par 'gyur ro //🔽de la 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang /
analyzed: yang brjod pa la dgos pa med par 'gyur ro // de la 'brel pa can ma yin pa yang /
translated: then there would be no need to state the example.🔽In that case, is it not seen that even that which is not related,

original: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid la sogs pa de ltar brjod par mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: mig gis gzung bar bya ba nyid la sogs pa de ltar brjod par mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: such as being perceptible by the eye, is stated?

original: ji ltar de dag tsam las de rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yin /🔽de'i @131a * //
analyzed: ji ltar de dag tsam las de rjes su 'gro ba nges pa yin / de'i @131a * //
translated: How is it ascertained that it is invariably concomitant with that mere fact?🔽How is it ascertained from

original: nye bar sbyor ba las kyang ji ltar nges pa yin /
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba las kyang ji ltar nges pa yin /
translated: the application of the reason?

original: med pa la yang de yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med pa la yang de yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it exists in the non-existent.

original: med pa la yang sbyor bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs la yan lag lnga dang ldan par mi sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: med pa la yang sbyor bar byed pa ni gtan tshigs la yan lag lnga dang ldan par mi sbyor ba ni ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that one does not apply the five-membered syllogism to a non-existent,

original: de ltar gzhung lugs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar gzhung lugs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is a system.

original: de'i phyir chos can dang 'brel par bstan pa yang /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can dang 'brel par bstan pa yang /
translated: Therefore, the teaching of the connection with the subject

original: tshad ma las de nyid dang cig shos su nges par rtogs pas gtan tshigs dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag med na mi 'byung ba bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi tshig tsam las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma las de nyid dang cig shos su nges par rtogs pas gtan tshigs dang / gtan tshigs ltar snang ba dag med na mi 'byung ba bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa yin gyi tshig tsam las ni ma yin no //
translated: is also like the non-erroneous ascertainment of the reason and the counter-reason by means of a valid cognition, and the establishment of the reason and the pseudo-reason as invariably concomitant, and not merely verbal.

original: dam bca' ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs la /
analyzed: dam bca' ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi gtan tshigs la /
translated: The reason that precedes the thesis

original: de dang 'brel pa'i shes pa ma nyams pa yin te /
analyzed: de dang 'brel pa'i shes pa ma nyams pa yin te /
translated: is the non-deterioration of the cognition of its connection.

original: nye bar sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi med na mi 'byung ba brjod pa las rnges su 'jug pa'i dngos po can nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa rnams nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dag gi mjug bsdu ba las yin no zhes bya ba
analyzed: nye bar sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba can gyi med na mi 'byung ba brjod pa las rnges su 'jug pa'i dngos po can nyid yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'jug pa rnams nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dag gi mjug bsdu ba las yin no zhes bya ba
translated: Because it is the nature of the subsequent to be the thing that is invariably concomitant with the expression of the invariable relation that is preceded by the application, the subsequent is the conclusion of the invariable relation of the subsequent alone.

original: yang gtam tsam yin te /
analyzed: yang gtam tsam yin te /
translated: This is mere talk.

original: de med kyang nye bar bsdu ba'i mthar thug pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de med kyang nye bar bsdu ba'i mthar thug pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because even without that, the invariable relation that concludes with the application is understood.

original: khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba las phyis nye bar sbyor ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin la /
analyzed: khyab pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor ba las phyis nye bar sbyor ba ni rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa'i rjes su 'brang ba yin la /
translated: The application that is subsequent to the invariable relation that precedes it is the subsequent inference for oneself.

original: de la yang khyab pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas de nyid nye bar brjod nas rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: de la yang khyab pa nyid kyi rjes su 'brangs nas de nyid nye bar brjod nas rtogs pa yin te /
translated: And in that, having followed the invariable relation itself, one understands it by expressing it.

original: gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te /
analyzed: gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te /
translated: Whatever is produced is impermanent,

original: dper na bum pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bum pa lta bu'o //
translated: like a pot, for example.

original: sgra yang byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: sgra yang byas pa nyid yin no zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Sound is also produced.

original: dpe tsam dang lhan cig pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa kho na las bsgrub bya 'grub pa yin na gnod pa can sbyar ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpe tsam dang lhan cig pa'i gtan tshigs brjod pa kho na las bsgrub bya 'grub pa yin na gnod pa can sbyar ba med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If the probandum is established only by the mere example and the reason that is co-present, then it follows that the reason would not be stated as being contradictory.

original: de ma sbyar ba las yang sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de ma sbyar ba las yang sgrub par byed pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because without stating that, the proof would be powerless.

original: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin par brjod pa ni pham pa'i gnas yin no //
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa'i yan lag ma yin par brjod pa ni pham pa'i gnas yin no //
translated: To say that it is not a part of the proof is a point of defeat.

original: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bkod pa ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas mjug bsdu ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs la gnod pa can gyi tshad ma nye bar bkod pa ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas mjug bsdu ba yin te /
translated: Therefore, the statement of a contradictory valid cognition in regard to the discordant side is a conclusion by way of effect.

original: de'i don ni gnod pa can gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i don ni gnod pa can gyi 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because its meaning is the effect of contradiction.

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam las ni thun mong ma yin pa bzhin du bsgrub bya grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir phyogs la sogs pa yod par brngod pa yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs la med pa tsam las ni thun mong ma yin pa bzhin du bsgrub bya grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir phyogs la sogs pa yod par brngod pa yin no //
translated: The existence of the subject and so on is stated because the probandum is not established merely by the absence of the discordant side, just as it is not established by the uncommon.

original: gnod pa can dngos su ma bstan pa mjug sdud ma yin nam /
analyzed: gnod pa can dngos su ma bstan pa mjug sdud ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the non-statement of the contradictory a non-conclusion?

original: gal te 'bras bu las yin no zhas zer ba ni @131b gnod pa can gyi 'bras bu med na mi 'byung ba'i dag la yang yod pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gal te 'bras bu las yin no zhas zer ba ni @131b gnod pa can gyi 'bras bu med na mi 'byung ba'i dag la yang yod pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: If you say that it is from the effect, then it would exist even in the absence of the effect that is the counterpervasion, because it is not the case that it does not arise in the absence of the counterpervasion.

original: des na de skad bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de skad bstan pa yin no //
translated: Therefore it is taught in that way.

original: rjes su 'gro ba tsam brjod pa la mjug sdud kyis ci dgos she na /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba tsam brjod pa la mjug sdud kyis ci dgos she na /
translated: If it is said that the mere forward pervasion is stated, what is the point of the summary?

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: kha cig tu kha cig gis ni nges pa brjod pa las /
analyzed: kha cig tu kha cig gis ni nges pa brjod pa las /
translated: In some cases, the certainty is stated by some.

original: des pa yang phyogs med na de med par yang gnod pa can gyi dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i dogs pa rnam par bcad pa yin na /
analyzed: des pa yang phyogs med na de med par yang gnod pa can gyi dbang gis mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i dogs pa rnam par bcad pa yin na /
translated: If the certainty is not in the position, then the counterpervasion is by the power of the counterpervasion, and the doubt is eliminated.

original: des par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rang yang nye ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par bcad pa'i nges pa ni rgyu nges pa las nges pa yin la /
analyzed: des par 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir rang yang nye ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par bcad pa'i nges pa ni rgyu nges pa las nges pa yin la /
translated: Because it is certain, the certainty that eliminates the near counterpervasion is certain from the cause.

original: nges pa de'i tshad ma 'jug pa'i yul mthong bar byed pa'i dpe yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: nges pa de'i tshad ma 'jug pa'i yul mthong bar byed pa'i dpe yin pa'i phyir /
translated: That certainty is the example that makes one see the object of engagement of the valid knowledge.

original: 'di las lhag pa'i bya ba byed par mjug sdud pa ni ma yin no //🔽'dis ni gnod pa med pa'i yul nyid mjug sdud kyi don yin te /
analyzed: 'di las lhag pa'i bya ba byed par mjug sdud pa ni ma yin no // 'dis ni gnod pa med pa'i yul nyid mjug sdud kyi don yin te /
translated: This is not a conclusion that goes beyond this.🔽This is the meaning of the conclusion, the fact that the object is not invalidated.

original: gnyen po dang bcas pa ma yin pa nyid du nye bar sbyor ba bcang pa yin no //
analyzed: gnyen po dang bcas pa ma yin pa nyid du nye bar sbyor ba bcang pa yin no //
translated: It is a statement that it is not invalidated by any antidote.

original: 'di ni 'di las yin no zhes gnod pa can gyis nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di las yin no zhes gnod pa can gyis nges pa yin na /
translated: If it were certain that this is invalidated by that,

original: gnod par bya ba nyid du mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: gnod par bya ba nyid du mi srid pa yin te /
translated: then it would be impossible for it to be invalidated.

original: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir /🔽bsgrub bya phyin ci log pa la'am /
analyzed: de nyid mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin pa'i phyir / bsgrub bya phyin ci log pa la'am /
translated: Because that itself is the counter-position.🔽It is impossible to prove again that the probandum is mistaken

original: des khyab pa la yang slar sgrub par byed pa mi srid pa yin te /
analyzed: des khyab pa la yang slar sgrub par byed pa mi srid pa yin te /
translated: or that it is pervaded by that,

original: de nyid kyis spangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyis spangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that itself has been refuted.

original: gzhan dag na re rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la chos can sa phyogs la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa'i rtags mthong la /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re rang gi don gyi rjes su dpag pa la chos can sa phyogs la sogs pa la du ba la sogs pa'i rtags mthong la /
translated: Others say that in an inference for oneself, one sees the reason, such as smoke, on the subject, such as a mountain,

original: de las kyang 'brel pa dran pa yin la /
analyzed: de las kyang 'brel pa dran pa yin la /
translated: and from that one remembers the relation.

original: de las me yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las me yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: and from that, the cognition “there is fire” and so on.

original: de rnams la chos can mthong ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig gis brjod pa yin te /
analyzed: de rnams la chos can mthong ba ni dam bca' ba'i tshig gis brjod pa yin te /
translated: With regard to those, the seeing of the subject is expressed by the statement of the thesis.

original: gzhi ma grub pa nyid spangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhi ma grub pa nyid spangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the avoidance of the nonestablishment of the basis.

original: de yang chos can tsam bshad par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: de yang chos can tsam bshad par bya ba yin la /
translated: And that is to be explained as just the subject.

original: grub pa'i bsgrub bya nyid yin pa spags pa'i don du bsgrub bya'i chos dang bye brag can nyid kyis brjod pa yin la /
analyzed: grub pa'i bsgrub bya nyid yin pa spags pa'i don du bsgrub bya'i chos dang bye brag can nyid kyis brjod pa yin la /
translated: And it is expressed by the property of the thesis and the particularity in order to avoid the establishment of the probandum itself.

original: gtan tshigs kyis kyang rtags kyi sgrub byed nyid brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyis kyang rtags kyi sgrub byed nyid brjod pa yin no //
translated: And the reason also expresses the proof of the evidence.

original: gal te yang dpes bsgrub bya dang ldan ba nyid brjod pa yin na yang /
analyzed: gal te yang dpes bsgrub bya dang ldan ba nyid brjod pa yin na yang /
translated: And even if the example expresses the possession of the probandum,

original: de lta na yang sgrub byed ma brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang sgrub byed ma brjod pa yin no //
translated: in that case, the proof is not expressed.

original: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa la yang sbyar bya nyid dam sbyor byed nyid du dpes brjod par bya ba yin te /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa la yang sbyar bya nyid dam sbyor byed nyid du dpes brjod par bya ba yin te /
translated: And in the proof of the probandum, the example is to be expressed either as the object of application or as the means of application.

original: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid ni sbyor byed yin pas rtags yin la /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid la byas pa nyid ni sbyor byed yin pas rtags yin la /
translated: Since being produced is the means of application in the proof of impermanence, it is the evidence.

original: me la du ba ni @132a * //
analyzed: me la du ba ni @132a * //
translated: Smoke is the object to be applied to fire.

original: sbyar bya yin no zhes sbyar bya dang sbyor byed nyid du shes pa can gyi bsgrub bya chos can la yang yod par brjod pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni ma grub pa bsal ba'i phyir yin no //
analyzed: sbyar bya yin no zhes sbyar bya dang sbyor byed nyid du shes pa can gyi bsgrub bya chos can la yang yod par brjod pa'i mjug bsdu ba ni ma grub pa bsal ba'i phyir yin no //
translated: The conclusion is stated in order to eliminate the nonestablished.

original: dam bca' ba'i 'og tu gtan tshigs kyi tshig las chos can la yod par go bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dam bca' ba'i 'og tu gtan tshigs kyi tshig las chos can la yod par go bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: The word reason is not understood to be on the subject after the thesis,

original: chos can gyi bye brag gi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos can gyi bye brag gi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med par thal bar 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that there would be no pervasion of the example by the subject.

original: des na gtan tshigs kyi tshig la gnas skabs la ltos pa med do //
analyzed: des na gtan tshigs kyi tshig la gnas skabs la ltos pa med do //
translated: Therefore, the word reason does not depend on the context.

original: med na mi 'byung ba'i shes pa ni chos can la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
analyzed: med na mi 'byung ba'i shes pa ni chos can la nye bar sbyor ba yin no //
translated: The knowledge of the invariable concomitance is applied to the subject.

original: de'i bye brag thun mong ma yin pa nyid du dogs pa de bsal ba'i don du mjug sdud pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i bye brag thun mong ma yin pa nyid du dogs pa de bsal ba'i don du mjug sdud pa yin no //
translated: The conclusion is for the purpose of eliminating doubt about its uncommon particulars.

original: thun mong ma yin pa phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur ba bsal bas /
analyzed: thun mong ma yin pa phyin ci log tu thal bar 'gyur ba bsal bas /
translated: The noncommon pervasion is eliminated by the consequence of error.

original: bsgrub bya nye bar gzhag par byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bsgrub bya nye bar gzhag par byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the object to be established is placed near.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: rang gis rtogs pa yin na ni sngar med na mi 'byung bar mthong ba de las /
analyzed: rang gis rtogs pa yin na ni sngar med na mi 'byung bar mthong ba de las /
translated: If it were one's own understanding, then from seeing the invariable concomitance previously,

original: chos can la med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: chos can la med na mi 'byung ba mthong ba yin na /
translated: one would see the invariable concomitance with respect to the subject.

original: de las bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: de las bsgrub bya rtogs pa yin no //
translated: From that, one would understand the object to be established.

original: chos can la du ba ma mthong ba yin na mi 'byung ba dan pa'i dus phyis /
analyzed: chos can la du ba ma mthong ba yin na mi 'byung ba dan pa'i dus phyis /
translated: If one did not see smoke on the subject, then at the time of establishing the invariable concomitance,

original: de nyid 'di yin no zhes med na mi 'byung ba shes pa ma yin nam /🔽sngar ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid 'di yin no zhes med na mi 'byung ba shes pa ma yin nam / sngar ni ma yin no //
translated: how could one know that this is the invariable concomitance, thinking if this is not, that will not be?

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not like that.

original: de'i ngo bo mi shes na dran pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo mi shes na dran pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: If one did not know its nature, there would be no memory.

original: de'i phyir 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the apprehending cognition is not different.

original: rang gi rtogs pa kho na bzhin du gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i don du yang brjod pa ni gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te bum pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rang gi rtogs pa kho na bzhin du gzhan gyis rtogs pa'i don du yang brjod pa ni gang byas pa de mi rtag pa yin te bum pa lta bu'o //
translated: Just as it is one's own understanding, so too it is stated for the purpose of others' understanding: Whatever is produced is impermanent, like a pot.

original: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhe na bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: sgra yang byas pa yin no zhe na bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: In those cases, sound is also a product.

original: de rnams su yang sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba gzhi ma grub pa nyid yin pa dang / rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa yin pa yang bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams su yang sgra yang byas pa yin no zhes bya ba gzhi ma grub pa nyid yin pa dang / rang gi ngo bo ma grub pa yin pa yang bkag pa yin no //
translated: The statement that the reason is not established and the statement that the reason is not established with respect to its own nature are also negated.

original: lhag mas ni de'i bsgrub bya'i nges pa nyid du brjod pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang / thun mong ba nyid dang / phyin ci log gis khyab pa yang bkag pa yin no //
analyzed: lhag mas ni de'i bsgrub bya'i nges pa nyid du brjod pas thun mong ma yin pa nyid dang / thun mong ba nyid dang / phyin ci log gis khyab pa yang bkag pa yin no //
translated: The remaining statements express the certainty of the probandum. Therefore, the statements that the reason is not common and that the reason is contradictory are also negated.🔽If the reason is only certain,

original: sgrub par byed pa nyid nges pa can nyid kho na yin pa de brjod na /🔽brjod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa nyid nges pa can nyid kho na yin pa de brjod na / brjod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: then it is stated.

original: dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang mjug bsdu ba rnams brjod pa don med pa yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba dang / gtan tshigs dang mjug bsdu ba rnams brjod pa don med pa yin no //
translated: Because it is stated, it is meaningless to state the thesis, reason, and conclusion.

original: 'on te yang rang gi rtogs pa yin na chos can la yod par mthong ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te yang rang gi rtogs pa yin na chos can la yod par mthong ba dang / med na mi 'byung ba dran pa la sogs pa'i rim pa yin na /
translated: But if it is one’s own understanding, then it is the process of seeing that the reason exists in the subject and remembering that the reason is not absent when the property of the thesis is present.

original: 'di la yang @132b dam bca' ba'i sgrub byed kyi gzhi ma grub pa nyid bkag pa yin par bstan to //
analyzed: 'di la yang @132b dam bca' ba'i sgrub byed kyi gzhi ma grub pa nyid bkag pa yin par bstan to //
translated: Here, too, it is shown that the basis of the proof of the thesis is not established.

original: sgrub byed nyid ni gtan tshigs kyis bkag pa yin na ji ltar ma grub pa nyid yin par dogs pa yin gang gis nye bar sbyor ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur /
analyzed: sgrub byed nyid ni gtan tshigs kyis bkag pa yin na ji ltar ma grub pa nyid yin par dogs pa yin gang gis nye bar sbyor ba'i gnas skabs su 'gyur /
translated: If the proof itself is refuted by the reason, how can it be doubted that it is not established? By what is the occasion for application?

original: chos can gyi be brag gi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: chos can gyi be brag gi dpe la rjes su 'gro ba ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is there concomitance with the example that is a particular of the subject?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: chos can la yod pa shes pa yin zhes kho bo cag smra'i /
analyzed: chos can la yod pa shes pa yin zhes kho bo cag smra'i /
translated: We say that it is the cognition of what exists in the subject.

original: chos can gyi bye brag tu byas pa'i de nyid yin no zhes ni ma yin no //
analyzed: chos can gyi bye brag tu byas pa'i de nyid yin no zhes ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that it is just that which is made a particular of the subject.

original: bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba brjod pas kyang /
analyzed: bsgrub bya med na mi 'byung ba brjod pas kyang /
translated: Even by stating the invariable concomitance with the probandum,

original: sbyar bya la sogs pa nyid brjod na thun mong pa ma yin pa dang / cig shos nyid la sogs pa 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir mjug bsdu ba don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sbyar bya la sogs pa nyid brjod na thun mong pa ma yin pa dang / cig shos nyid la sogs pa 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i phyir mjug bsdu ba don dang ldan pa ma yin no //
translated: if the object of application, etc. are stated, then because the uncommon and the other, etc. are not designated, the conclusion is not meaningful.🔽Therefore, there are three parts,

original: des na yan lag gsum mam /
analyzed: des na yan lag gsum mam /
translated: Therefore, there are three branches.

original: yan lag gnyis pa'i ngag yin pa 'di dag tsam gyis rtogs pa rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yan lag gnyis pa'i ngag yin pa 'di dag tsam gyis rtogs pa rdzogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the perfection of realization is due to just these statements of the two branches.

original: 'jig rten na yan lag lnga'i dag gi tha snyad byed par mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten na yan lag lnga'i dag gi tha snyad byed par mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is seen in the world that the term “five branches” is used.

original: mkhas pa'i tha snyad kho na lhur blang bar byas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu 'brel pa med pa /
analyzed: mkhas pa'i tha snyad kho na lhur blang bar byas pa yin pa'i phyir shin tu 'brel pa med pa /
translated: It is quite unrelated because it is only the convention of the learned that is to be taken seriously.

original: byis pa rnams dga' bar byed pas chog go //
analyzed: byis pa rnams dga' bar byed pas chog go //
translated: It is enough to delight the childish.

original: gcig de lta bu nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig de lta bu nyid du mi rigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it is not reasonable for one to be like that,

original: mtshan nyid gsum pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: mtshan nyid gsum pa'i gtan tshigs kyang ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: how can the reason of the three characteristics be?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par bcad pa yin na /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs rnam par bcad pa yin na /
translated: If there is an exclusion of the discordant,

original: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin gyi /🔽lhan cig pa tsam ni ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba kho na ldog pa yin la /
analyzed: bsgrub bya dang sgrub byed kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba yin gyi / lhan cig pa tsam ni ma yin pa'i phyir rjes su 'gro ba kho na ldog pa yin la /
translated: then there is concomitance with the probandum and the proof,🔽but not mere simultaneity. Therefore, only concomitance is the counter pervasion,

original: ldog pa kho na rjes su 'gro ba yin par tha mi dad pa yang /
analyzed: ldog pa kho na rjes su 'gro ba yin par tha mi dad pa yang /
translated: and only the counter pervasion is concomitance. They are not different.

original: de dang de las ldog pa'i dbye ba las yin pa'i phyir de ltar brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de dang de las ldog pa'i dbye ba las yin pa'i phyir de ltar brjod pa yin no //
translated: The reason is stated in the opposite form, but it is understood in the opposite sense.

original: 'brel pa can yang kha cig tu ma dmigs pa yin na rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'brel pa can yang kha cig tu ma dmigs pa yin na rtogs pa'i yan lag ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And the related reason is sometimes not perceived, but it is not a part of the proof.

original: gtan tshigs ni mtshan nyid gsum pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: gtan tshigs ni mtshan nyid gsum pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: The reason has only three characteristics.

original: bzhi dang lnga dang gcig gi mtshan nyid can ni ma yin no //
analyzed: bzhi dang lnga dang gcig gi mtshan nyid can ni ma yin no //
translated: It does not have four or five characteristics.

original: de lta na ni khang chen la sogs pa sems dang mi ldan pa'i nye bar len pas bskyed pa ni /🔽blo dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs yod pa yin na /
analyzed: de lta na ni khang chen la sogs pa sems dang mi ldan pa'i nye bar len pas bskyed pa ni / blo dang ldan pa'i byin rlabs yod pa yin na /
translated: In that case, a great house, etc., which is produced by the appropriation of a non-sentient person,

original: 'grub par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
translated: is established if there is the blessing of an intelligent person.

original: de yod pa ma yin pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ni ma yin pa des na de la nges pa can yin no //
analyzed: de yod pa ma yin pa nam mkha' la sogs pa ni ma yin pa des na de la nges pa can yin no //
translated: But if that is not present, it is not like space, etc. Therefore, it is definite in that case.

original: de la tshad ma yin pa yang byas pa nyid bzhin du dang / mi rtag pa nyid ni khyim la sogs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: de la tshad ma yin pa yang byas pa nyid bzhin du dang / mi rtag pa nyid ni khyim la sogs pa lta bu'o //
translated: And the valid cognition is like the reason of being produced, and impermanence is like a house, etc.

original: sa gzhi la sogs @133a * //
analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs @133a * //
translated: The ground, etc.

original: pa la byin gyis rlob pa po ma mthong ba las kyang ma mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin par 'khrul pa ma yin te /
analyzed: pa la byin gyis rlob pa po ma mthong ba las kyang ma mthun pa'i phyogs nyid yin par 'khrul pa ma yin te /
translated: But it is not a mistake to say that the unseen is the unseen bestower of the blessing,

original: dbang po bzhin du ma mthong ba kho na'i byin gyis rlabs pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du ma mthong ba kho na'i byin gyis rlabs pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the unseen bestower of the blessing is only the unseen, like the sense organ.

original: dpe dang mi mthun pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe dang mi mthun pa yang ma yin te /
translated: And it is not a case of the example not being established,

original: blo dang ldan pa tsam la khyab par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo dang ldan pa tsam la khyab par byed pa nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir dang / de las gzhan pa'i rnam par dbye ba ni brjod par 'dod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the intelligent alone are understood to be the pervader, and because the classification of anything other than that is not intended.

original: mi snang ba'i byin gyis rlob pa po sems pa can ci las rtogs pa yin /
analyzed: mi snang ba'i byin gyis rlob pa po sems pa can ci las rtogs pa yin /
translated: But how is the unseen bestower of the blessing, the intelligent one, understood?

original: nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the appropriated aggregates are not intelligent.

original: khyim la sogs pa bzhin du sa gzhi la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can yin par bye brag ci yang med do //
analyzed: khyim la sogs pa bzhin du sa gzhi la sogs pa'i nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can yin par bye brag ci yang med do //
translated: There is no difference at all in the case of the intelligent one, such as the house, etc., and the appropriated earth, etc.

original: des na sems med pa'i byed pa po rnams bsam pa dang ldan pa la ltos pa yin par gnyi ga la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir zhing la sogs pa la byin gyis rlob pa po sems pa can yin par grub pa yin gyi /
analyzed: des na sems med pa'i byed pa po rnams bsam pa dang ldan pa la ltos pa yin par gnyi ga la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir zhing la sogs pa la byin gyis rlob pa po sems pa can yin par grub pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, since it is the same for both that the mindless agents are dependent on the sentient being, it is established that the sentient being is the one who blesses the field, etc.

original: de'i phyir chos can rnams kyi dbye bas 'byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir chos can rnams kyi dbye bas 'byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that the distinction is made on the basis of the distinction of the subjects.

original: yul de ni de la bye brag can du byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
analyzed: yul de ni de la bye brag can du byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i rigs pas so //
translated: The object is not what makes the distinction.

original: gang gi phyir byas pa nyid dam mi rtag pa nyid kyang sgra dang bum pa'i dbye pas 'byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir byas pa nyid dam mi rtag pa nyid kyang sgra dang bum pa'i dbye pas 'byed pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the distinction is not made on the basis of the distinction of sound and pot with respect to being a product or impermanent.

original: de'i phyir de ltar sems pa can dang thun mong du grub pa ni me'i spyi'i bzhin du /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sems pa can dang thun mong du grub pa ni me'i spyi'i bzhin du /
translated: Therefore, just as the generality of fire is established in common with the particular instances of fire,

original: rnag gi bsgrub pa dang mi 'gal ba can gyi bye brag 'phen par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rnag gi bsgrub pa dang mi 'gal ba can gyi bye brag 'phen par byed pa yin no //
