translated: the particular instance of the sentient being is inferred through the proof that is not in conflict with the establishment of the generality of the sentient being.

original: khyim la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa po sems pa can ni /
analyzed: khyim la sogs pa'i sgrub par byed pa po sems pa can ni /
translated: The sentient being is the one who establishes the house, etc.

original: 'di'i byin gyis rlob pa'i nus pa can ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di'i byin gyis rlob pa'i nus pa can ma yin la /
translated: It does not have the power to bless.🔽

original: de kho na bzhin du lus kyi bya bas byin gyis rlob pa po nyid kyang ma yin te /🔽thug pa med pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod pas thun mong du grub pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro //🔽ji ltar yang bdag cag la sogs pa sems pa can ni lus la 'du ba can ni bya ba med na lus gzhan ma rtogs pa de yongs su shes pa tsam mam /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du lus kyi bya bas byin gyis rlob pa po nyid kyang ma yin te / thug pa med pa la sogs pa'i skyon yod pas thun mong du grub pa 'gal ba'i phyir ro // ji ltar yang bdag cag la sogs pa sems pa can ni lus la 'du ba can ni bya ba med na lus gzhan ma rtogs pa de yongs su shes pa tsam mam /
translated: It is not that the body is the agent of blessing, because it is not the case that the body has the power to bless.🔽Nor is the body the agent of blessing in the sense that it is the agent of blessing by means of the action of the body, because the error of infinite regress would ensue.

original: 'dod pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlob par byed pa po ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang 'gyur ro //🔽khyim la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa po ni shing dang so phag la sogs pa 'di dag tsam gyis 'di rdzogs pa yin no zhes nges par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: 'dod pa tsam gyis byin gyis rlob par byed pa po ma yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang 'gyur ro // khyim la sogs pa sgrub par byed pa po ni shing dang so phag la sogs pa 'di dag tsam gyis 'di rdzogs pa yin no zhes nges par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: Just as we and others who are sentient beings do not bless the body by mere understanding or mere desire when the body is not engaged in action, so it is in this case.🔽The agent who constructs a house, etc. does not determine that the house is complete by merely these bricks, etc.

original: de lta na ni sa gzhi la sogs pa la yang ci'i phyir nges par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: de lta na ni sa gzhi la sogs pa la yang ci'i phyir nges par byed pa ma yin /
translated: If that is so, why does he not determine that the house is complete by merely the earth, etc.?

original: rngul phran gnyis can la sogs pa dbang po las 'das pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams yod pa la chad ma cung zad kyang med @133b do ;
analyzed: rngul phran gnyis can la sogs pa dbang po las 'das pa rnams kyi bya ba rnams yod pa la chad ma cung zad kyang med @133b do ;
translated: There is not the slightest incompleteness in the existence of the actions of those with two or more sweat glands and so on, who are beyond the senses.

original: /'on te re zhig sems pa can gyis byin gyis rlob par byed pa po yod pa ni /🔽ci las shes pa po yod pa yin pa'am /
analyzed: /'on te re zhig sems pa can gyis byin gyis rlob par byed pa po yod pa ni / ci las shes pa po yod pa yin pa'am /
translated: But if you say that the existence of the experiencer is known from the existence of the experiencer,🔽is it known from the existence of the experiencer of the effect?🔽Or is it known from the existence of the experiencer of the special?

original: khyad par las kyang rung 'di la 'gegs pa po ma yin no //
analyzed: khyad par las kyang rung 'di la 'gegs pa po ma yin no //
translated: We do not refute that.

original: de de ltar sems pa can spyi ni 'phangs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i khyad par te /
analyzed: de de ltar sems pa can spyi ni 'phangs pa dang mi 'gal ba'i khyad par te /
translated: In that way, the general experiencer is not contradicted by the thesis,

original: dbang phyug gi sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dbang phyug gi sgras brjod par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because it is the referent of the word “Īśvara.”

original: de'i brjod bya ma yin pa'i phyir skyon spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i brjod bya ma yin pa'i phyir skyon spangs pa yin no //
translated: Since it is not the referent of that, the fault is avoided.

original: de da ni gcig gam du ma yin zhes bsam par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: de da ni gcig gam du ma yin zhes bsam par bya ba yin no //
translated: Now, is it one or many?

original: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i gcig pa nyid dam /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'bras bu'i gcig pa nyid dam /
translated: Because of the oneness or manyness of the effect,

original: du ma nyid la ni de'i gcig nyid dam /
analyzed: du ma nyid la ni de'i gcig nyid dam /
translated: its oneness or manyness is ascertained.

original: du ma nyid kyis tshad ma yod pa ma yin te du ma las kyang gcig yin la gcig las kyang du ma yin te /
analyzed: du ma nyid kyis tshad ma yod pa ma yin te du ma las kyang gcig yin la gcig las kyang du ma yin te /
translated: It is not a valid cognition because of being manifold, because one is also from many and many are also from one.

original: bzo bo mkhas pa las mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bzo bo mkhas pa las mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is seen from the skill of the craftsman.

original: smras pa du ma yin na gcig la gcig rnam par nyams par bya bar 'dod pa rnams /
analyzed: smras pa du ma yin na gcig la gcig rnam par nyams par bya bar 'dod pa rnams /
translated: Objection: If it is manifold, it is definitely one because of the desire to destroy one another,

original: rang dbang gis phar 'dren tshur 'dren byed pas 'bras bu mi mthong bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gcig yin par nges pa yin no //
analyzed: rang dbang gis phar 'dren tshur 'dren byed pas 'bras bu mi mthong bar thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gcig yin par nges pa yin no //
translated: and because of the consequence that the result is not seen due to the independent drawing of one another.

original: du ma nyid yin na yang bsam pa mthun pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu grub pa nyid du mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: du ma nyid yin na yang bsam pa mthun pa rnams kyi ni 'bras bu grub pa nyid du mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: Even if it is manifold, the result is seen to be accomplished for those who have a common purpose.

original: bden mod kyi de lta bur rtog pa ni rtog pa mang por 'gyur te /
analyzed: bden mod kyi de lta bur rtog pa ni rtog pa mang por 'gyur te /
translated: Reply: True, but the conception of it in that way becomes a conception of many.

original: de rnams kho na tha dad pa'i nus pa can rnams dang / tshogs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pas gcig yin par rtog pa yin no //
analyzed: de rnams kho na tha dad pa'i nus pa can rnams dang / tshogs pa la sogs pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pas gcig yin par rtog pa yin no //
translated: It is the conception of one due to the fear of the afflictions of those very different potencies, of the collection, etc.

original: gang yang gang du nges pa can ma yin pa de ni de'i go byed ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang gang du nges pa can ma yin pa de ni de'i go byed ma yin te /
translated: And that which is not ascertained as being something is not a reason for that.🔽For example, the fact that something is the product of a potter is a reason for its being a pot, but it is not a reason for its being a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.

original: ji ltar 'jig ba'i 'gyur ba nyid ni rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bu nyid yin pa ni mdog skya ba nyid dang me'i ni ma yin no //🔽de med na yang khyim gyi rab dang ba gam la sogs pa dang khang chen dkar po la sogs pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //🔽'bras bu yang byed pa po dang / byed pa dang las sngon du 'gro ba can gyi bum pa la sogs pa mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig ba'i 'gyur ba nyid ni rdza mkhan gyi 'bras bu nyid yin pa ni mdog skya ba nyid dang me'i ni ma yin no // de med na yang khyim gyi rab dang ba gam la sogs pa dang khang chen dkar po la sogs pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro // 'bras bu yang byed pa po dang / byed pa dang las sngon du 'gro ba can gyi bum pa la sogs pa mthong ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.🔽And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.🔽And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.

original: sa gzhi la sogs pa la yang 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs pa la yang 'bras bu yin te /
translated: And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.

original: yan lag dang bcas pa'i phyir de lta bur 'gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: yan lag dang bcas pa'i phyir de lta bur 'gyur pa yin no //
translated: And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.

original: rang dbang can gyi byed pa po mo nyid ni sems pa can kho na yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang dbang can gyi byed pa po mo nyid ni sems pa can kho na yin pa'i phyir /
translated: And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.🔽And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.🔽And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.

original: 'phags pa'i bye brag can gyi spyi ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bye brag can gyi spyi ni rjes su dpag pa'i yul yin par grub pa yin no //
translated: And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.🔽And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.🔽And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire.🔽And even if it were a reason, it would not be a reason for the fact that it is a product of fire, because it is not ascertained as being a product of fire.🔽And even if it were ascertained, it would not be a reason, because it is not a reason for the fact that it is

original: de bzhin du rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon yang med pa yin te /🔽rjes su dpag pa thams cad chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang shugs kyis grub @134a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du rjes su mi 'jug pa'i skyon yang med pa yin te / rjes su dpag pa thams cad chad par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang shugs kyis grub @134a * //
translated: Likewise, there is no fault of non-pervasion.

original: pa'i bye brag nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: pa'i bye brag nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because all inferences would be cut off, and because the distinction is established by implication.

original: shugs ni tshad ma gzhan yang ma yin te /
analyzed: shugs ni tshad ma gzhan yang ma yin te /
translated: Implication is not another means of valid cognition,

original: rjes su dpag pa nyid ni de tsam du lhur blangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa nyid ni de tsam du lhur blangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because inference itself is so intent on that.

original: gzhan du na spyi tsam yul yin pa nyid kyis grub pa la sgrub pa yin nas rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na spyi tsam yul yin pa nyid kyis grub pa la sgrub pa yin nas rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, since it would be established by the mere object of the universal, it would be a proof, and it would follow that inference is not a means of valid cognition.

original: 'dis ni mngon sum yul gzhan la sogs pa las ldog pa'i bye brag rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni mngon sum yul gzhan la sogs pa las ldog pa'i bye brag rnam par 'jog par byed pa yin par bshad pa yin no //
translated: This explains that perception establishes the distinction of the exclusion of other objects, etc.

original: de rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: de rnam par 'jog par byed pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If it does not establish that,

original: 'jug pa'i yul nye bar ma mthong bas tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i yul nye bar ma mthong bas tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, since the engaged object is not seen, it would not be a means of valid cognition.

original: byed pa po'i nus pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byed pa po nyid ni 'das pa la sogs pa la mthong ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: byed pa po'i nus pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi byed pa po nyid ni 'das pa la sogs pa la mthong ba nyid yin te /
translated: The agent itself, which is characterized by the complete knowledge of the power of the agent, is seen in the past, etc.

original: de la rdza mkhan la sogs par brtag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la rdza mkhan la sogs par brtag pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not imagined in the potter, etc.

original: de yang rang gi 'bras bu la byed pa po'i nus pa thams cad kyis shes pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de yang rang gi 'bras bu la byed pa po'i nus pa thams cad kyis shes pa mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the power of the agent in its own effect is seen.

original: de yang de ltar mthong ba'i byed brag gi yul gyi khyab par gyis phul du byung bas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang de ltar mthong ba'i byed brag gi yul gyi khyab par gyis phul du byung bas na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brjod pa yin no //
translated: And that is called omniscience because it is the preeminent pervasion of the object of that seeing.

original: khyad par de nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir ji ltar 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin zhing /
analyzed: khyad par de nyid ma mthong ba'i phyir ji ltar 'brel pa 'dzin pa yin zhing /
translated: Since that distinction is not seen, how can there be the apprehension of the relation?

original: ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin zhe na /
translated: And how can there be inference?

original: de lta yin na gzugs la sogs pa rnam par rig pa tsam las ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin na mig la sogs pa rnams ni byin gyis rlob pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta yin na gzugs la sogs pa rnam par rig pa tsam las ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i rjes su dpag pa yin na mig la sogs pa rnams ni byin gyis rlob pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no //
translated: If that were so, how can there be the inference of the eye, etc. from mere representations of form, etc.? The eye, etc. are not the nature of the blessing.

original: de'i nye bar dmigs pa las bya ba ni byed pas sgrub par byed pa ma yin par mthong bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nye bar dmigs pa las bya ba ni byed pas sgrub par byed pa ma yin par mthong bar bya ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is seen that the action of the object of the action is not established by the agent.

original: rnam par rig pa la yang bya ba las byed pa grub pa yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa la yang bya ba las byed pa grub pa yin la /
translated: In the case of consciousness, the agent is established from the action.

original: bye brag la yongs su dpyod pas byed pa po'i bye brag grub pa yin pa de bzhin du byed pa po'i bsgrub bya'i bya ba ma mthong ba dang / bya ba'i bye brag la yongs su dpyod pas byed pa po'i bye brag grub pa'i phyir log par rtogs par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag la yongs su dpyod pas byed pa po'i bye brag grub pa yin pa de bzhin du byed pa po'i bsgrub bya'i bya ba ma mthong ba dang / bya ba'i bye brag la yongs su dpyod pas byed pa po'i bye brag grub pa'i phyir log par rtogs par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: And just as the agent is established by the analysis of the particulars of the action, in the same way, the agent is not to be refuted because the action of the object of the action of the agent is not seen and the agent is established by the analysis of the particulars of the action.

original: bye brag grub pa yin yang bye brag thams cad grub pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: bye brag grub pa yin yang bye brag thams cad grub pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Although the particulars are established, not all particulars are established.

original: gang sgrub par byed pa ji snyed pa'i don rtogs pa la khyab par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: gang sgrub par byed pa ji snyed pa'i don rtogs pa la khyab par byed pa yin la /
translated: The establishment of the object that is to be established by the agent is the pervasion of the understanding of the object that is to be established by the agent.

original: de las de rnyed pa kho na nges pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de las de rnyed pa kho na nges pa yin gyi /
translated: It is certain that the object is found from that,

original: don gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: but not from another object.

original: gang gi phyir mes khyab pa'i du pa'i bye brag tsam du sgrub pa yin yang /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mes khyab pa'i du pa'i bye brag tsam du sgrub pa yin yang /
translated: Because although the particular of smoke that is pervaded by fire is established,

original: rtsva la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i bye brag ni grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtsva la sogs pa'i ngo bo'i bye brag ni grub pa ma yin no //
translated: The difference in the nature of grass, etc. is not established.

original: de ma grub na cig shos bye @134b brag grub kyang /
analyzed: de ma grub na cig shos bye @134b brag grub kyang /
translated: If that is not established, then even if the other is established,

original: don byed pa don du gnyer ba mi 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don byed pa don du gnyer ba mi 'jug pa ni ma yin te /
translated: the one who seeks to perform a function does not engage in it.

original: de'i phyir 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa rnams la de'i nye bar len pa dang nye bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin shin tu bskal pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa rnams la de'i nye bar len pa dang nye bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin shin tu bskal pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, in the case of the great elements, etc., the nature of their appropriation and production, etc. is very remote.

original: tshu rol mthong bas de yongs su shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor bar byed pa po nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshu rol mthong bas de yongs su shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi sbyor bar byed pa po nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore, it is impossible for one who sees only the near side to engage in practice preceded by the complete knowledge of that.

original: de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i bye brag ni de'i sgrub byed brjod pa kho na las thams cad du 'grub pa'i phyir bye brag dang 'gal ba can rnams nub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i mngon par 'dod pa'i bye brag ni de'i sgrub byed brjod pa kho na las thams cad du 'grub pa'i phyir bye brag dang 'gal ba can rnams nub pa yin no //
translated: And because the desired difference of that is established everywhere by the mere statement of its proof, those who contradict the difference are refuted.

original: las rnams kyi sa bon rnams la de grub pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: las rnams kyi sa bon rnams la de grub pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that what is already established is established again, because that is established in the seeds of the actions.

original: gang gi phyir sems pa can yin pa'i las ni sems pa can ma yin pa'i byin gyis rlob pa po ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems pa can yin pa'i las ni sems pa can ma yin pa'i byin gyis rlob pa po ma yin te /
translated: Because a sentient being does not consecrate an insentient action,

original: bsam pa med pa nyid kyis yul la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa nyid kyis 'bras bu skyed par byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / byed pa po nyid ni nye bar len pa la sogs pa la yod pa'i nus pa yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bsam pa med pa nyid kyis yul la sogs pa'i nges pa med pa nyid kyis 'bras bu skyed par byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / byed pa po nyid ni nye bar len pa la sogs pa la yod pa'i nus pa yongs su shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not generate an effect, since it would be devoid of thought and devoid of determination of object, etc., and because the nature of an agent is the understanding of the power that exists in the appropriator, etc.

original: 'on te sems pa can gyi las yin pa de lta ya yang de tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis sa gzhi la sogs pa'i rgyu la sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te sems pa can gyi las yin pa de lta ya yang de tshu rol mthong ba rnams kyis sa gzhi la sogs pa'i rgyu la sbyor bar byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But even if it were the action of a sentient being, those who see only the present would not apply it to the cause of the earth, etc.

original: spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not their domain.

original: don thams cad rig pa po'i sems yin no zhe na /
analyzed: don thams cad rig pa po'i sems yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the mind of one who knows all objects is the cause,

original: ma yin te ;
analyzed: ma yin te ;
translated: that is not so.

original: / de ni byed pa po nyid yin par khas mi len pa'i phyir la khas len pa yin na ni de nyid dbang phyug byed pa po yin no //
analyzed: / de ni byed pa po nyid yin par khas mi len pa'i phyir la khas len pa yin na ni de nyid dbang phyug byed pa po yin no //
translated: Because we do not accept that it is an agent, and if we did accept it, then it alone would be the almighty agent.

original: be'u la sogs pa phal cher bskyed pa'i don du'o ma la sogs pa phyin gyis brlabs pa med na ji ltar cher skye ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: be'u la sogs pa phal cher bskyed pa'i don du'o ma la sogs pa phyin gyis brlabs pa med na ji ltar cher skye ba yin zhe na /
translated: If there were no consecration of milk, etc. for the purpose of nourishing calves, etc., how could they grow?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.🔽

original: de la yang byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgrub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are also established by consecration.

original: gzhan du na be'u shi ba'am chen skyes pa na'ang /
analyzed: gzhan du na be'u shi ba'am chen skyes pa na'ang /
translated: Otherwise, when the calf dies or is born,

original: 'o ma 'phel ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o ma 'phel ba'i phyir rgyun mi 'chad par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: the milk would increase without interruption,

original: sems med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is without mind.

original: des na de ltar rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can nyid yin pas /
analyzed: des na de ltar rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can nyid yin pas /
translated: Thus, since inference has a universal for its object,

original: bye brag la ltos pa yin pas 'gal ba can bzhin du /
analyzed: bye brag la ltos pa yin pas 'gal ba can bzhin du /
translated: it is dependent on a particular, and so, like a contradiction,

original: dpe la bsgrub bya ba tshang ba nyid bsal bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: dpe la bsgrub bya ba tshang ba nyid bsal bar bya ba yin te /
translated: the completeness of the probandum in the example is to be refuted,

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la bye brag 'phel ba'i phyir ro //🔽ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la bye brag 'phel ba'i phyir ro // ji lta bur mthong ba de lta bur yin no //
translated: because in all inferences the particular increases.🔽It is just as it is seen.

original: bden te / 'di la yang mthong ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: bden te / 'di la yang mthong ba nyid yin te /
translated: It is true, but here it is just as it is seen.

original: 'bras bu shin tu chen po nyid yin pa'i @135a * //
analyzed: 'bras bu shin tu chen po nyid yin pa'i @135a * //
translated: The effect is very great.

original: phyir / rgyu yang de bzhin yin no zhes 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: phyir / rgyu yang de bzhin yin no zhes 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not that the cause is apprehended as being only that.

original: de ltar na med na mi 'byung bar rab tu grub pa'i rjes su dpag pas thams cad byed pa por de yongs su shes pa dang ldan par yang grub pa yin na 'bras bu 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa'i byed pa po dbang phyug ma yin te
analyzed: de ltar na med na mi 'byung bar rab tu grub pa'i rjes su dpag pas thams cad byed pa por de yongs su shes pa dang ldan par yang grub pa yin na 'bras bu 'byung ba chen po la sogs pa'i byed pa po dbang phyug ma yin te
translated: Thus, by the inference that establishes the necessary relation, it is established that the creator of all things is omniscient. But God is not the creator of the great elements and so forth, the effects,

original: / gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: / gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because he is an object of knowledge.

original: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du rjes su dpag pa gzhan bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du rjes su dpag pa gzhan bsal ba yin te /
translated: Like a pot, etc., he is refuted by another inference.

original: de la bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir dang / phyogs kyi bye brag ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la bsgrub bya ma tshang ba'i phyir dang / phyogs kyi bye brag ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the probandum is incomplete and because the specific property of the subject is not established.

original: byed pa po'i dgos pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po'i dgos pa ci zhig yin zhe na /
translated: What is the purpose of a creator?

original: dgos pa'i bsam pas med par ni ;
analyzed: dgos pa'i bsam pas med par ni ;
translated: Without a purpose,

original: / rmongs pa'ang 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: / rmongs pa'ang 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: even the ignorant do not engage.

original: gzhan gyi don byed par 'dod pas 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don byed par 'dod pas 'jug pa ni /
translated: Engaging with the desire to benefit others

original: gzhan du mi 'thad par grub pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan du mi 'thad par grub pa yin la /
translated: is not tenable for others.

original: 'jug pa yang 'bras bu las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jug pa yang 'bras bu las gzhan du mi 'thad pa'i phyir /
translated: And it is not tenable that engagement is other than the effect.

original: gzhan gyi don gyis bskul pas bde ba kho na skyed par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan gyi don gyis bskul pas bde ba kho na skyed par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, it is only the one who is urged by the aim of others who generates happiness.

original: sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the one who is miserable.

original: zhe na / chos dang chos ma yin pa'i thabs sna tshogs pa can gyi byed pa po ni /
analyzed: zhe na / chos dang chos ma yin pa'i thabs sna tshogs pa can gyi byed pa po ni /
translated: The one who is the agent of various means of virtue and nonvirtue

original: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa mthong ba las /
analyzed: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa mthong ba las /
translated: is inferred from seeing various effects.

original: rjes su dpog pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: rjes su dpog pa yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: Therefore, there is no fault.

original: 'di de bzhin du byed pa rang gi don yin pa dang / don ma yin pa rnam par bcom pa gang yin /
analyzed: 'di de bzhin du byed pa rang gi don yin pa dang / don ma yin pa rnam par bcom pa gang yin /
translated: The one who acts in this way is the one who is engaged for his own aim and who destroys the aim of others.

original: gang yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gang yang ma yin no //
translated: There is no one who is engaged for the aim of others.

original: ci'i don du de ltar byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ci'i don du de ltar byed pa yin gyi /
translated: For whose aim does he act in this way?

original: ji ltar nyi ma rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin de kho na bzhin du 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar nyi ma rang bzhin gyis gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin de kho na bzhin du 'jug pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Just as the sun, by its very nature, shines, so too does he engage by his very nature.

original: 'di sems pa can yin pas ci zhig du 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di sems pa can yin pas ci zhig du 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is the use of his being intelligent?

original: don rnams kyis kye ba'i rgyu ji snyed yin pa de snyed pa kho na la byin gyis rlob pa las byed pa po rjes su dpog pas dpog par byed pa yin gyi /
analyzed: don rnams kyis kye ba'i rgyu ji snyed yin pa de snyed pa kho na la byin gyis rlob pa las byed pa po rjes su dpog pas dpog par byed pa yin gyi /
translated: The number of causes of the object is the number of causes that are empowered. The agent is inferred from the effect.

original: gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin la /
analyzed: gzhan rnams kyi ni ma yin la /
translated: The agent is not inferred from other causes.

original: sems pa can yin ba dang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: sems pa can yin ba dang 'gal ba med do //
translated: There is no contradiction with the fact that the agent is conscious.

original: de'i phyir yod pa la dmigs par byed pa'i tshad ma ldog pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa la dmigs par byed pa'i tshad ma ldog pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cessation of valid knowledge that observes existence is not the case.

original: don 'di la mig sna tshogs dang / kha sna tshogs dang / lag pa sna tshogs dang / rkang pa sna tshogs pa can te lag pa dag gis bus pa las phun sum tshogs pa dang / rig byed gsum po dang / mtho ris dang /
analyzed: don 'di la mig sna tshogs dang / kha sna tshogs dang / lag pa sna tshogs dang / rkang pa sna tshogs pa can te lag pa dag gis bus pa las phun sum tshogs pa dang / rig byed gsum po dang / mtho ris dang /
translated: In this matter, the various eyes, the various mouths, the various hands, and the various feet, by the various hands, the perfection, the three Vedas, heaven,

original: sa gzhi rnams skyed par byed pa'i lha cig yin zhes /
analyzed: sa gzhi rnams skyed par byed pa'i lha cig yin zhes /
translated: and the earth are generated by the god Narayana.

original: lung las kyang 'byung ba yin la drang srong rgyas pas kyang /
analyzed: lung las kyang 'byung ba yin la drang srong rgyas pas kyang /
translated: This is also stated in the scriptures. The sage Vyasa also says:

original: skyes bu'i mchog @135b gzhan ni /
analyzed: skyes bu'i mchog @135b gzhan ni /
translated: Another supreme person

original: dam pa'i bdag nyid ces brjod pa //
analyzed: dam pa'i bdag nyid ces brjod pa //
translated: is called the self of the Vedas.

original: gang yin khams gsum nang bzhugs pas //🔽dbang phyug rtag pas byas pa yin //
analyzed: gang yin khams gsum nang bzhugs pas // dbang phyug rtag pas byas pa yin //
translated: Because he resides in the three worlds,

original: zhes smras pa'o //
analyzed: zhes smras pa'o //
translated: he is the creator, the eternal one, the powerful one.

original: chos la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du /
analyzed: chos la sogs pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du /
translated: Just as the nature of dharma, etc.,

original: lung ni thams cad du rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i yul can yin te /🔽de'i yul can nyid yin la /
analyzed: lung ni thams cad du rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa'i yul can yin te / de'i yul can nyid yin la /
translated: is the object of the cognition of its own nature,🔽so too is the Veda,

original: de ma rtogs pa yin na /
analyzed: de ma rtogs pa yin na /
translated: because if it were not the object of that cognition,

original: de la 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / tshad ma rnams ni rtogs par byed pa nyid tsam bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'jug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang / tshad ma rnams ni rtogs par byed pa nyid tsam bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it would follow that it would not be engaged, and because the means of valid knowledge are not merely the cause of the cognition of their objects.

original: de la skyes bu'i don nyid ni dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa bsgrub pa yin la de nyid rig nas 'chi ba las rgal bar 'gro ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de la skyes bu'i don nyid ni dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa bsgrub pa yin la de nyid rig nas 'chi ba las rgal bar 'gro ba yin gyi /
translated: The purpose of a person is to establish the cognition of the nature of the powerful one, and having known that, one goes beyond death.

original: gang gis byang grol sgrub par 'gro bar byed pa'i lam gzhan yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis byang grol sgrub par 'gro bar byed pa'i lam gzhan yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: There is no other path by which one goes to establish liberation.

original: thams cad shes pa ma yin pa rnams kyis thams cad shes pa yin par ji ltar shes pa yin zhes bya ba yang mi rigs pa yin te //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa ma yin pa rnams kyis thams cad shes pa yin par ji ltar shes pa yin zhes bya ba yang mi rigs pa yin te //
translated: It is also illogical to ask, “How do those who do not know everything know that he knows everything?”

original: gang gi phyir 'jig rten gyi rdza mkhan la sogs pa'i byed pa po rnams kyis de'i shes bya dang / shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kho nas de mkhas pa yin par go ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'jig rten gyi rdza mkhan la sogs pa'i byed pa po rnams kyis de'i shes bya dang / shes pa dang ldan pa rnams kho nas de mkhas pa yin par go ba ni ma yin te /
translated: Because the potters and other makers of the world are not understood to be experts by those who know their objects of knowledge and know them.

original: sna tshogs pa rig pa zhes bya bar phyis kyang de rtogs par grub pa yin no //
analyzed: sna tshogs pa rig pa zhes bya bar phyis kyang de rtogs par grub pa yin no //
translated: It is established that they are understood to be experts later, when they are known to be skilled.

original: de bzhin du lung las kyang thams cad shes pa bsnyen pa las /
analyzed: de bzhin du lung las kyang thams cad shes pa bsnyen pa las /
translated: Similarly, in the scriptures, it is said that by serving the Omniscient One,

original: me'i sbyin sreg mtho ris sgrub par byed pa yin pa bzhin du byang grol sgrub par byed pa nyid du sgrub pa ni thams cad shes pa la gsol pa btab pas /
analyzed: me'i sbyin sreg mtho ris sgrub par byed pa yin pa bzhin du byang grol sgrub par byed pa nyid du sgrub pa ni thams cad shes pa la gsol pa btab pas /
translated: just as fire sacrifice accomplishes the higher realms, it accomplishes the attainment of liberation.

original: sngon gyi las sad pa ni mchog sbyin pa yin par mi rigs te /
analyzed: sngon gyi las sad pa ni mchog sbyin pa yin par mi rigs te /
translated: It is illogical that the granting of boons is due to the awakening of past karma.

original: de rab tu sad pa las kyang skyes pu'i don ni de'i tshig las 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rab tu sad pa las kyang skyes pu'i don ni de'i tshig las 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and from that, the meaning of the Veda is produced.

original: lung las rna ba la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid du rtogs pa bzhin du de la 'gal ba yod pa ni ma yin la /
analyzed: lung las rna ba la sogs pa la rtag pa nyid du rtogs pa bzhin du de la 'gal ba yod pa ni ma yin la /
translated: There is no contradiction in the Veda, as there is in the case of the knowledge of permanence in the ear, etc.

original: rtag pa nyid la yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag pa nyid la yang ma yin no //
translated: Nor is there any contradiction in permanence.

original: de ma thag de'i zhal rnams las //
analyzed: de ma thag de'i zhal rnams las //
translated: From the mouths of those who are born from that,

original: rig byed bzhi po rnams 'phros pa //
analyzed: rig byed bzhi po rnams 'phros pa //
translated: the four Vedas are produced.

original: dus gzhan re re nyid la ni //
analyzed: dus gzhan re re nyid la ni //
translated: In each period of time,

original: thos pa gzhan ni sgrub byed yin //
analyzed: thos pa gzhan ni sgrub byed yin //
translated: another hearing is the proof.

original: zhes smos ba'o //
analyzed: zhes smos ba'o //
translated: This is what is said.

original: rig byed dang ai ti ha sa la sogs pa rnams la bcos ma nyid du dran pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rig byed dang ai ti ha sa la sogs pa rnams la bcos ma nyid du dran pa'i phyir /
translated: Because of the memory of the artificiality of the Vedas, the Itihasa, and so on,

original: bye brag can gyi skyes bu byed pa po nyid du grub pa'i phyir skyes bu ni dbang phyug yin no //
analyzed: bye brag can gyi skyes bu byed pa po nyid du grub pa'i phyir skyes bu ni dbang phyug yin no //
translated: the particular person is established as the creator, therefore the person is God.

original: lung las grub pa'i rdzas ni gtsang sbra dang gtsang sbra ma yin pa bzhin du /🔽rjes su dpag pas kyang bsal ba @136a * //
analyzed: lung las grub pa'i rdzas ni gtsang sbra dang gtsang sbra ma yin pa bzhin du / rjes su dpag pas kyang bsal ba @136a * //
translated: The substance established by scripture, like purity and impurity,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: is not refuted by inference.

original: yul thams cad la de'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa dang / lung dang sna tshogs pa rig pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: yul thams cad la de'i shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa dang / lung dang sna tshogs pa rig pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pas kyang rtogs pa yin no //
translated: And the cognition of all objects is also understood through such statements as “inference, scripture, and the cognition of the various arts.”

original: de lta bu las kyang de lta bu'i byed pa rtogs pa yin na yang /
analyzed: de lta bu las kyang de lta bu'i byed pa rtogs pa yin na yang /
translated: Even though one understands that such an effect is produced from such a cause,

original: rtog pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir rtag pa nyid la tshad ma dang 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: rtog pa chen por 'gyur ba'i phyir rtag pa nyid la tshad ma dang 'gal ba med do //
translated: since it would be a great conceptualization, there is no contradiction with valid knowledge regarding the permanent.

original: lung las kyang /
analyzed: lung las kyang /
translated: Also, from scripture:

original: byad pa po nyid yin yang /
analyzed: byad pa po nyid yin yang /
translated: Even though he is the creator,

original: bzhi po lhan cig grub pa ni //
analyzed: bzhi po lhan cig grub pa ni //
translated: the four are established together:

original: bde dang shes pa mtha' yas tshangs //
analyzed: bde dang shes pa mtha' yas tshangs //
translated: bliss, consciousness, infinity, and purity.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is stated.

original: thos pa las kyang /
analyzed: thos pa las kyang /
translated: Also, from the oral tradition:

original: lag pa rkang pa yod med bzhin //
analyzed: lag pa rkang pa yod med bzhin //
translated: Like having or not having hands and feet,

original: 'dzin dang mig med bzhin mthong dang // rna ba med bzhin thos pa ni //
analyzed: 'dzin dang mig med bzhin mthong dang // rna ba med bzhin thos pa ni //
translated: seeing without eyes, and hearing without ears,

original: sna tshogs rig pa de yin la //
analyzed: sna tshogs rig pa de yin la //
translated: that is the cognition of the various arts.

original: gzhan ni de rig pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan ni de rig pa med do //
translated: The others do not have that cognition.🔽And:

original: zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu'i che mchog de skad smra //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / skyes bu'i che mchog de skad smra //
translated: The supreme greatness of a person is said to be like this.

original: zhes smos pas kyang /
analyzed: zhes smos pas kyang /
translated: Thus it is stated.

original: byed pa rnams bkag pas rtag pa nyid kho nar grub pa yin la /
analyzed: byed pa rnams bkag pas rtag pa nyid kho nar grub pa yin la /
translated: Since the activity is refuted, permanence is established.

original: blo de yang mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: blo de yang mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin no //
translated: And that cognition is a valid cognition of direct perception.

original: dbang po dang don du phrad pa med na de nyid ji ltar yin zhes zer na yang /
analyzed: dbang po dang don du phrad pa med na de nyid ji ltar yin zhes zer na yang /
translated: If it is asked, “If there is no contact of the sense faculty with the object, how is it direct perception?”

original: de lta bu'i kho bo cag la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon sum ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu'i kho bo cag la sogs pa rnams kyi mngon sum ma yin te /
translated: It is not direct perception for us.

original: 'di ni de nyid ma lus pa dngos su rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can ni mtshan nyid gzhan kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni de nyid ma lus pa dngos su rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can ni mtshan nyid gzhan kho na yin no //
translated: It has a different characteristic, the nature of directly realizing all of reality.

original: 'di'i chos ni 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba'i nus pa ma nyams pa yin par brjod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'di'i chos ni 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba'i nus pa ma nyams pa yin par brjod pa yin gyi /
translated: The quality of that is said to be unimpaired potency to act as desired.

original: sgrub pa nan tan du bya bas bsgrub par bya ba'i bsod nams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub pa nan tan du bya bas bsgrub par bya ba'i bsod nams ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the merit to be accomplished by the practice of the proof.

original: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is purposeless.

original: sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir chos ma yin pa yang spangs pa yin no //
analyzed: sdug bsngal med pa'i phyir chos ma yin pa yang spangs pa yin no //
translated: It is also free from non-Dharma because there is no suffering.

original: de dag med pas 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rab tu ldang ba yang med do //
analyzed: de dag med pas 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / rab tu ldang ba yang med do //
translated: Since those do not exist, there is also no attachment and no arising.

original: de yang bdag cag la sogs pa'i bdag dang mi skye bar 'brel bas /
analyzed: de yang bdag cag la sogs pa'i bdag dang mi skye bar 'brel bas /
translated: Moreover, since we and others are related to nonarising,

original: las rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi la sogs pa rnams kyi byed pa po nyid du rjes su dpag pa kho nas grub po //
analyzed: las rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa gzhi la sogs pa rnams kyi byed pa po nyid du rjes su dpag pa kho nas grub po //
translated: it is established by mere inference that the ground and so on are the agents of actions blessed by karma.

original: 'dir sbyor bar byed pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir sbyor bar byed pa med pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Here, the absence of an agent is not established because🔽if the pervasion of the position is not followed by affirmation and negation,

original: phyogs la khyab par byed pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can ni sbyor bar byed pa nyid ma yin na /
analyzed: phyogs la khyab par byed pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa can ni sbyor bar byed pa nyid ma yin na /
translated: then it is not an agent.

original: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la yang bye brag med pas /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa thams cad la yang bye brag med pas /
translated: Since there is no difference in all inferences,

original: de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
analyzed: de kho na bzhin du 'gyur ro snyam du sems pas /
translated: it would be just like that.

original: gal te tshad ma yod pa yin te //🔽sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang // zhes pa nas /
analyzed: gal te tshad ma yod pa yin te // sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang // zhes pa nas /
translated: If valid cognition exists,🔽then it is like the shape of a pot,🔽and so on, up to

original: dper na bum pa la @136b sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis /
analyzed: dper na bum pa la @136b sogs pa bzhin no zhes bya ba'i bar gyis /
translated: the example of a pot.

original: thams cad dbang phyug sgrub par byed pa yin par nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad dbang phyug sgrub par byed pa yin par nye bar mtshon pa yin no //
translated: This illustrates the proof of the existence of Īśvara.

original: lan du / sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang / don byed pa la sogs rnams la //
analyzed: lan du / sdod 'jug dbyibs kyi khyad par dang / don byed pa la sogs rnams la //
translated: In response, it is said:🔽The difference in shape, the function,🔽and so on.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The response to that is:🔽The difference in shape that is allowed to remain,🔽and the performance of functions, and so on.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni bskyed pa dang sems can ma yin pa'i nye bar len pa nyid la sogs pa bzung ba yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni bskyed pa dang sems can ma yin pa'i nye bar len pa nyid la sogs pa bzung ba yin te /
translated: The term “and so on” includes the production of non-sentient appropriated aggregates and so on.

original: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rigs pa mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the reasoning is the same.

original: gang 'di sems can ma yin pa'i nye bar len pa nyid dang / de'i khyad par can bskyed pa yang khyim la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni /
analyzed: gang 'di sems can ma yin pa'i nye bar len pa nyid dang / de'i khyad par can bskyed pa yang khyim la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni /
translated: The production of non-sentient appropriated aggregates and the difference in shape of those, such as the shape of a house,

original: sa gzhi la sogs pa las ldog pa de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu gzhan dang thun mong ba'i khyim dang / bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa'am /
analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs pa las ldog pa de dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu gzhan dang thun mong ba'i khyim dang / bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra'i khyad par gyis nye bar mtshon pa'am /
translated: are like the earth and so on that are distinguished from the house and so on by the specific terms “house” and “pot” that are shared with other effects that are similar to them.

original: bya ba ma mthong ba yang byas par blos nye bar mtshon pa yang /
analyzed: bya ba ma mthong ba yang byas par blos nye bar mtshon pa yang /
translated: Or the unseen action is indicated by the mind that thinks, “I did it.”

original: de'i blo dang ldan pa med na mi 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i blo dang ldan pa med na mi 'byung ba yin te /
translated: And the mind that thinks, “I did it” does not occur without the presence of that.

original: de'i blo ni chos shin tu mkhas pa de'i blo'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i bye brag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i blo ni chos shin tu mkhas pa de'i blo'i rjes su 'brangs pa'i bye brag nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: The cognition of the latter is a particular that follows the cognition of the one who is very learned in the Dharma.

original: ri mo gzhan lta bu'o //
analyzed: ri mo gzhan lta bu'o //
translated: It is like another painting.

original: sa gzhi la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs pa la ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The earth, etc. do not have such an essence.

original: khyim zhig pa'i shing dang so phag la sogs pa'i phung po'i ngo bo bzhin du mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: khyim zhig pa'i shing dang so phag la sogs pa'i phung po'i ngo bo bzhin du mtshan nyid mi mthun pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because they have a different characteristic, like the essence of a heap of bricks, etc. that are the remains of a destroyed house.

original: byas pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya'i shes pa mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: byas pa yin zhes bya ba'i bsgrub bya'i shes pa mi 'byung ngo //
translated: The cognition of the probandum, “it is produced,” does not arise.

original: rgyu mtshan gang gis de nyid kyi ngo bo yin zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gang gis de nyid kyi ngo bo yin zhe na /
translated: For what reason is it the essence of that?

original: byas pa rnams kyang re zhig dngos po re re'i rang gi ngo bo'i rnam pa tha dad pa kho na yin nam byas pa rnams lta ci smos /
analyzed: byas pa rnams kyang re zhig dngos po re re'i rang gi ngo bo'i rnam pa tha dad pa kho na yin nam byas pa rnams lta ci smos /
translated: Are the produced, moreover, only different aspects of the essence of each thing? What need is there to mention the produced?

original: 'jig rten pa la byas pa dang ma byas pa'i rnam par dbye ba dgag bya ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa la byas pa dang ma byas pa'i rnam par dbye ba dgag bya ma yin no //
translated: The distinction between the produced and the unproduced is not something to be refuted in the world.

original: 'on te byas pa nyid ma byas pa bzhin du snang ba yin te /
analyzed: 'on te byas pa nyid ma byas pa bzhin du snang ba yin te /
translated: Or, the produced appears as if it were unproduced.

original: dngul chu zhugs pa'i gser lta bu'o //
analyzed: dngul chu zhugs pa'i gser lta bu'o //
translated: like gold that has been dipped in mercury.

original: de lta na yang the tshom can gyi sa gzhi la sogs pa'i ngo bo las ni /
analyzed: de lta na yang the tshom can gyi sa gzhi la sogs pa'i ngo bo las ni /
translated: Even so, from the nature of the ground, etc., which is in doubt,

original: rlangs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor the tshom za ba'i du ba las me bzhin du /🔽bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid dam /
analyzed: rlangs pa la sogs pa'i ngo bor the tshom za ba'i du ba las me bzhin du / bsgrub bya mi 'grub pa'i phyir ma grub pa nyid dam /
translated: smoke, which is in doubt as to its nature, such as steam, etc.,

original: the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa yin par ni /
analyzed: the tshom za ba'i ma grub pa yin par ni /
translated: the probandum is not established, and so it is unestablished, or it is unestablished in doubt.🔽This is shown by the words “the example is not established.”

original: dpe ma grub ces bya bas bstan pa yin la byas par nges pa la ma byas pa nyid du the tshom za bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dpe ma grub ces bya bas bstan pa yin la byas par nges pa la ma byas pa nyid du the tshom za bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: But it is not the case that in the ascertainment of the effect, there is doubt as to the nonexistence of the cause.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i so sor snang ba la yang /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i so sor snang ba la yang /
translated: Even in the individual appearances of form, etc.,

original: phyin ci log par ldog pas tha snyad thams cad nus par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //🔽'ji @137a * //
analyzed: phyin ci log par ldog pas tha snyad thams cad nus par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // 'ji @137a * //
translated: it would follow that all conventions would be possible by the exclusion of error.

original: pa'i gong bu las bum pa khyad par med par sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang nges par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: pa'i gong bu las bum pa khyad par med par sems dang ldan pa 'ga' yang nges par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: No one with a mind would ascertain a pot as not different from a lump of clay.

original: de yang de lta bu'i ngo bo sa gzhi la sogs pa la mi srid pa'i phyir blo dang ldan pas khyab pa can nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang de lta bu'i ngo bo sa gzhi la sogs pa la mi srid pa'i phyir blo dang ldan pas khyab pa can nye bar dmigs pa'i phyir /
translated: Since such an entity is impossible in the foundation consciousness and so on, the wise should understand that it is a universal that is observed as being concomitant with the mind.🔽

original: de dang ldan pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa nyid du sgrub par byed do //
translated: Since such an entity is impossible in the foundation consciousness and so on, the wise prove that it is the appropriator of the body.

original: gang yang sems pa can ma yin pa'i nye bar lan pa nyid tsam sgra'i brjod bya'i bdag nyid du mtshungs pa de ni de bzhin du khyab pa can ma yin te /
analyzed: gang yang sems pa can ma yin pa'i nye bar lan pa nyid tsam sgra'i brjod bya'i bdag nyid du mtshungs pa de ni de bzhin du khyab pa can ma yin te /
translated: The mere nonmental appropriator is similar to the meaning of the word, but it is not pervaded by that,

original: blo phul du byung ba dang cig shos dag gis phul du byung ba dang / cig shos su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo phul du byung ba dang cig shos dag gis phul du byung ba dang / cig shos su ma mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the superior and inferior minds do not see the superior and inferior appropriators.

original: gal te khyim dang cig shos dag gi nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can ma yin pa nyid du khyad par med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te khyim dang cig shos dag gi nye bar len pa rnams sems pa can ma yin pa nyid du khyad par med pa yin na /
translated: If the nonmental appropriators of the house and so on are not distinguished as being nonmental,

original: gcig la de ltos pa yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin zhes ji ltar rnam par dbye ba yin /
analyzed: gcig la de ltos pa yin gyi cig shos ni ma yin zhes ji ltar rnam par dbye ba yin /
translated: how can you distinguish one as dependent on the other?

original: de lta na bum pa dang snam bu dag gi de'i nye bar len pa nyid la bye brag med kyang ;
analyzed: de lta na bum pa dang snam bu dag gi de'i nye bar len pa nyid la bye brag med kyang ;
translated: If there is no difference in the mere appropriator of the pot and the cloth,

original: ji ltar rdza mkhan dang thag pa la sogs pa'i bye brag la ltos pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ji ltar rdza mkhan dang thag pa la sogs pa'i bye brag la ltos pa yin gyi /
translated: For example, the potter and the rope, etc. are dependent on the specific differences.

original: thag pa'i blo las byung ba'i bye brag ni gzhan las ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: thag pa'i blo las byung ba'i bye brag ni gzhan las ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: The specific difference that arises from the cognition of the rope is not from another.

original: gzhan la yang blo las byung ba'i bye brag ni nye bar len pa tsam las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan la yang blo las byung ba'i bye brag ni nye bar len pa tsam las ni ma yin no //
translated: In the case of another, the specific difference that arises from the cognition is not from the mere appropriation.

original: de ma yin pa las byung bar cis mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de ma yin pa las byung bar cis mi 'gyur /
translated: Why would it not arise from that which is not that?

original: bsam pa med pa'i bya ba'i nye bar len pa las ji ltar yul la sogs pa'i nges pa can gyi 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: bsam pa med pa'i bya ba'i nye bar len pa las ji ltar yul la sogs pa'i nges pa can gyi 'bras bu ji ltar bskyed pa yin zhe na /
translated: How does the result that is determined by the object, etc. arise from the appropriation of the activity that is without thought?

original: de'i bsam pas las kyang ji ltar yin te /
analyzed: de'i bsam pas las kyang ji ltar yin te /
translated: How is it that the action is also by its thought?

original: bye brag med par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med par mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is similar without distinction.

original: ma mthong ba la sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i dbye ba las yin no zhe na lhan cig byed pa'i dbye bas de nyid la de nges par 'gyur du zin kyang /
analyzed: ma mthong ba la sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i dbye ba las yin no zhe na lhan cig byed pa'i dbye bas de nyid la de nges par 'gyur du zin kyang /
translated: If it is from the division of the cooperating causes such as non-seeing, although the determination of that would be just from the division of the cooperating causes,

original: gang gi phyir nges pa ni blo'i bskyed bya ma yin te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir nges pa ni blo'i bskyed bya ma yin te /
translated: the determination is not the product of the cognition because

original: lhan cig byed pa po yod pa dang / med pa'i rjes su byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / dri ba la sogs pa dang bde ba la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo'i nges pa bzhin du yul la sogs pa'i nges pa yang de nyid kho nas rnyed par bla ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa po yod pa dang / med pa'i rjes su byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang / dri ba la sogs pa dang bde ba la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo'i nges pa bzhin du yul la sogs pa'i nges pa yang de nyid kho nas rnyed par bla ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it follows the existence and nonexistence of the cooperating causes, and because the ascertainment of the object and so on is found by that alone, just like the ascertainment of the nature of questions and so on and pleasure and so on.

original: de yang brtags pa yin pa ni ji snyed pa rnams bskyed pa'i don rgyu rnams yod na /
analyzed: de yang brtags pa yin pa ni ji snyed pa rnams bskyed pa'i don rgyu rnams yod na /
translated: Moreover, it is imputed because if the causes exist for the production of all things,

original: de rnams kyi byin gyis rlob pa po yin gyi /
analyzed: de rnams kyi byin gyis rlob pa po yin gyi /
translated: they are the empowerers of those things.

original: rdza mkhan bzhin du rang dbang gis cung zad bya ba'i nges pa byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rdza mkhan bzhin du rang dbang gis cung zad bya ba'i nges pa byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But they do not function independently like a potter, creating the ascertainment of a specific action.

original: las kyi bya ba rdzogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i rigs pa las 'das pa yin pa'i @137b phyir ro //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba rdzogs pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i rigs pa las 'das pa yin pa'i @137b phyir ro //
translated: Because it is illogical that the action of the effect is completed.

original: des ni de rnams kyi nus pa'i shes pa ni 'ga' yang phul du byung bar sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des ni de rnams kyi nus pa'i shes pa ni 'ga' yang phul du byung bar sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
translated: That does not at all exaggerate the knowledge of their power.

original: rdza mkhan gyis de shes pa yin na /
analyzed: rdza mkhan gyis de shes pa yin na /
translated: If the potter knows that,

original: de'i blo las byung ba'i bye brag grub pa'i bye brag chen po yin no //
analyzed: de'i blo las byung ba'i bye brag grub pa'i bye brag chen po yin no //
translated: The great specific is that which is produced from the intellect.

original: des ni nan gyis de yongs su bsgyur ba yin na /
analyzed: des ni nan gyis de yongs su bsgyur ba yin na /
translated: If he is the one who transforms it,

original: dbang phyug ni de bzhin du nan gyis byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang phyug ni de bzhin du nan gyis byed pa ni ma yin te /
translated: then God is not the one who transforms it in that way.

original: dge ba gcig gcig 'byin par thal bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: dge ba gcig gcig 'byin par thal bar 'gyur la /
translated: It follows that he would produce only one virtue.

original: de'i nus pa phul du byung ba las de'i nye bar len pa rnams tshogs pa ni byed pa po yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i nus pa phul du byung ba las de'i nye bar len pa rnams tshogs pa ni byed pa po yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the collection of his appropriated aggregates is the agent because it is produced from his excellent power,

original: ma yin te de rnams nyid rang gi rgyu rnams kyis bsdus pa rnams rang gi nus pa nyid kyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ma yin te de rnams nyid rang gi rgyu rnams kyis bsdus pa rnams rang gi nus pa nyid kyis skyed par byed pa'i phyir /
translated: that is not so, because those very aggregates are produced by their own causes, which are collected by themselves.

original: re zhig de'i shes pa ni dgos pa can ma yin te /🔽nus mthu ni lhan cig byed pa rnams kho na'i las rnams su brtags pa yin par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: re zhig de'i shes pa ni dgos pa can ma yin te / nus mthu ni lhan cig byed pa rnams kho na'i las rnams su brtags pa yin par bstan pa ni /
translated: His consciousness is not necessary,🔽because the power of the collection of causes is imagined to be the activity of the collection of causes.

original: 'dod pa sgrub pa'am zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'dod pa sgrub pa'am zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: The statement that the collection of causes is the agent is taught by the words “to accomplish what is desired.”

original: byed pa po dang / byed pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'bras bu dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa po dang / byed pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi 'bras bu dmigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: The effect is perceived as preceded by the agent and action.

original: 'di la bye brag la sogs pa zhas smras pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di la bye brag la sogs pa zhas smras pa yin te /
translated: Here, the word “etc.” refers to the particular.

original: byed pa po'i tsam ma ma byed pa can ma yin pa yang shing rnams sreg byed bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byed pa po'i tsam ma ma byed pa can ma yin pa yang shing rnams sreg byed bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: The mere agent, not the non-doer, would be like the one who burns the wood.

original: sems pa can mthong ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa can mthong ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the sentient being is seen,

original: des byas pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan nyid kho na yin no //
analyzed: des byas pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan nyid kho na yin no //
translated: the effect produced by that would be just another.

original: sa gzhi la sogs pa bskyed pa'am /
analyzed: sa gzhi la sogs pa bskyed pa'am /
translated: The production of the earth, etc.

original: 'bras bu nyid ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la blo dang ldan pa med pas 'byung ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid ni nam mkha' la sogs pa la blo dang ldan pa med pas 'byung ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: or the effect itself would not occur in space, etc., because there is no intelligence.

original: yod pa ma yin yang mi 'byung ba yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin yang mi 'byung ba yin te /
translated: Even if it does not exist, it would not occur.

original: gang gi phyir de ni gos la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin par bstan zin to //
analyzed: gang gi phyir de ni gos la sogs pa la yod pa ma yin par bstan zin to //
translated: Because it has been shown that it does not exist in cloth, etc.

original: dpe ma grub ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dpe ma grub ces bya ba ni bsgrub par bya ba ma tshang ba nyid yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The statement “The example is not established” means that the probandum is incomplete.

original: de bzhin du du ba dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni dpe dang dpe can la ltos nas chos can tsam gyis gzhan du phye ba ma rtogs pa gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin du du ba dang byas pa nyid la sogs pa ni dpe dang dpe can la ltos nas chos can tsam gyis gzhan du phye ba ma rtogs pa gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Likewise, smoke and being produced, etc., are not non-perceptions of difference by the mere subject, in dependence on the example and the exemplification.

original: de lta bu de yang dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs lam mthong ba tsam gyis sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta bu de yang dpe la rjes su 'gro ba med pa ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs lam mthong ba tsam gyis sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: And that is not a proof, when there is no concomitance with the example, by mere seeing the discordant side.

original: 'khrul par dogs bzhin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin par mthong ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'khrul par dogs bzhin pa'i phyir 'khrul pa yin par mthong ba lta bu'o //
translated: It is like seeing a mirage, when there is doubt about error.

original: ji ltar skye ba nyid tsam ni me la'am 'ji ba'i 'gyur ba tsam nyid ni rdza mkhan gyi bya ba nyid la sgrub byed ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar skye ba nyid tsam ni me la'am 'ji ba'i 'gyur ba tsam nyid ni rdza mkhan gyi bya ba nyid la sgrub byed ma yin te /
translated: Just as production itself is not a proof for fire, and just as mere change in clay is not a proof for the activity of the potter,

original: de la yang ma 'khrul pa'i nges pa'i med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang ma 'khrul pa'i nges pa'i med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no certainty without error in those cases.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: That is taught:

original: @138a * // yang na the tshom za ba yin //
analyzed: @138a * // yang na the tshom za ba yin //
translated: Or else, there is doubt.

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That is said.

original: chad pa la sogs pa'i byed pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis bya ba mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: chad pa la sogs pa'i byed pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyis bya ba mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't the activity of cutting, etc., preceded by the action of seeing?

original: rnam par rig pa'i bya ba ni ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i dbang po las 'das pa rtogs par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang bya ba las dbang po 'das pa'i byed pa po grub pa yin no zer ba de la /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa'i bya ba ni ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i dbang po las 'das pa rtogs par byed pa yin pa de bzhin du 'di la yang bya ba las dbang po 'das pa'i byed pa po grub pa yin no zer ba de la /
translated: Just as the activity of the eye and so on is understood to be beyond the senses, so too, in this case, the agent of the activity beyond the senses is established.

original: 'dod pa sgrub pa 'am zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: 'dod pa sgrub pa 'am zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: To that, it is said: “The assertion is established.”

original: dbang po bzhin du sems pa can ma yin pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: dbang po bzhin du sems pa can ma yin pa nyid du grub pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Because it is established that it is not a thinking being, like the sense faculties,

original: shes pa'i bskyed bya'i bye brag med pa'i phyir smra ba po'i 'dod pa grub pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i bskyed bya'i bye brag med pa'i phyir smra ba po'i 'dod pa grub pa yin no //
translated: or because there is no specific product of consciousness, the assertion of the proponent is established.

original: thams cad shes pa ma yin pa'i byed pa po sngon du 'gro ba nyid ni phyin ci log du sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa ni 'gal ba can ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad shes pa ma yin pa'i byed pa po sngon du 'gro ba nyid ni phyin ci log du sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa ni 'gal ba can ma yin te /
translated: The mere prior existence of an agent that is not a knower is not established as contradictory,

original: 'bras bu nyid tsam la sogs pa dang / blo dang ldan pa tsam gyis khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'bras bu nyid tsam la sogs pa dang / blo dang ldan pa tsam gyis khyab pa ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the mere effect and so on, and the mere possession of intelligence, are not established as pervasion.

original: grub pa yin na ni 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
analyzed: grub pa yin na ni 'gyur ba kho na yin te /
translated: If it were established, it would be just that.

original: dper na mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dper na mig la sogs pa ni gzhan gyi don byed pa yin te /
translated: For example, the eye, etc. are for the sake of another,

original: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir mal cha dang stan la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dus pa yin pa'i phyir mal cha dang stan la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because they are a collection, like a bed, a seat, etc.

original: mal cha la sogs pa nyid la gzhan gyi don nyid kyis khyab pa mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: mal cha la sogs pa nyid la gzhan gyi don nyid kyis khyab pa mthong ba yin no //
translated: And it is seen that a bed, etc. are for the sake of another.

original: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'dus pa'i bye brag kho na gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du 'dus pa'i bye brag kho na gzhan gyi don nyid sgrub par byed pa yin na /
translated: Since the difference of a collection is established as being for the sake of another, just as it is seen,

original: 'dod pa las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba can yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa las bzlog pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir 'gal ba can yin no //
translated: it is contradictory because it establishes the opposite of what is desired.

original: mthong ba'i bye brag gi rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i phyir 'phen par byed pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba'i bye brag gi rjes su 'brang bar byed pa'i phyir 'phen par byed pa yin no //
translated: It is a fling because it follows the difference of what is seen.

original: chos can gyi rigs kyi bye brag bzhin du chos kyi rigs ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: chos can gyi rigs kyi bye brag bzhin du chos kyi rigs ni tha dad pa ma yin te /
translated: The type of property is not different from the type of subject,

original: rang gi ngo bo bzhin du khyad par yang mthong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo bzhin du khyad par yang mthong bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the difference, like its own nature, is seen to be the cause.

original: mthong ba'i dbyig pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i mig ni ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba'i dbyig pa dang mtshan nyid mi mthun pa'i mig ni ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin zhe na /
translated: How can the eye, which is not similar to the stick that is seen, be inferred?

original: ma yin / mthong ba kho na'i byin rlabs de'i nus pa tsam gyi 'bras bu las byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang po nyid yin na /
analyzed: ma yin / mthong ba kho na'i byin rlabs de'i nus pa tsam gyi 'bras bu las byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang po nyid yin na /
translated: No, it is not. The eye is the sense faculty that is empowered by the mere power of the empowerment that is seen.

original: thob par byed pa nyid du go bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: thob par byed pa nyid du go bar byed pa yin te /
translated: It is understood to be that which obtains.

original: de'i phyir thag ring ba dang / nye ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dzin pa rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i phyir thag ring ba dang / nye ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'dzin pa dang / mi 'dzin pa rnam par gzhag par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the distinction of apprehending and not apprehending due to the distinction of distant and near, etc., would not be established,

original: ma thob par bye brag med pa'i phyir 'di yang gtam tsam yin no //
analyzed: ma thob par bye brag med pa'i phyir 'di yang gtam tsam yin no //
translated: because there would be no distinction in what is not obtained. This is also mere talk.

original: thob par byed pa nyid ni bdag yin te /
analyzed: thob par byed pa nyid ni bdag yin te /
translated: The self is that which obtains.

original: @138b dus dang phyogs la sogs pa thob pa yod pa'i phyir ro //🔽gsal bar byed pa'i rlung dang phrad pa dang / bral ba dang 'brel bas /
analyzed: @138b dus dang phyogs la sogs pa thob pa yod pa'i phyir ro // gsal bar byed pa'i rlung dang phrad pa dang / bral ba dang 'brel bas /
translated: Because there is the obtaining of time, direction, etc.

original: rna ba ni de rnams kyi yang 'dzin byed du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rna ba ni de rnams kyi yang 'dzin byed du 'gyur ro //
translated: The ear is also the apprehender of those due to the connection with the wind that clarifies and is free from contact.

original: rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ma yin no zhe na /
translated: It is not because it is not suitable.

original: thob bya ma yin pa yang rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thob bya ma yin pa yang rung ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: But what is not to be attained is not suitable.

original: thag ring ba la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /🔽yul ji snyed pa la shes pa skyed par byed pa de skyed la rung ba yin te /
analyzed: thag ring ba la 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te / yul ji snyed pa la shes pa skyed par byed pa de skyed la rung ba yin te /
translated: It is not because it is distant that it is not apprehended.

original: de ni 'bras bu'i go byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni 'bras bu'i go byed yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is suitable to produce knowledge of the extent of the object, because that is the cause of the result.

original: zla ba'i cha gzhan ma mthong ba ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin //
analyzed: zla ba'i cha gzhan ma mthong ba ji ltar rjes su dpog pa yin //
translated: How is the other part of the moon inferred, since it is not seen?

original: des na skye ba la sogs skye ba gzhan rjes su dpog par yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: des na skye ba la sogs skye ba gzhan rjes su dpog par yang mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable to infer another arising of arising, etc.

original: mthong ba'i cha'i skye ba dang mtshungs pas dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i cha'i skye ba dang mtshungs pas dbye ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no distinction, since it is the same as the arising of the seen part.

original: sngon gyi las ma mthong ba las ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: sngon gyi las ma mthong ba las ji ltar yin zhe na /
translated: How is it from not seeing previous karma?

original: de ci da ni gseng yod pa'i phyir gtun shing yang shong ba yin nam /
analyzed: de ci da ni gseng yod pa'i phyir gtun shing yang shong ba yin nam /
translated: Is it because there is a gap that a pestle can also fit in?

original: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa mthong ba las rgyu sna tshogs pa nyid yin pa la ni ches ngo mtshar bar bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu sna tshogs pa mthong ba las rgyu sna tshogs pa nyid yin pa la ni ches ngo mtshar bar bya ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not at all surprising that a variety of causes is inferred from seeing a variety of effects.

original: de dag tsam gyis 'dod par 'grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de dag tsam gyis 'dod par 'grub pa yin no //
translated: One is established in the desire realm by those alone.

original: de las gzhan par rtogs par byed na ngo mtshar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan par rtogs par byed na ngo mtshar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one were to understand it otherwise, one would be a fool.

original: de'i phyir 'bras bu la sogs pa tsam gyis khyab pa ma grub pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'bras bu la sogs pa tsam gyis khyab pa ma grub pa yin te /
translated: Therefore, pervasion is not established by mere effect, etc.,

original: ma 'khrul bar ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma 'khrul bar ma nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because non-error is not ascertained.

original: de la dpe la /
analyzed: de la dpe la /
translated: Regarding the example,

original: yang na the tshom za ba yin //
analyzed: yang na the tshom za ba yin //
translated: it is either doubted.

original: zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: This is stated.

original: bshad pa byed pas ni sems pa can gyi las ni byin gyis rlob pa po nyid yin par khas blangs par 'dod pa grub par bstan pa ni /
analyzed: bshad pa byed pas ni sems pa can gyi las ni byin gyis rlob pa po nyid yin par khas blangs par 'dod pa grub par bstan pa ni /
translated: The author explains that the assertion that the possessor of intention is the consecrator is established:

original: sems pa can la sems pa can gzhan ni dgos pa med pa yin no //
analyzed: sems pa can la sems pa can gzhan ni dgos pa med pa yin no //
translated: For the possessor of intention, another possessor of intention is not necessary.

original: dpe la ni da bzhin du ma grub pa'i phyir dbang phyug de nyid ni don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid la sogs par ma nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: dpe la ni da bzhin du ma grub pa'i phyir dbang phyug de nyid ni don byed pa'i byed pa po nyid la sogs par ma nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: In the example, it is not established in the same way. Therefore, that God is not ascertained as the agent of purposeful action, etc.

original: de la gzhan byin gyis rlob par byed pa nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la gzhan byin gyis rlob par byed pa nyid gzhan yod pa ma yin te /
translated: For that, another consecrator does not exist.

original: de bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de bstan pa ni /
translated: The teaching of that is:

original: yang na the tshom za ba yin //🔽zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: yang na the tshom za ba yin // zhes bya ba'o //
translated: or else, it is doubtful.

original: de'i phyir 'dir sa gzhi la sogs pa la blo'i bskyed bya'i bya brag med pa'i phyir dang / dbang phyug gis byas par mi rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir sa gzhi la sogs pa la blo'i bskyed bya'i bya brag med pa'i phyir dang / dbang phyug gis byas par mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, in this case, the ground, etc. are not the effect of a particular activity of the intellect, and it is not reasonable that they are created by God.

original: de khas len na /
analyzed: de khas len na /
translated: If one accepts that,

original: tha dad dngos la rab grub pa /
analyzed: tha dad dngos la rab grub pa /
translated: then the statement, “The difference of entities is well established,

original: sgra mtshungs pas tha dad med phyir //
analyzed: sgra mtshungs pas tha dad med phyir //
translated: because of the non-difference of the same sound,”

original: zhes bya ba dang ma 'brel par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang ma 'brel par 'gyur ro //
translated: would be incoherent.

original: de'i phyir yul la sogs pa'i nges pa tsam mthong bas de'i rgyu ma mthong ba tsam yod par go ba yin gyi de yang sems pa can ma yin @139a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul la sogs pa'i nges pa tsam mthong bas de'i rgyu ma mthong ba tsam yod par go ba yin gyi de yang sems pa can ma yin @139a * //
translated: Therefore, one understands the mere existence of the cause of the ascertainment of the object, etc., by seeing the mere non-perception of that cause. But that is not an intelligent being,

original: te / de'i bskyed bya'i bye brag ma mthong ba'i phyir //
analyzed: te / de'i bskyed bya'i bye brag ma mthong ba'i phyir //
translated: because one does not see a particular effect of that.

original: sems pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid yin la /
analyzed: sems pa can gyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid yin la /
translated: It is only the intelligent being that is the cause of the ascertainment of the object, etc.,🔽and not anything else.

original: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di la yang tshad mar cung zad kyang med la //
analyzed: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don 'di la yang tshad mar cung zad kyang med la //
translated: There is not the slightest valid cognition for this meaning.

original: las la ni byed pa po thams cad kyi nus pa nyid kyi shes pa yang mi srid pa yin no //
analyzed: las la ni byed pa po thams cad kyi nus pa nyid kyi shes pa yang mi srid pa yin no //
translated: And it is impossible to have the cognition that the intelligent being has the power to create all things.
